original: Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Abhidhammatthasaṅgaho
analyzed: abhidhamma attha saṅgaho

original: Ganthārambhakathā
analyzed: gantha ārambha kathā

original: 1. Sammāsambuddhamatulaṃ, sasaddhammagaṇuttamaṃ.
analyzed: sammāsambuddham atulam sa saddhamma gaṇa uttamam

original: Abhivādiya bhāsissaṃ, abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṃ.
analyzed: abhivādiya bhāsissam abhidhamma attha saṅgaham

original: Catuparamatthadhammo
analyzed: catu parama ttha dhammo

original: 2. Tattha vuttābhidhammatthā, catudhā paramatthato.
analyzed: tattha vutta abhidhamma tthā catudhā paramatthataḥ

original: Cittaṃ cetasikaṃ rūpaṃ, nibbānamiti sabbathā.
analyzed: cittam cetasikam rūpam nibbānam iti sabbathā

original: 1. Cittaparicchedo
analyzed: citta paricchedaḥ

original: Bhūmibhedacittaṃ
analyzed: bhūmi bheda cittam

original: 3. Tattha cittaṃ tāva catubbidhaṃ hoti kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttarañceti.
analyzed: tattha cittam tāva catubbidham hoti kāmāvacaram rūpāvacaram arūpāvacaram lokuttaram ca iti

original: Akusalacittaṃ
analyzed: akusala cittam

original: 4. Tattha katamaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ? Somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ,
analyzed: tattha katamam kāmāvacaram somanassa sahagatam diṭṭhi gata sampayuttam asaṅkhārikam ekam

original: sasaṅkhārikamekaṃ, somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekaṃ,
analyzed: sa saṅkhārikam ekam somanassa sahagatam diṭṭhi gata vippayuttam asaṅkhārikam ekam sa saṅkhārikam ekam

original: upekkhāsahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam diṭṭhi gata sampayuttam asaṅkhārikam ekam sa saṅkhārikam ekam upekkhā sahagatam

original: diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekanti imāni aṭṭhapi lobhasahagatacittāni nāma.
analyzed: diṭṭhi gata vippayuttam asaṅkhārikam ekam sa saṅkhārikam ekam ti imāni aṭṭha pi lobha sahagata cittāni nāma

original: 5. Domanassasahagataṃ paṭighasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekanti imāni dvepi paṭighasampayuttacittāni nāma.
analyzed: domanassa sahagatam paṭigha sampayuttam asaṅkhārikam ekam sasaṅkhārikam ekam ti imāni dve api paṭigha sampayutta cittāni nāma

original: 6. Upekkhāsahagataṃ vicikicchāsampayuttamekaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttamekanti imāni dvepi momūhacittāni nāma.
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam vicikicchā sampayuttam ekam upekkhā sahagatam uddhacca sampayuttam ekam ti imāni dve pi momūha cittāni nāma

original: 7. Iccevaṃ sabbathāpi dvādasākusalacittāni samattāni.
analyzed: icc evam sabbathā api dvādasa akusala cittāni samattāni

original: 8. Aṭṭhadhā lobhamūlāni, dosamūlāni ca dvidhā.
analyzed: aṭṭhadhā lobha mūlāni dosa mūlāni ca dvidhā

original: Mohamūlāni ca dveti, dvādasākusalā siyuṃ.
analyzed: moha mūlāni ca dve iti dvādasā akusalāḥ siyum

original: Ahetukacittaṃ
analyzed: ahetuka cittam

original: 9. Upekkhāsahagataṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tathā sotaviññāṇaṃ, ghānaviññāṇaṃ, jivhāviññāṇaṃ,
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam cakkhu viññāṇam tathā sota viññāṇam ghāna viññāṇam jivhā viññāṇam

original: dukkhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ sampaṭicchanacittaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ
analyzed: dukkha sahagatam kāya viññāṇam upekkhā sahagatam sampaṭicchana cittam upekkhā sahagatam

analyzed: imāni satta pi akusala vipāka cittāni nāma

original: 10. Upekkhāsahagataṃ kusalavipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tathā sotaviññāṇaṃ, ghānaviññāṇaṃ,
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam kusala vipākam cakkhu viññāṇam tathā sota viññāṇam ghāna viññāṇam

original: jivhāviññāṇaṃ, sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ sampaṭicchanacittaṃ,
analyzed: jivhā viññāṇam sukha sahagatam kāya viññāṇam upekkhā sahagatam sampaṭicchana cittam

original: somanassasahagataṃ santīraṇacittaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ santīraṇacittañceti imāni aṭṭhapi
analyzed: somanassa sahagatam santīraṇa cittam upekkhā sahagatam santīraṇa cittam ca iti imāni aṭṭha pi

original: kusalavipākāhetukacittāni nāma.
analyzed: kusala vipāka ahetuka cittāni nāma

original: 11. Upekkhāsahagataṃ pañcadvārāvajjanacittaṃ, tathā manodvārāvajjanacittaṃ, somanassasahagataṃ hasituppādacittañceti imāni tīṇipi ahetukakiriyacittāni nāma.
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam pañca dvāra āvajjana cittam tathā manaḥ dvāra āvajjana cittam somanassa sahagatam hasituppāda cittam ca iti imāni tīṇi pi ahetuka kiriya cittāni nāma

original: 12. Icceva sabbathāpi aṭṭhārasāhetukacittāni samattāni.
analyzed: icca iva sabbathā api aṭṭhārasa ahetuka cittāni samattāni

original: 13. Sattākusalapākāni, puññapākāni aṭṭhadhā.
analyzed: satta akusala pākāni puññapākāni aṭṭhadhā

original: Kriyacittāni tīṇīti, aṭṭhārasa ahetukā.
analyzed: kriya cittāni tīṇi iti aṭṭhārasa ahetukā

original: Sobhanacittaṃ
analyzed: sobhana cittam

original: 14. Pāpāhetukamuttāni, sobhanānīti vuccare.
analyzed: sobhanāni iti

original: Ekūnasaṭṭhi cittāni, athekanavutīpi vā.
analyzed: cittāni vā

original: Kāmāvacarasobhanacittaṃ
analyzed: kāma avacara sobhana cittam

original: 15. Somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekaṃ, somanassasahagataṃ
analyzed: so manassa sahagatam ñāṇa sampayuttam asaṅkhārikam ekam sa saṅkhārikam ekam somanassa sahagatam

original: asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekaṃ. Upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ,
analyzed: asaṅkhārikam ekam sa saṅkhārikam ekam upekkhā sahagatam ñāṇa vippayuttam asaṅkhārikam ekam

original: sasaṅkhārikamekanti imāni aṭṭhapi kāmāvacarakusalacittāni nāma.
analyzed: sa saṅkhārikam ekam ti imāni aṭṭha api kāmāvacara kusala cittāni nāma

original: 16. Somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekaṃ, somanassasahagataṃ
analyzed: so manassa sahagatam ñāṇa sampayuttam asaṅkhārikam ekam sa saṅkhārikam ekam somanassa sahagatam

original: ñāṇavippayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ
analyzed: ñāṇa vippayuttam asaṅkhārikam ekam sa saṅkhārikam ekam upekkhā sahagatam ñāṇa sampayuttam

original: asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ,
analyzed: asaṅkhārikam ekam sa saṅkhārikam ekam upekkhā sahagatam ñāṇa vippayuttam asaṅkhārikam ekam

original: sasaṅkhārikamekanti imāni aṭṭhapi sahetukakāmāvacaravipākacittāni nāma.
analyzed: sa saṅkhārikam ekam ti imāni aṭṭha api sa hetuka kāmāvacara vipāka cittāni nāma

original: 17. Somassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekaṃ, somanassasahagataṃ
analyzed: somassa sahagatam ñāṇa sampayuttam asaṅkhārikam ekam sasaṅkhārikam ekam somanassa sahagatam

original: ñāṇavippayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ
analyzed: ñāṇa vippayuttam asaṅkhārikam ekam sa saṅkhārikam ekam upekkhā sahagatam ñāṇa sampayuttam

original: asaṅkhārikamekaṃ, sasaṅkhārikamekaṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ ñāṇavippayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikamekaṃ,
analyzed: asaṅkhārikam ekam sa saṅkhārikam ekam upekkhā sahagatam ñāṇa vippayuttam asaṅkhārikam ekam

original: sasaṅkhārikamekanti imāni aṭṭhapi sahetukakāmāvacarakiriyacittāni nāma.
analyzed: sa saṅkhārikam ekam ti imāni aṭṭha api sa hetuka kāmāvacara kiriya cittāni nāma

analyzed: icc evam sabbathā api catuvīsati sa hetuka kāmāvacara kusala vipāka kiriya cittāni samattāni

original: 19. Vedanāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedena catuvīsati.

analyzed: sa hetu kāmāvacara puññapāka kriyā matā

original: 20. Kāme tevīsa pākāni, puññāpuññāni vīsati.
analyzed: kāme tevīsa pākāni puññāpuññāni vīsati

analyzed: ekādasa kriyā ca iti catupaññāsa sabbathā

original: Rūpāvacaracittaṃ
analyzed: rūpa avacara cittam

original: 21. Vitakkavicārapītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ paṭhamajjhānakusalacittaṃ, vicārapītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ
analyzed: vitakka vicāra pīti sukha ikagga tā sahitam paṭhama jhāna kusala cittam vicāra pīti sukha ikagga tā sahitam

analyzed: dutiya jhāna kusala cittam pīti sukha ikagga tā sahitam tatiya jhāna kusala cittam sukha ekagga tā sahitam

analyzed: rūpāvacara kusala cittāni nāma

original: 22. Vitakkavicārapītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ paṭhamajjhānavipākacittaṃ, vicārapītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ
analyzed: vitakka vicāra pīti sukha ikagga tā sahitam paṭhama jhāna vipāka cittam vicāra pīti sukha ikagga tā sahitam

original: dutiyajjhānavipākacittaṃ, pītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ tatiyajjhānavipākacittaṃ, sukhekaggatāsahitaṃ
analyzed: dutiya jhāna vipāka cittam pīti sukha ekagga tā sahitam tatiya jhāna vipāka cittam sukha ekagga tā sahitam

original: catutthajjhānavipākacittaṃ, upekkhekaggatāsahitaṃ pañcamajjhānavipākacittañceti imāni
analyzed: catuttha jhāna vipāka cittam upekkhā ikagga tā sahitam pañcama jhāna vipāka cittam ca iti imāni

original: pañcapi rūpāvacaravipākacittāni nāma.
analyzed: rūpāvacara vipāka cittāni nāma

original: 23. Vitakkavicārapītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ paṭhamajjhānakiriyacittaṃ, vicārapītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ
analyzed: vitakka vicāra pīti sukha ikagga tā sahitam paṭhama jhāna kiriya cittam vicāra pīti sukha ikagga tā sahitam

original: dutiyajjhānakiriyacittaṃ, pītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ tatiyajjhānakiriyacittaṃ, sukhekaggatāsahitaṃ
analyzed: dutiya jhāna kiriya cittam pīti sukha ekagga tā sahitam tatiya jhāna kiriya cittam sukha ekagga tā sahitam

original: catutthajjhānakiriyacittaṃ, upekkhekaggatāsahitaṃ pañcamajjhānakiriyacittañceti imāni
analyzed: catuttha jhāna kiriya cittam upekkhā ikagga tā sahitam pañcama jhāna kiriya cittam ca iti imāni

original: pañcapi rūpāvacarakiriyacittāni nāma.
analyzed: rūpāvacara kiriya cittāni nāma

original: 24. Iccevaṃ sabbathāpi pannarasa rūpāvacarakusalavipākakiriyacittāni samattāni.
analyzed: icc evam sabbathā api pannarasa rūpāvacara kusala vipāka kiriya cittāni samattāni

original: 25. Pañcadhā jhānabhedena, rūpāvacaramānasaṃ.
analyzed: pañcadhā jhāna bhedena rūpāvacara mānasam

original: Puññapākakriyābhedā, taṃ pañcadasadhā bhave.
analyzed: puñña pāka kriyā bhedā tam pañcadasadhā bhave

original: Arūpāvacaracittaṃ
analyzed: arūpa avacara cittam

original: 26. Ākāsānañcāyatanakusalacittaṃ, viññāṇañcāyatanakusalacittaṃ, ākiñcaññāyatanakusalacittaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalacittañceti imāni cattāripi arūpāvacarakusalacittāni nāma.
analyzed: ākāsānañcāyatana kusala cittam viññāṇañcāyatana kusala cittam ākiñcaññāyatana kusala cittam nevasaññānāsaññāyatana kusala cittañca iti imāni cattāri pi arūpāvacara kusala cittāni nāma

original: 27. Ākāsānañcāyatanavipākacittaṃ, viññāṇañcāyatanavipākacittaṃ, ākiñcaññāyatanavipākacittaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavipākacittañceti imāni cattāripi arūpāvacaravipākacittāni nāma.
analyzed: ākāsānañcāyatana vipāka cittam viññāṇañcāyatana vipāka cittam ākiñcaññāyatana vipāka cittam nevasaññānāsaññāyatana vipāka cittam ca iti imāni cattāri pi arūpāvacara vipāka cittāni nāma

original: 28. Ākāsānañcāyatanakiriyacittaṃ, viññāṇañcāyatanakiriyacittaṃ, ākiñcaññāyatanakiriyacittaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakiriyacittañceti imāni cattāripi arūpāvacarakiriyacittāni nāma.
analyzed: ākāsānañca āyatana kiriya cittam viññāṇañca āyatana kiriya cittam ākiñcaññāyatana kiriya cittam nevasaññānāsaññāyatana kiriya cittam ca iti imāni cattāri pi arūpāvacara kiriya cittāni nāma

original: 29. Iccevaṃ sabbathāpi dvādasa arūpāvacarakusalavipākakiriyacittāni samattāni.
analyzed: icc evam sabbathā api dvādasa arūpāvacara kusala vipāka kiriya cittāni samattāni

original: 30. Ālambaṇappabhedena, catudhāruppamānasaṃ.
analyzed: ālambaṇa ppabhedena catudhā āruppa mānasam

original: Puññapākakriyābhedā, puna dvādasadhā ṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: puññapāka kriyā bhedā puna dvādasadhā ṭhitam

original: Lokuttaracittaṃ
31. Sotāpattimaggacittaṃ, sakadāgāmimaggacittaṃ, anāgāmimaggacittaṃ, arahattamaggacittañceti imāni cattāripi lokuttarakusalacittāni nāma.
analyzed: sotāpatti magga cittam sakadāgāmi magga cittam anāgāmi magga cittam arahatta magga cittam ca iti imāni cattāri pi lokuttara kusala cittāni nāma

original: 32. Sotāpattiphalacittaṃ, sakadāgāmiphalacittaṃ, anāgāmiphalacittaṃ, arahattaphalacittañceti imāni cattāripi lokuttaravipākacittāni nāma.
analyzed: sa utāpatti phala cittam sakadāgāmi phala cittam anāgāmi phala cittam arahatta phala cittam ca iti imāni cattāri pi lokuttara vipāka cittāni nāma

original: 33. Iccevaṃ sabbathāpi aṭṭha lokuttarakusalavipākacittāni samattāni.
analyzed: icc evam sabbathā api aṭṭha lokuttara kusala vipāka cittāni samattāni

original: 34. Catumaggappabhedena, catudhā kusalaṃ tathā.
analyzed: catu magga ppabhedena catudhā kusalam tathā

original: Pākaṃ tassa phalattāti, aṭṭhadhānuttaraṃ mataṃ.
analyzed: pākam tassa phalattā ati aṭṭhadhā anuttaram matam

original: Cittagaṇanasaṅgaho
35. Dvādasākusalānevaṃ, kusalānekavīsati.
analyzed: dvādasa akusalān evam kusalān ekavīsati

original: Chattiṃseva vipākāni, kriyacittāni vīsati.
analyzed: chattiṃsa iva vipākāni kriya cittāni vīsati

original: 36. Catupaññāsadhā kāme, rūpe pannarasīraye.
analyzed: catupaññāsadhā kāme rūpe pannarasīraye

original: Cittāni dvādasāruppe, aṭṭhadhānuttare tathā.
analyzed: cittāni dvādaśa āruppe aṭṭhadhā anuttare tathā

original: 37. Itthamekūnanavutipabhedaṃ pana mānasaṃ.
analyzed: ittham ekūna navuti pa bhedam pana mānasam

original: Ekavīsasataṃ vātha, vibhajanti vicakkhaṇā.
analyzed: ekavīsa satam vā atha vibhajanti vicakkhaṇā

original: Vitthāragaṇanā
analyzed: vitthāra gaṇanā

original: 38. Kathamekūnanavutividhaṃ cittaṃ ekavīsasataṃ hoti? Vitakkavicārapītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ
analyzed: katham ekūna navutividham cittam ekavīsa satam hoti vitakka vicāra pīti sukha ekagga tā sahitam

original: paṭhamajjhānasotāpattimaggacittaṃ, vicārapītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ dutiyajjhānasotāpattimaggacittaṃ,
analyzed: paṭhama jhāna sotāpatti magga cittam vicāra pīti sukha ikagga tā sahitam dutiya jhāna sotāpatti magga cittam

original: pītisukhekaggatāsahitaṃ tatiyajjhānasotāpattimaggacittaṃ, sukhekaggatāsahitaṃ catutthajjhānasotāpattimaggacittaṃ,
analyzed: pīti sukha ikagga tā sahitam tatiya jhāna sotāpatti magga cittam sukha ekagga tā sahitam catuttha jhāna sotāpatti magga cittam

original: upekkhekaggatāsahitaṃ pañcamajjhānasotāpattimaggacittañceti imāni pañcapi sotāpattimaggacittāni nāma.
analyzed: upekkhā ikagga tā sahitam pañcama jhāna sotāpatti magga cittam ca iti imāni pañca api sotāpatti magga cittāni nāma

original: 39. Tathā sakadāgāmimaggaanāgāmimaggaarahattamaggacittañceti samavīsati maggacittāni.
analyzed: tathā sakadāgāmi magga anāgāmi magga arahatta magga cittam ca iti sama vīsati magga cittāni

original: 40. Tathā phalacittāni ceti samacattālīsa lokuttaracittāni bhavantīti.
analyzed: tathā phala cittāni ca iti lokuttara cittāni bhavanti iti

original: 41. Jhānaṅgayogabhedena, katvekekantu pañcadhā.
analyzed: pañcadhā

original: Vuccatānuttaraṃ cittaṃ, cattālīsavidhanti ca.
analyzed: vuccatā anuttaram cittam cattālīsavidhanti ca

original: 42. Yathā ca rūpāvacaraṃ, gayhatānuttaraṃ tathā.
analyzed: yathā ca rūpāvacaram tathā

original: Paṭhamādijhānabhede, āruppañcāpi pañcame.
analyzed: paṭhama ādi jhāna bhede pañcame

original: Ekādasavidhaṃ tasmā, paṭhamādikamīritaṃ;
analyzed: ekādasavidham paṭhama ādikam īritam

original: Jhānamekekamante tu, tevīsatividhaṃ bhave.
analyzed: jhānam ekekam ante tu tevīsatividham bhave

original: 43. Sattatiṃsavidhaṃ puññaṃ, dvipaññāsavidhaṃ tathā.
analyzed: sattatiṃsavidham puññam dvipaññāsavidham tathā

original: Pākamiccāhu cittāni, ekavīsasataṃ budhā.
analyzed: pākam icca āhu cittāni ekavīsa satam budhāḥ

original: Iti abhidhammatthasaṅgahe cittasaṅgahavibhāgo nāma
analyzed: iti abhidhamma ttha saṅgahe cittasaṅgahavibhāgaḥ nāma

original: Paṭhamo paricchedo.
analyzed: paṭhamaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: 2. Cetasikaparicchedo
analyzed: cetasika paricchedaḥ

original: Sampayogalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: sampayoga lakkhaṇam

original: 1. Ekuppādanirodhā ca, ekālambaṇavatthukā.
analyzed: eka uppāda nirodhā ca eka ālambaṇa vatthukā

original: Cetoyuttā dvipaññāsa, dhammā cetasikā matā.
analyzed: cetaḥ yuttā dvipaññāsa dhammā cetasikā matā

original: Aññasamānacetasikaṃ
analyzed: añña samāna cetasikam

original: 2. Kathaṃ? Phasso vedanā saññā cetanā ekaggatā jīvitindriyaṃ manasikāro ceti sattime cetasikā sabbacittasādhāraṇā nāma.
analyzed: katham phassaḥ vedanā saññā cetanā ekagga tā jīvitindriyam manasikāro ca iti satti ime cetasikā sabba citta sādhāraṇā nāma

original: 3. Vitakko vicāro adhimokkho vīriyaṃ pīti chando cāti cha ime cetasikā pakiṇṇakā nāma.
analyzed: vitakkaḥ vicāraḥ adhimokkhaḥ vīriyam pīti chando ca ati cha ime cetasikāḥ pakiṇṇakāḥ nāma

original: 4. Evamete terasa cetasikā aññasamānāti veditabbā.
analyzed: evam ete terasa cetasikāḥ añña samānā ati veditabbā

original: Akusalacetasikaṃ
analyzed: akusala cetasikam

original: 5. Moho ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ uddhaccaṃ lobho diṭṭhi māno doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinaṃ middhaṃ vicikicchā ceti cuddasime cetasikā akusalā nāma.
analyzed: mohaḥ ahirikam anottappam uddhaccam lobho diṭṭhi mānaḥ dosaḥ issā macchariyam kukkuccam thinam middham vicikicchā ca iti cuddasime cetasikāḥ akusalāḥ nāma

original: Sobhanacetasikaṃ
analyzed: sobhana cetasikam

original: 6. Saddhā sati hirī ottappaṃ alobho adoso tatramajjhattatā kāyapassaddhi cittapassaddhi
analyzed: saddhā sati hirī ottappam alobhaḥ adosaḥ tatram ajjhatta tā kāya passaddhi citta passaddhi

original: kāyalahutā cittalahutā kāyamudutā cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā cittakammaññatā kāyapāguññatā
analyzed: kāya lahu tā citta lahu tā kāya mudu tā citta mudu tā kāya kammañña tā citta kammañña tā kāya pāguñña tā

original: cittapāguññatā kāyujukatā cittujukatā ceti ekūnavīsatime cetasikā sobhanasādhāraṇā nāma.
analyzed: citta pāguñña tā kāyujuka tā cittujuka tā ca iti ekūnavīsatime cetasikā sobhanasādhāraṇā nāma

original: 7. Sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo ceti tisso viratiyo nāma.
analyzed: sammā vācā sammā kammanto sammā ājīvo ca iti tisso viratiyaḥ nāma

original: 8. Karuṇā muditā appamaññāyo nāmāti sabbathāpi paññindriyena saddhiṃ pañcavīsatime cetasikā sobhanāti veditabbā.
analyzed: karuṇā muditā appamaññāyaḥ nāma ati sabbathā api paññindriyena saddhim pañcavīsatime cetasikā sobhanā ati veditabbā

original: 9. Ettāvatā ca –
analyzed: ettāvatā ca

original: Terasaññasamānā ca, cuddasākusalā tathā;
analyzed: ca cuddasa akusalā tathā

original: Sobhanā pañcavīsāti, dvipaññāsa pavuccare.
analyzed: sobhanā pañcavīsā ati dvipaññāsa

original: Sampayoganayo
analyzed: sampa yoga nayoḥ

original: 10. Tesaṃ cittāviyuttānaṃ, yathāyogamito paraṃ.
analyzed: tesam citta aviyuttānam yathāyogam itas param

original: Cittuppādesu paccekaṃ, sampayogo pavuccati.
analyzed: cittuppādesu paccekam sampayogaḥ pavuccati

original: 11. Satta sabbattha yujjanti, yathāyogaṃ pakiṇṇakā.
analyzed: satta sabbattha yujjanti yathāyogam pakiṇṇakā

original: Cuddasākusalesveva, sobhanesveva sobhanā.
analyzed: cud dasā akusalesu eva sobhanesu eva sobhanā

original: Aññasamānacetasikasampayoganayo
analyzed: añña samāna cetasika sampa yoganayo

original: 12. Kathaṃ? Sabbacittasādhāraṇā tāva sattime cetasikā sabbesupi ekūnanavuticittuppādesu labbhanti.
analyzed: katham sabba citta sādhāraṇā tāva sabbesu pi ekūnanavuti cittuppādesu labbhanti

original: 13. Pakiṇṇakesu pana vitakko tāva dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitakāmāvacaracittesu ceva ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānacittesu ceti pañcapaññāsacittesu uppajjati.
analyzed: pakiṇṇakesu pana vitakko tāva dvi pañca viññāṇa vajjita kāmāvacara cittesu ca iva ekādasasu paṭhama jhāna cittesu ca iti pañca paññāsa cittesu uppajjati

original: 14. Vicāro pana tesu ceva ekādasasu dutiyajjhānacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu.
analyzed: vicāraḥ pana tesu ca iva ekādasasu dutiya jhāna cittesu ca ati cha saṭṭhi cittesu

original: 15. Adhimokkho dvipañcaviññāṇavicikicchāsahagatavajjitacittesu.
analyzed: adhimokkhaḥ dvi pañca viññāṇa vicikicchā sahagata vat jita cittesu

original: 16. Vīriyaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanadvipañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇavajjitacittesu.
analyzed: vīriyam pañca dvāra āvajjana dvi pañca viññāṇa sampaṭicchana santīraṇa vajjita cittesu

original: 17. Pīti domanassupekkhāsahagatakāyaviññāṇacatutthajjhānavajjitacittesu.
analyzed: pīti domanassa upekkhā sahagata kāya viññāṇa catuttha jjhāna vajjita cittesu

original: 18. Chando ahetukamomūhavajjitacittesūti.
analyzed: chandaḥ ahetuka momūha vat jita cittesu iti

original: 19. Te pana cittuppādā yathākkamaṃ –
analyzed: te pana cittuppādāḥ yathākkamam

original: Chasaṭṭhi pañcapaññāsa, ekādasa ca soḷasa;
analyzed: pañcapaññāsaḥ ekādasa ca soḷasa

original: Sattati vīsati ceva, pakiṇṇakavivajjitā.
analyzed: sattati vīsati ca iva pakiṇṇaka vivajjitā

original: Pañcapaññāsa chasaṭṭhiṭṭhasattati tisattati;
analyzed: pañca paññāsa cha saṭṭhi ṭha sattati ti sattati

original: Ekapaññāsa cekūnasattati sapakiṇṇakā.
analyzed: ekapaññāsa sa pakiṇṇakā

original: Akusalacetasikasampayoganayo
analyzed: akusala cetasika sampa yoganayoḥ

original: 20. Akusalesu pana moho ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ uddhaccañcāti cattārome cetasikā sabbākusalasādhāraṇā nāma, sabbesupi dvādasā kusalesu labbhanti.
analyzed: akusalesu pana mohaḥ ahirikam anottappam uddhaccam ca ati cattāro me cetasikā sabba akusala sādhāraṇā nāma sabbesu pi dvādasā kusalesu labbhanti

original: 21. Lobho aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatacittesveva labbhati.
analyzed: lobhaḥ aṭṭhasu lobha sahagata cittesu eva labbhati

original: 22. Diṭṭhi catūsu diṭṭhigatasampayuttesu.
analyzed: diṭṭhi catūsu diṭṭhi gata sampayuttesu

original: 23. Māno catūsu diṭṭhigatavippayuttesu.
analyzed: māno catūsu diṭṭhigata vippayuttesu

original: 24. Doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccañcāti dvīsu paṭighasampayuttacittesu.
analyzed: dosaḥ issā macchariyam kukkuccam ca ati dvīsu paṭigha sampayutta cittesu

original: 25. Thinamiddhaṃ pañcasu sasaṅkhārikacittesu.
analyzed: thinamiddham pañcasu sasaṅkhārika cittesu

original: 26. Vicikicchā vicikicchāsahagatacitteyevāti.
analyzed: vicikicchā vicikicchā sahagata cittā iya iva ati

original: 27. Sabbāpuññesu cattāro,
analyzed: sabba apuññesu cattāraḥ

original: Lobhamūle tayo gatā;
analyzed: lobha mūle tayaḥ gatā

original: Dosamūlesu cattāro,
analyzed: dosa mūlesu cattāro

original: Sasaṅkhāre dvayaṃ tathā.
analyzed: sa saṅkhāre dvayam tathā

original: Vicikicchā vicikicchā-citte cāti catuddasa;
analyzed: vicikicchā vicikicchā citte ca ati catuddasa

original: Dvādasākulesveva, sampayujjanti pañcadhā.
analyzed: dvādasā a kulesu eva sampayujjanti pañcadhā

original: Sobhanacetasikasampayoganayo
analyzed: sobhana cetasika sampa yoganayo

original: 28. Sobhanesu pana sobhanasādhāraṇā tāva ekūnavīsatime cetasikā sabbesupi ekūnasaṭṭhisobhanacittesu saṃvijjanti.
analyzed: sobhanesu pana sobhana sādhāraṇā tāva ekūnavīsatime cetasikā sabbesu pi ekūna saṭṭhi sobhana cittesu saṃvijjanti

original: 29. Viratiyo pana tissopi lokuttaracittesu sabbathāpi niyatā ekatova labbhanti, lokiyesu pana kāmāvacarakusalesveva kadāci sandissanti visuṃ visuṃ.
analyzed: viratiyaḥ pana tissaḥ api lokuttara cittesu sabbathā api niyatāḥ ekatas va labbhanti lokiyesu pana kāmāvacara kusalesu eva kadāci sandissanti visum visum

original: 30. Appamaññāyo pana dvādasasu pañcamajjhānavajjitamahaggatacittesu ceva kāmāvacarakusalesu
analyzed: pana dvādasasu pañcama jhāna vajjita mahaggata cittesu ca iva kāmāvacara kusalesu

original: ca sahetukakāmāvacarakiriyacittesu cāti aṭṭhavīsaticittesveva kadāci nānā hutvā jāyanti,
analyzed: ca sa hetuka kāmāvacara kiriya cittesu ca ati aṭṭhavīsati cittesu eva kadāci nānā hutvā jāyanti

original: upekkhāsahagatesu panettha karuṇāmuditā na santīti keci vadanti.
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatesu pana ittha karuṇā muditāḥ na santi iti keci vadanti

original: 31. Paññā pana dvādasasu ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacaracittesu ceva sabbesupi pañcatiṃsamahaggatalokuttaracittesu cāti sattacattālīsacittesu sampayogaṃ gacchatīti.
analyzed: paññā pana dvādasasu ñāṇa sampayutta kāmāvacara cittesu ca iva sabbesu pi pañcatiṃsa mahaggata lokuttara cittesu ca ati satta cattālīsa cittesu sampayogam gacchati iti

original: 32. Ekūnavīsati dhammā, jāyantekūnasaṭṭhisu.
analyzed: ekūnavīsati dhammāḥ jāyantā ekūna saṭṭhisu

original: Tayo soḷasacittesu, aṭṭhavīsatiyaṃ dvayaṃ.
analyzed: tayo soḷasa cittesu aṭṭhavīsatiyam dvayam

original: Paññā pakāsitā, sattacattālīsavidhesupi;
analyzed: paññā pakāsitā satta cattālīsa vidhesu pi

original: Sampayuttā catudhevaṃ, sobhanesveva sobhanā.
analyzed: sampayuttā catudhā ivam sobhanesu eva sobhanā

original: 33. Issāmaccherakukkucca-viratikaruṇādayo.
analyzed: issā macchera kukkucca virati karuṇā ādayaḥ

original: Nānā kadāci māno ca, thina middhaṃ tathā saha.
analyzed: nānā kadācid ca tathā saha

original: 34. Yathāvuttānusārena, sesā niyatayogino.
analyzed: yathā vutta anusārena sesāḥ niyata yoginaḥ

original: Saṅgahañca pavakkhāmi, tesaṃ dāni yathārahaṃ.
analyzed: saṅgaham ca pavakkhāmi tesam dāni yathāraham

original: Saṅgahanayo
analyzed: saṅga hanayoḥ

original: 35. Chattiṃsānuttare dhammā, pañcatiṃsa mahaggate.
analyzed: chattiṃsa anuttare dhammā pañcatiṃsa mahaggate

original: Aṭṭhatiṃsāpi labbhanti, kāmāvacarasobhane.
analyzed: aṭṭhatiṃsā api labbhanti kāmāvacara sobhane

original: Sattavīsatipuññamhi, dvādasāhetuketi ca;
analyzed: sattavīsati puññamhi dvādasa ahetukā iti ca

original: Yathāsambhavayogena, pañcadhā tattha saṅgaho.
analyzed: yathā sambhava yogena pañcadhā tattha saṅgahaḥ

original: Lokuttaracittasaṅgahanayo
36. Kathaṃ? Lokuttaresu tāva aṭṭhasu paṭhamajjhānikacittesu aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
analyzed: katham lokuttaresu tāva aṭṭhasu paṭhamajjhānika cittesu añña samānā terasa cetasikā

original: appamaññāvajjitā tevīsati sobhanacetasikā ceti chattiṃsa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
analyzed: appamaññā vajjitā tevīsati sobhana cetasikā ca iti chattiṃsa dhammā saṅgaham gacchanti

original: tathā dutiyajjhānikacittesu vitakkavajjā, tatiyajjhānikacittesu vitakkavicāravajjā,
analyzed: tathā dutiya jhānika cittesu vitakka vajjā tatiya jhānika cittesu vitakka vicāra vajjā

original: catutthajjhānikacittesu vitakkavicārapītivajjā, pañcamajjhānikacittesupi upekkhāsahagatā
analyzed: catuttha jhānika cittesu vitakka vicāra pīti vajjā pañcama jhānika cittesu pi upekkhā sahagatā

original: te eva saṅgayhantīti sabbathāpi aṭṭhasu lokuttaracittesu pañcakajjhānavasena pañcadhāva saṅgaho hotīti.
analyzed: te eva saṅgayhanti iti sabbathā api aṭṭhasu lokuttara cittesu pañcaka jjhāna vasena pañcadhā ava saṅgahaḥ hoti iti

original: 37. Chattiṃsa pañcatiṃsa ca, catuttiṃsa yathākkamaṃ.
analyzed: chattiṃsa pañcatiṃsa ca catuttiṃsa yathākkamam

original: Tettiṃsadvayamiccevaṃ, pañcadhānuttare ṭhitā.
analyzed: tettiṃsa dvayam id ca ivam pañcadhā anuttare ṭhitā

original: Mahaggatacittasaṅgahanayo
analyzed: mahaggata citta saṅgahanayaḥ

original: 38. Mahaggatesu pana tīsu paṭhamajjhānikacittesu tāva aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
analyzed: mahaggatesu pana tīsu paṭhamajjhānika cittesu tāva añña samānā terasa cetasikā

original: viratittayavajjitā dvāvīsati sobhanacetasikā ceti pañcatiṃsa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
analyzed: virati ttaya vajjitā dvāvīsati sobhana cetasikā ca iti pañcatiṃsa dhammā saṅgaham gacchanti

original: karuṇāmuditā panettha paccekameva yojetabbā, tathā dutiyajjhānikacittesu vitakkavajjā,
analyzed: karuṇā muditā pana ittha paccekam eva yojetabbā tathā dutiya jhānika cittesu vitakka vajjā

original: tatiyajjhānikacittesu vitakkavicāravajjā, catutthajjhānikacittesu vitakkavicārapītivajjā,
analyzed: tatiya jhānika cittesu vitakka vicāra vajjā catuttha jhānika cittesu vitakka vicāra pīti vajjā

original: pañcamajjhānikacittesu pana pannarasasu appamaññāyo na labbhantīti sabbathāpi sattavīsatimahaggatacittesu
analyzed: pañcamajjhānika cittesu pana pannarasasu appamaññāyaḥ na labbhanti iti sabbathā api sattavīsati mahaggata cittesu

original: pañcakajjhānavasena pañcadhāva saṅgaho hotīti.
analyzed: pañcakajjhāna vasena pañcadhā ava saṅgahaḥ hoti iti

original: 39. Pañcatiṃsa catuttiṃsa, tettiṃsa ca yathākkamaṃ.
analyzed: pañcatiṃsa catuttiṃsa tettiṃsa ca yathākkamam

original: Bāttiṃsa ceva tiṃseti, pañcadhāva mahaggate.
analyzed: ca iva tiṃsā iti pañcadhā ava mahaggate

original: Kāmāvacarasobhanacittasaṅgahanayo
analyzed: kāma avacara sobhana citta saṅgahanayoḥ

original: 40. Kāmāvacarasobhanesu pana kusalesu tāva paṭhamadvaye aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
analyzed: kāmāvacara sobhanesu pana kusalesu tāva paṭhama dvaye cetasikā

original: pañcavīsati sobhanacetasikā ceti aṭṭhatiṃsa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti, appamaññāviratiyo
analyzed: pañcavīsati sobhana cetasikā ca iti aṭṭhatiṃsa dhammā saṅgaham gacchanti appamaññā viratiyo

original: panettha pañcapi paccekameva yojetabbā, tathā dutiyadvaye ñāṇavajjitā, tatiyadvaye
analyzed: pana ittha pañca api paccekam eva yojetabbā tathā dutiya dvaye ñāṇa vajjitā tatiya dvaye

original: ñāṇasampayuttā pītivajjitā, catutthadvaye ñāṇapītivajjitā te eva saṅgayhanti. Kiriyacittesupi
analyzed: ñāṇa sampayuttā pīti vajjitā catuttha dvaye ñāṇa pīti vajjitā te eva saṅgayhanti kiriya cittesu pi

original: virativajjitā tatheva catūsupi dukesu catudhāva saṅgayhanti. Tathā vipākesu ca appamaññāvirativajjitā
analyzed: virati vajjitā tathā iva catūsu pi dukesu catudhā ava saṅgayhanti tathā vipākesu ca appamaññā virati vajjitā

original: te eva saṅgayhantīti sabbathāpi catuvīsatikāmāvacarasobhanacittesu dukavasena dvādasadhāva saṅgaho hotīti.
analyzed: te eva saṅgayhanti iti sabbathā api catuvīsati kāmāvacara sobhana cittesu duka vasena dvādasadhā ava saṅgahaḥ hoti iti

original: 41. Aṭṭhatiṃsa sattatiṃsa, dvayaṃ chattiṃsakaṃ subhe.
analyzed: dvayam chattiṃsakam subhe

original: Pañcatiṃsa catuttiṃsa, dvayaṃ tettiṃsakaṃ kriye;
analyzed: dvayam tettiṃsakam kriye

original: Tettiṃsa pāke bāttiṃsa, dvayekatiṃsakaṃ bhave;
analyzed: pāke dvaya ekatiṃsakam bhave

original: Sahetukāmāvacarapuñña-pākakriyāmane.
analyzed: sa hetu kāma avacara puñña pāka kriyā mane

original: 42. Navijjantettha viratī, kriyesu ca mahaggate.
analyzed: viratī kriyesu ca mahaggate

original: Anuttare appamaññā, kāmapāke dvayaṃ tathā;
analyzed: anuttare appamaññā kāmapāke dvayam tathā

original: Anuttare jhānadhammā, appamaññā ca majjhime;
analyzed: anuttare jhāna dhammāḥ appamaññā ca majjhime

original: Viratī ñāṇapītī ca, parittesu visesakā.
analyzed: viratī ñāṇa pītī ca parittesu visesakā

original: Akusalacittasaṅgahanayo
analyzed: akusala citta saṅgahanayo

original: 43. Akusalesu pana lobhamūlesu tāva paṭhame asaṅkhārike aññasamānā terasa cetasikā,
analyzed: akusalesu pana lobha mūlesu tāva paṭhame asaṅkhārike añña samānā terasa cetasikā

original: akusalasādhāraṇā cattāro cāti sattarasa lobhadiṭṭhīhi saddhiṃ ekūnavīsati dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
analyzed: akusala sādhāraṇā cattāro ca ati sattarasa lobha diṭṭhīhi saddhim ekūnavīsati dhammā saṅgaham gacchanti

original: 44. Tatheva dutiye asaṅkhārike lobhamānena.
analyzed: tathā iva dutiye asaṅkhārike lobha mānena

original: 45. Tatiye tatheva pītivajjitā lobhadiṭṭhīhi saha aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: tatiye tathā iva pīti vajjitāḥ lobha diṭṭhīhi saha aṭṭhārasa

original: 46. Catutthe tatheva lobhamānena.
analyzed: catutthe tathā iva lobhamānena

original: 47. Pañcame pana paṭighasampayutte asaṅkhārike doso issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccañcāti
analyzed: pañcame pana paṭigha sampayutte asaṅkhārike dosaḥ issā macchariyam kukkuccam ca ati

original: catūhi saddhiṃ pītivajjitā te eva vīsati dhammā saṅgayhanti, issāmacchariyakukkuccāni
analyzed: catūhi saddhim pītivajjitā te eva vīsati dhammā saṅgayhanti issā macchariya kukkuccāni

original: panettha paccekameva yojetabbāni.
analyzed: pana ittha paccekam eva yojetabbāni

original: 48. Sasaṅkhārikapañcakepi tatheva thinamiddhena visesetvā yojetabbā.
analyzed: sa saṅkhārika pañcake pi tathā iva thinamiddhena visesetvā yojetabbā

original: 49. Chandapītivajjitā pana aññasamānā ekādasa, akusalasādhāraṇā cattāro cāti pannarasa dhammā uddhaccasahagate sampayujjanti.
analyzed: chanda pīti vajjitā pana añña samānāḥ ekādasa akusala sādhāraṇāḥ cattāro ca ati pannarasa dhammāḥ uddhacca sahagate sampayujjanti

original: 50. Vicikicchāsahagatacitte ca adhimokkhavirahitā vicikicchāsahagatā tatheva pannarasa
analyzed: vicikicchā sahagata citte ca adhimokkha virahitā vicikicchā sahagatā tathā iva pannarasa

original: dhammā samupalabbhantīti sabbathāpi dvādasākusalacittuppādesu paccekaṃ yojiyamānāpi
analyzed: dhammā samupalabbhanti iti sabbathā api dvādasa akusala cittuppādesu paccekam yojiyamānā api

original: gaṇanavasena sattadhāva saṅgahitā bhavantīti.
analyzed: gaṇana vasena sattadhā ava saṅgahitāḥ bhavanti iti

original: 51. Ekūnavīsāṭṭhārasa, vīsekavīsa vīsati.
analyzed: ekūnavīsa aṭṭhārasa vīsa ekavīsa vīsati

original: Dvāvīsa pannaraseti, sattadhā kusaleṭhitā.
analyzed: dvāvīsa pannarasā iti sattadhā kusala iṭhitā

original: 52. Sādhāraṇā ca cattāro, samānā ca dasāpare.
analyzed: sādhāraṇā ca cattāraḥ samānā ca dasā apare

original: Cuddasete pavuccanti, sabbākusalayogino.
analyzed: sabba akusala yoginaḥ

original: Ahetukacittasaṅgahanayo
analyzed: ahetuka citta saṅgahanayoḥ

original: 53. Ahetukesu pana hasanacitte tāva chandavajjitā aññasamānā dvādasa dhammā saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
analyzed: ahetukesu pana hasana citte tāva chanda vajjitāḥ añña samānāḥ dvādasa dhammā saṅgaham gacchanti

original: 54. Tathā voṭṭhabbane chandapītivajjitā.
analyzed: tathā voṭṭhabbane chanda pīti vajjitā

original: 55. Sukhasantīraṇe chandavīriyavajjitā.
56. Manodhātuttikāhetukapaṭisandhiyugaḷe chandapītivīriyavajjitā.
57. Dvipañcaviññāṇe pakiṇṇakavajjitā teyeva saṅgayhantīti sabbathāpi aṭṭhārasasu ahetukesu gaṇanavasena catudhāva saṅgaho hotīti.
analyzed: dvi pañca viññāṇe te yeva saṅgayhanti iti sabbathā api aṭṭhārasasu ahetukesu gaṇana vasena catudhā ava saṅgahaḥ hoti iti

original: 58. Dvādasekādasa dasa, satta cāti catubbidho.
analyzed: dvādasa ekādasa dasa satta ca ati catubbidhaḥ

original: Aṭṭhārasāhetukesu, cittuppādesu saṅgaho.
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa ahetukesu cittuppādesu saṅgahaḥ

original: 59. Ahetukesu sabbattha, satta sesā yathārahaṃ.
analyzed: ahetukesu sabbattha satta sesāḥ yathāraham

original: Iti vitthārato vutto, tettiṃsavidhasaṅgaho.
analyzed: iti vitthārataḥ vutto tettiṃsavidha saṅgahaḥ

original: 60. Itthaṃ cittāviyuttānaṃ, sampayogañca saṅgahaṃ.
analyzed: ittham sampayogam ca saṅgaham

original: Ñatvā bhedaṃ yathāyogaṃ, cittena samamuddise.
analyzed: ñatvā bhedam yathāyogam cittena samam uddise

original: Iti abhidhammatthasaṅgahe cetasikasaṅgahavibhāgo nāma
analyzed: iti abhidhamma attha saṅgahe cetasikasaṅgahavibhāgaḥ nāma

original: Dutiyo paricchedo.
analyzed: dutiyaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: 3. Pakiṇṇakaparicchedo
analyzed: pakiṇṇaka paricchedaḥ

original: 1. Sampayuttā yathāyogaṃ, tepaññāsa sabhāvato.
analyzed: sampayuttāḥ yathāyogam tepaññāsa sabhāvataḥ

original: Cittacetasikā dhammā, tesaṃ dāni yathārahaṃ.
analyzed: citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ tesam dāni yathāraham

original: 2. Vedanāhetuto kiccadvārālambaṇavatthuto.
analyzed: vedanā hetutaḥ kicca dvāra ālambaṇa vatthutaḥ

original: Cittuppādavaseneva, saṅgaho nāma nīyate.
analyzed: cittuppāda vasena iva saṅgahaḥ nāma nīyate

original: Vedanāsaṅgaho
analyzed: vedanā saṅgaho

original: 3. Tattha vedanāsaṅgahe tāva tividhā vedanā sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ adukkhamasukhā ceti, sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ somanassaṃ domanassaṃ upekkhāti ca bhedena pana pañcadhā hoti.
analyzed: tattha vedanā saṅgahe tāva tividhā vedanā sukham dukkham adukkham asukhā ca iti sukham dukkham somanassam domanassam upekkhā ati ca bhedena pana pañcadhā hoti

original: 4. Tattha sukhasahagataṃ kusalavipākaṃ kāyaviññāṇamekameva, tathā dukkhasahagataṃ akusalavipākaṃ.
analyzed: tattha sukha sahagatam kusala vipākam kāya viññāṇam ekam eva tathā dukkha sahagatam akusala vipākam

original: 5. Somanassasahagatacittāni pana lobhamūlāni cattāri, dvādasa kāmāvacarasobhanāni,
analyzed: somanassa sahagata cittāni pana lobha mūlāni cattāri dvādasa kāmāvacara sobhanāni

original: sukhasantīraṇahasanāni ca dveti aṭṭhārasa kāmāvacarasomanassasahagatacittāni ceva
analyzed: sukha santīraṇa hasanāni ca dve iti aṭṭhārasa kāmāvacara somanassa sahagata cittāni ca iva

original: paṭhamadutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānasaṅkhātāni catucattālīsa mahaggatalokuttaracittāni
analyzed: paṭhama dutiya tatiya catuttha jjhāna saṅkhātāni catucattālīsa mahaggata lokuttara cittāni

original: ceti dvāsaṭṭhividhāni bhavanti.
analyzed: ca iti dvāsaṭṭhividhāni bhavanti

original: 6. Domanassasahagatacittāni pana dve paṭighasampayuttacittāneva.
analyzed: domanassa sahagata cittāni pana dve

original: 7. Sesāni sabbānipi pañcapaññāsa upekkhāsahagatacittānevāti.
analyzed: sesāni sabbāni pi pañcapaññāsaḥ upekkhā sahagata cittāni eva ati

original: 8. Sukhaṃ dukkhamupekkhāti, tividhā tattha vedanā.
analyzed: sukham dukkham upekkhā ati tividhā tattha vedanā

original: Somanassaṃ domanassamitibhedena pañcadhā.
analyzed: somanassam domanassam iti bhedena pañcadhā

original: 9. Sukhamekattha dukkhañca, domanassaṃ dvaye ṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: sukham ekattha dukkham ca domanassam dvaye ṭhitam

original: Dvāsaṭṭhīsu somanassaṃ, pañcapaññāsaketarā.
analyzed: dvāsaṭṭhīsu somanassam pañca paññāsaka itarā

original: Hetusaṅgaho
analyzed: hetu saṅgahaḥ

original: 10. Hetusaṅgahe hetū nāma lobho doso moho alobho adoso amoho cāti chabbidhā bhavanti.
analyzed: hetu saṅgahe hetū nāma lobhaḥ dosaḥ mohaḥ a lobhaḥ a dosaḥ a mohaḥ ca ati chabbidhāḥ bhavanti

original: 11. Tattha pañcadvārāvajjanadvipañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanahasanavasena ahetukacittāni nāma.
analyzed: tattha ahetuka cittāni nāma

original: 12. Sesāni sabbānipi ekasattati cittāni sahetukāneva.
analyzed: sesāni sabbāni api ekasattati cittāni sa hetukāna eva

original: 13. Tatthāpi dve momūhacittāni ekahetukāni.
analyzed: tattha api dve momūha cittāni eka hetukāni

original: 14. Sesāni dasa akusalacittāni ceva ñāṇavippayuttāni dvādasa kāmāvacarasobhanāni ceti dvāvīsati dvihetukacittāni.
analyzed: sesāni dasa akusala cittāni ca iva ñāṇa vippayuttāni dvādasa kāmāvacara sobhanāni ca iti dvāvīsati dvi hetuka cittāni

original: 15. Dvādasa ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacarasobhanāni ceva pañcatiṃsa mahaggatalokuttaracittāni ceti sattacattālīsa tihetukacittānīti.
analyzed: dvādasa ñāṇa sampayutta kāmāvacara sobhanāni ca iva pañcatiṃsa mahaggata lokuttara cittāni ca iti sattacattālīsa ti hetuka cittāni iti

original: 16. Lobho doso ca moho ca,
analyzed: lobhaḥ doso ca moho ca

original: Hetū akusalā tayo;
analyzed: hetū akusalā tayo

original: Alobhādosāmoho ca,
analyzed: a lobhā dosā mohaḥ ca

original: Kusalābyākatā tathā.
analyzed: tathā

original: 17. Ahetukāṭṭhārasekahetukā dve dvāvīsati.
analyzed: ahetuka aṭṭhārasa ikahetukāḥ dve dvāvīsati

original: Dvihetukā matā sattacattālīsatihetukā.
analyzed: dvi hetukā matā satta cattālīsati hetukā

original: Kiccasaṅgaho
analyzed: kit ca saṅgahaḥ

original: 18. Kiccasaṅgahe kiccāni nāma paṭisandhibhavaṅgāvajjanadassanasavanaghāyanasāyanaphusanasampaṭicchanasantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanajavanatadārammaṇacutivasena cuddasavidhāni bhavanti.
analyzed: kicca saṅgahe kiccāni nāma cuddasavidhāni bhavanti

original: 19. Paṭisandhibhavaṅgāvajjanapañcaviññāṇaṭhānādivasena pana tesaṃ dasadhā ṭhānabhedo veditabbo.
20. Tattha dve upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇāni ceva aṭṭha mahāvipākāni ca nava rūpārūpavipākāni ceti ekūnavīsati cittāni paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutikiccāni nāma.
analyzed: tattha dve upekkhā sahagata santīraṇāni ca iva aṭṭha mahā vipākāni ca nava rūpa arūpa vipākāni ca iti ekūnavīsati cittāni paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti kiccāni nāma

original: 21. Āvajjanakiccāni pana dve.
analyzed: āvajjana kiccāni pana dve

original: 22. Tathā dassanasavanaghāyanasāyanaphusanasampaṭicchanakiccāni ca.
analyzed: tathā dassana savana ghāyana sāyana phusana sampaṭicchana kiccāni ca

original: 23. Tīṇi santīraṇakiccāni.
analyzed: tīṇi santīraṇa kiccāni

original: 24. Manodvārāvajjanameva pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādheti.
analyzed: manaḥ dvāra āvajjanam eva pañca dvāre voṭṭhabbana kiccam sādha iti

original: 25. Āvajjanadvayavajjitāni kusalākusalaphalakiriyacittāni pañcapaññāsa javanakiccāni.
analyzed: āvajjana dvaya vajjitāni kusala akusala phala kiriya cittāni pañca paññāsa javana kiccāni

original: 26. Aṭṭha mahāvipākāni ceva santīraṇattayañceti ekādasa tadārammaṇakiccāni.
analyzed: aṭṭha mahā vipākāni ca iva ekādasa tad ārammaṇa kiccāni

original: 27. Tesu pana dve upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇacittāni paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇasantīraṇavasena pañcakiccāni nāma.
analyzed: tesu pana dve upekkhā sahagata santīraṇa cittāni paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti tad ārammaṇa santīraṇa vasena pañca kiccāni nāma

original: 28. Mahāvipākāni aṭṭha paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇavasena catukiccāni nāma.
analyzed: mahā vipākāni aṭṭha paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti tad ārammaṇa vasena catu kiccāni nāma

original: 29. Mahaggatavipākāni nava paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena tikiccāni nāma.
analyzed: mahaggata vipākāni nava paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena tikiccāni nāma

original: 30. Somanassasantīraṇaṃ santīraṇatadārammaṇavasena dukiccaṃ.
analyzed: somanassa santīraṇam santīraṇa tad ārammaṇa vasena dukkiccam

original: 31. Tathā voṭṭhabbanaṃ voṭṭhabbanāvajjanavasena.
analyzed: tathā voṭṭhabbanam voṭṭhabbana āvajjana vasena

original: 32. Sesāni pana sabbānipi javanamanodhātuttikadvipañcaviññāṇāni yathāsambhavamekakiccānīti.
analyzed: sesāni pana sabbāni pi javana manaḥ dhātuttika dvipañca viññāṇāni yathāsambhavam eka kiccāni iti

original: 33. Paṭisandhādayo nāma, kiccabhedena cuddasa.
analyzed: paṭisandhā ādayaḥ nāma kicca bhedena cuddasa

original: Dasadhā ṭhānabhedena, cittuppādā pakāsitā.
analyzed: dasadhā ṭhāna bhedena cittuppādā pakāsitā

original: 34. Aṭṭhasaṭṭhi tathā dve ca, navāṭṭha dve yathākkamaṃ.
analyzed: tathā dve ca nava aṭṭha dve yathākkamam

original: Ekadviticatupañcakiccaṭhānāni niddise.
analyzed: eka dviti catu pañca kicca ṭhānāni niddise

original: Dvārasaṅgaho
analyzed: dvāra saṅgahaḥ

original: 35. Dvārasaṅgahe dvārāni nāma cakkhudvāraṃ sotadvāraṃ ghānadvāraṃ jivhādvāraṃ kāyadvāraṃ manodvārañceti chabbidhāni bhavanti.
analyzed: dvāra saṅgahe dvārāni nāma cakkhu dvāram sota dvāram ghāna dvāram jivhā dvāram kāya dvāram manaḥ dvāram ca iti chabbidhāni bhavanti

original: 36. Tattha cakkhumeva cakkhudvāraṃ.
analyzed: tattha cakkhum eva cakkhu dvāram

original: 37. Tathā sotādayo sotadvārādīni.
analyzed: tathā sota ādayaḥ sota dvāra ādīni

original: 38. Manodvāraṃ pana bhavaṅganti pavuccati.
analyzed: manodvāram pana bhavaṅganti pavuccati

original: 39. Tattha pañcadvārāvajjanacakkhuviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanakāmāvacarajavanatadārammaṇavasena
analyzed: tattha

original: chacattālīsa cittāni cakkhudvāre yathārahaṃ uppajjanti, tathā pañcadvārāvajjanasotaviññāṇādivasena
analyzed: chacattālīsa cittāni cakkhu dvāre yathāraham uppajjanti tathā pañca dvāra āvajjana sota viññāṇa ādi vasena

original: sotadvārādīsupi chacattālīseva bhavantīti sabbathāpi pañcadvāre catupaññāsa cittāni kāmāvacarāneva.
analyzed: sota dvāra ādīsu pi cha cattālīsā iva bhavanti iti sabbathā api pañca dvāre catupaññāsa cittāni

original: 40. Manodvāre pana manodvārāvajjanapañcapaññāsajavanatadārammaṇavasena sattasaṭṭhi cittāni bhavanti.
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre pana cittāni bhavanti

original: 41. Ekūnavīsati paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena dvāravimuttāni.
analyzed: ekūnavīsati paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena dvāra vimuttāni

original: 42. Tesu pana pañcaviññāṇāni ceva mahaggatalokuttarajavanāni ceti chattiṃsa yathārahamekadvārikacittāni nāma.
analyzed: tesu pana pañca viññāṇāni ca iva mahaggata lokuttara javanāni ca iti chattiṃsa yathāraham eka dvārika cittāni nāma

original: 43. Manodhātuttikaṃ pana pañcadvārikaṃ.
analyzed: pana pañca dvārikam

original: 44. Sukhasantīraṇavoṭṭhabbanakāmāvacarajavanāni chadvārikacittāni.
analyzed: sukha santīraṇa voṭṭhabbana kāmāvacara javanāni cha dvārika cittāni

original: 45. Upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇamahāvipākāni chadvārikāni ceva dvāravimuttāni ca.
analyzed: upekkhā sahagata santīraṇa mahā vipākāni cha dvārikāni ca iva dvāra vimuttāni ca

original: 46. Mahaggatavipākāni dvāravimuttānevāti.
analyzed: mahaggata vipākāni

original: 47. Ekadvārikacittāni, pañcachadvārikāni ca.
analyzed: eka dvārika cittāni pañca cha dvārikāni ca

original: Chadvārikavimuttāni, vimuttāni ca sabbathā.
analyzed: cha dvārika vimuttāni vimuttāni ca sabbathā

original: Chattiṃsati tathā tīṇi, ekatiṃsa yathākkamaṃ;
analyzed: chattiṃsati tathā tīṇi ekatiṃsa yathākkamam

original: Dasadhā navadhā ceti, pañcadhā paridīpaye.
analyzed: dasadhā navadhā ca iti pañcadhā paridīpaye

original: Ālambaṇasaṅgaho
analyzed: ālambaṇa saṅgahaḥ

original: 48. Ālambaṇasaṅgahe ārammaṇāni nāma rūpārammaṇaṃ saddārammaṇaṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ rasārammaṇaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ dhammārammaṇañceti chabbidhāni bhavanti.
analyzed: ālambaṇa saṅgahe ārammaṇāni nāma rūpa ārammaṇam sadda ārammaṇam gandha ārammaṇam rasa ārammaṇam phoṭṭhabba ārammaṇam dhamma ārammaṇam ca iti chabbidhāni bhavanti

original: 49. Tattha rūpameva rūpārammaṇaṃ, tathā saddādayo saddārammaṇādīni.
analyzed: tattha rūpam eva rūpa ārammaṇam tathā sadda ādayo sadda ārammaṇa ādīni

original: 50. Dhammārammaṇaṃ pana pasādasukhumarūpacittacetasikanibbānapaññattivasena chadhā saṅgayhati.
analyzed: dhamma ārammaṇam pana pasāda sukhuma rūpa citta cetasika nibbāna paññatti vasena chadhā saṅgayhati

original: 51. Tattha cakkhudvārikacittānaṃ sabbesampi rūpameva ārammaṇaṃ, tañca paccuppannaṃ. Tathā sotadvārikacittādīnampi saddādīni, tāni ca paccuppannāniyeva.
analyzed: tattha cakkhu dvārika cittānam sabbesam pi rūpam eva ārammaṇam tat ca paccuppannam tathā sota dvārika citta ādīnam pi sadda ādīni tāni ca paccuppannāni eva

original: 52. Manodvārikacittānaṃ pana chabbidhampi paccuppannamatītaṃ anāgataṃ kālavimuttañca yathārahamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: manaḥ dvārika cittānam pana chabbidham pi paccuppannam atītam anāgatam kāla vimuttam ca yathāraham ārammaṇam hoti

original: 53. Dvāravimuttānañca paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutisaṅkhātānaṃ chabbidhampi yathāsambhavaṃ
analyzed: dvāra vimuttānam ca paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti saṅkhātānam chabbidham pi yathāsambhavam

original: yebhuyyena bhavantare chadvāraggahitaṃ paccuppannamatītaṃ paññattibhūtaṃ vā kammakammanimittagatinimittasammataṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: yebhuyyena bhavantare cha dvāra ggahitam paccuppannam atītam paññatti bhūtam vā kamma kamma nimitta gati nimitta sammatam ārammaṇam hoti

original: 54. Tesu cakkhuviññāṇādīni yathākkamaṃ rūpādiekekārammaṇāneva.
analyzed: tesu cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni yathākkamam rūpa ādi eka eka ārammaṇāni eva

original: 55. Manodhātuttikaṃ pana rūpādipañcārammaṇaṃ.
56. Sesāni kāmāvacaravipākāni hasanacittañceti sabbathāpi kāmāvacarārammaṇāneva.
analyzed: sesāni kāmāvacara vipākāni hasana cittam ca iti sabbathā api kāmāvacara ārammaṇāni eva

original: 57. Akusalāni ceva ñāṇavippayuttakāmāvacarajavanāni ceti lokuttaravajjitasabbārammaṇāni.
analyzed: akusalāni ca iva ñāṇa vippayutta kāmāvacara javanāni ca iti lokuttara vajjita sabba ārammaṇāni

original: 58. Ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacarakusalāni ceva pañcamajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ abhiññākusalañceti arahattamaggaphalavajjitasabbārammaṇāni.
analyzed: ñāṇa sampayutta kāmāvacara kusalāni ca iva pañcama jhāna saṅkhātam abhiññā kusalam ca iti arahatta magga phala vajjita sabba ārammaṇāni

original: 59. Ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacarakiriyāni ceva kiriyābhiññāvoṭṭhabbanañceti sabbathāpi sabbārammaṇāni.
analyzed: ñāṇa sampayutta kāmāvacara kiriyāni ca iva kiriyā abhiññā voṭṭhabbanam ca iti sabbathā api sabba ārammaṇāni

original: 60. Āruppesu dutiyacatutthāni mahaggatārammaṇāni.
analyzed: āruppesu dutiya catutthāni mahaggata ārammaṇāni

original: 61. Sesāni mahaggatacittāni sabbānipi paññattārammaṇāni.
analyzed: sesāni mahaggata cittāni sabbāni pi paññatta ārammaṇāni

original: 62. Lokuttaracittāni nibbānārammaṇānīti.
63. Pañcavīsa parittamhi, cha cittāni mahaggate.
analyzed: pañcavīsa parittamhi cha cittāni mahaggate

original: Ekavīsati vohāre, aṭṭha nibbānagocare.
analyzed: ekavīsati vohāre aṭṭha nibbāna gocare

original: Vīsānuttaramuttamhi, aggamaggaphalujjhite;
analyzed: agga magga phala ujjhite

original: Pañca sabbattha chacceti, sattadhā tattha saṅgaho.
analyzed: pañca sabbattha chacca iti sattadhā tattha saṅgaho

original: Vatthusaṅgaho
analyzed: vatthu saṅgahaḥ

original: 64. Vatthusaṅgahe vatthūni nāma cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyahadayavatthu ceti chabbidhāni bhavanti.
analyzed: vatthu saṅgahe vatthūni nāma cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya hadaya vatthu ca iti chabbidhāni bhavanti

original: 65. Tāni kāmaloke sabbānipi labbhanti.
analyzed: tāni kāma loke sabbāni api labbhanti

original: 66. Rūpaloke pana ghānādittayaṃ natthi.
analyzed: rūpa loke pana ghāna ādittayam natthi

original: 67. Arūpaloke pana sabbānipi na saṃvijjanti.
analyzed: arūpa loke pana sabbāni api na saṃvijjanti

original: 68. Tattha pañcaviññāṇadhātuyo yathākkamaṃ ekantena pañca pasādavatthūni nissāyeva pavattanti.
analyzed: tattha pañca viññāṇadhātuyaḥ yathākkamam ekantena pañca pasāda vatthūni nissāya iva pavattanti

original: 69. Pañcadvārāvajjanasampaṭicchanasaṅkhātā pana manodhātu ca hadayaṃ nissitāyeva pavattanti.
analyzed: pañca dvāra āvajjana sampaṭicchana saṅkhātā pana manaḥ dhātu ca hadayam nissitāya iva pavattanti

original: 70. Avasesā pana manoviññāṇadhātusaṅkhātā ca santīraṇamahāvipākapaṭighadvayapaṭhamamaggahasanarūpāvacaravasena hadayaṃ nissāyeva pavattanti.
analyzed: avasesā pana manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu saṅkhātā ca santīraṇa mahā vipāka paṭigha dvaya paṭhama magga hasana rūpāvacara vasena hadayam nissāya iva pavattanti

original: 71. Avasesā kusalākusalakiriyānuttaravasena pana nissāya vā anissāya vā.
analyzed: avasesā kusala akusala kiriyā anuttara vasena pana nissāya vā a nissāya vā

original: 72. Āruppavipākavasena hadayaṃ anissāyevāti.
analyzed: āruppa vipāka vasena hadayam a nissāya iva ati

original: 73. Chavatthuṃ nissitā kāme, satta rūpe catubbidhā.
analyzed: cha vatthum nissitā kāme satta rūpe catubbidhā

original: Tivatthuṃ nissitāruppe, dhātvekā nissitā matā.
74. Tecattālīsa nissāya, dvecattālīsa jāyare.
analyzed: tecattālīsa nissāya dvecattālīsa jāyare

original: Nissāya ca anissāya, pākāruppā anissitā.
analyzed: nissāya ca a nissāya pāka āruppā anissitā

original: Iti abhidhammatthasaṅgahe pakiṇṇakasaṅgahavibhāgo nāma
analyzed: iti abhidhamma attha saṅgahe pakiṇṇakasaṅgahavibhāgaḥ nāma

original: Tatiyo paricchedo.
analyzed: tatiyaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: 4. Vīthiparicchedo
analyzed: vīthi paricchedaḥ

original: 1. Cittuppādānamiccevaṃ, katvāsaṅgahamuttaraṃ.
analyzed: citta uppādānam icca evam katvā a saṅgaham uttaram

original: Bhūmipuggalabhedena, pubbāparaniyāmitaṃ.
analyzed: bhūmi puggala bhedena pubba apara niyāmitam

original: Pavattisaṅgahaṃ nāma, paṭisandhipavattiyaṃ;
analyzed: pavatti saṅgaham nāma paṭisandhi pavattiyam

original: Pavakkhāmi samāsena, yathāsambhavato kathaṃ.
analyzed: pavakkhāmi samāsena yathā sambhavataḥ katham

original: 2.. Vīthimuttānaṃ pana kammakammanimittagatinimittavasena tividhā hoti visayappavatti.
analyzed: vīthim uttānam pana kamma kamma nimitta gati nimitta vasena tividhā hoti visaya ppavatti

original: 4. Tattha vatthudvārārammaṇāni pubbe vuttanayāneva.
analyzed: tattha vatthu dvāra ārammaṇāni pubbe vutta nayāni eva

original: Viññāṇachakkaṃ
analyzed: viññāṇa chakkam

original: 5. Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇañceti cha viññāṇāni.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam sota viññāṇam ghāna viññāṇam jivhā viññāṇam kāya viññāṇam manas viññāṇañca iti cha viññāṇāni

original: Vīthichakkaṃ
analyzed: vīthi chakkam

original: 6. Cha vīthiyo pana cakkhudvāravīthi sotadvāravīthi ghānadvāravīthi jivhādvāravīthi
analyzed: cha vīthiyaḥ pana cakkhu dvāra vīthi sota dvāra vīthi ghāna dvāra vīthi jivhā dvāra vīthi

original: kāyadvāravīthi manodvāravīthi ceti dvāravasena vā, cakkhuviññāṇavīthi sotaviññāṇavīthi
analyzed: kāya dvāra vīthi manaḥ dvāra vīthi ca iti dvāra vasena vā cakkhu viññāṇa vīthi sota viññāṇa vīthi

original: ghānaviññāṇavīthi jivhāviññāṇavīthi kāyaviññāṇavīthi manoviññāṇavīthi ceti viññāṇavasena
analyzed: ghāna viññāṇa vīthi jivhā viññāṇa vīthi kāya viññāṇa vīthi manaḥ viññāṇa vīthi ca iti viññāṇa vasena

original: vā dvārappavattā cittappavattiyo yojetabbā.
analyzed: vā dvāra pavattā citta ppavattiyaḥ yojetabbā

original: Vīthibhedo
analyzed: vīthibhedo

original: 7. Atimahantaṃ mahantaṃ parittaṃ atiparittañceti pañcadvāre manodvāre pana vibhūtamavibhūtañceti chadhā visayappavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: ati mahantam mahantam parittam ati parittam ca iti pañca dvāre manaḥ dvāre pana vibhūtam avibhūtam ca iti chadhā visaya ppavatti veditabbā

original: Pañcadvāravīthi
8. Kathaṃ? Uppādaṭhitibhaṅgavasena khaṇattayaṃ ekacittakkhaṇaṃ nāma.
analyzed: katham uppāda ṭhiti bhaṅga vasena khaṇattayam ekacittakkhaṇam nāma

original: 9. Tāni pana sattarasa cittakkhaṇāni rūpadhammānamāyū.
analyzed: tāni pana sattarasa cittakkhaṇāni

original: 10. Ekacittakkhaṇātītāni vā bahucittakkhaṇātītāni vā ṭhitippattāneva pañcārammaṇāni
analyzed: eka citta khaṇa atītāni vā bahu citta khaṇa atītāni vā ṭhiti pattāna iva pañca ārammaṇāni

original: pañcadvāre āpāthamāgacchanti. Tasmā yadi ekacittakkhaṇātītakaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa
analyzed: pañca dvāre āpātham āgacchanti tasmai yadi eka citta khaṇa atītakam rūpa ārammaṇam cakkhussa

original: āpāthamāgacchati, tato dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge calite bhavaṅgasotaṃ vocchinditvā tameva
analyzed: āpātham āgacchati tatas dvi kkhattum bhavaṅge calite bhavaṅga sotam vā ucchinditvā tam eva

original: rūpārammaṇaṃ āvajjantaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanacittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tato tassānantaraṃ
analyzed: rūpa ārammaṇam āvajjantam pañca dvāra āvajjana cittam uppajjitvā nirujjhati tatas tassa anantaram

original: tameva rūpaṃ passantaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, sampaṭicchantaṃ sampaṭicchanacittaṃ, santīrayamānaṃ
analyzed: tam eva rūpam passantam cakkhu viññāṇam sampaṭicchantam sampaṭicchana cittam santīrayamānam

original: santīraṇacittaṃ, vavatthapentaṃ voṭṭhabbanacittañceti yathākkamaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhanti,
analyzed: santīraṇa cittam vavatthapentam voṭṭhabbana cittam ca iti yathākkamam uppajjitvā nirujjhanti

original: tato paraṃ ekūnatiṃsa kāmāvacarajavanesu yaṃkiñci laddhapaccayaṃ yebhuyyena sattakkhattuṃ
analyzed: tatas param kāmāvacara javanesu yaṃkiñci laddha paccayam yebhuyyena satta kkhattum

original: javati, javanānubandhāni ca dve tadārammaṇapākāni yathārahaṃ pavattanti, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapāto.
analyzed: javati javana anubandhāni ca dve tad ārammaṇa pākāni yathāraham pavattanti tatas param bhavaṅga pāto

original: 11. Ettāvatā cuddasa vīthicittuppādā, dve bhavaṅgacalanāni, pubbevātītakamekacittakkhaṇanti
analyzed: ettāvatā cuddasa vīthi cittuppādāḥ dve bhavaṅga calanāni pubba iva atītakam eka cittakkhaṇanti

original: katvā sattarasa cittakkhaṇāni paripūrenti, tato paraṃ nirujjhati, ārammaṇametaṃ atimahantaṃ nāma gocaraṃ.
analyzed: katvā sattarasa cittakkhaṇāni paripūrenti tato param nirujjhati ārammaṇam etam ati mahantam nāma gocaram

original: 12. Yāva tadārammaṇuppādā pana appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ mahantaṃ nāma, tattha javanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hoti, natthi tadārammaṇuppādo.
analyzed: yāva tad ārammaṇa uppādā pana ārammaṇam mahantam nāma tattha javana avasāne bhavaṅga pāto va hoti natthi tad ārammaṇa uppādo

original: 13. Yāva javanuppādāpi appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ parittaṃ nāma, tattha
analyzed: yāva ārammaṇam parittam nāma tattha

original: javanampi anuppajjitvā dvattikkhattuṃ voṭṭhabbanameva pavattati, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapātova hoti.
analyzed: javanam pi an uppajjitvā dvatti khattum voṭṭhabbanam eva pavattati tatas param bhavaṅga pātaḥ uva hoti

original: 14. Yāva voṭṭhabbanuppādā ca pana appahontātītakamāpāthamāgataṃ nirodhāsannamārammaṇaṃ atiparittaṃ nāma, tattha bhavaṅgacalanameva hoti, natthi vīthicittuppādo.
analyzed: yāva voṭṭhabba anuppādā ca pana nirodha āsannam ārammaṇam ati parittam nāma tattha bhavaṅga calanam eva hoti natthi vīthi cittuppādo

original: 15. Iccevaṃ cakkhudvāre, tathā sotadvārādīsu ceti sabbathāpi pañcadvāre tadārammaṇajavanavoṭṭhabbanamoghavārasaṅkhātānaṃ
analyzed: icca evam cakkhu dvāre tathā sota dvāra ādīsu ca iti sabbathā api pañca dvāre tad ārammaṇa javana voṭṭhabbana moghavāra saṅkhātānam

original: catunnaṃ vārānaṃ yathākkamaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā visayappavatti catudhā veditabbā.
analyzed: catunnam vārānam yathākkamam ārammaṇa bhūtā visaya ppavatti catudhā veditabbā

original: 16. Vīthicittāni satteva, cittuppādā catuddasa.
analyzed: vīthi cittāni sattā iva cittuppādā catuddasa

original: Catupaññāsa vitthārā, pañcadvāre yathārahaṃ.
analyzed: vitthārā pañca dvāre yathāraham

original: Ayamettha pañcadvāre vīthicittappavattinayo.
analyzed: ayam ettha pañca dvāre vīthi citta ppavatti nayo

original: Manodvāravīthi parittajavanavāro
17. Manodvāre pana yadi vibhūtamārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgacalanamanodvārāvajjanajavanāvasāne tadārammaṇapākāni pavattanti, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapāto.
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre pana yadi vibhūtam ārammaṇam āpātham āgacchati tatas param tad ārammaṇa pākāni pavattanti tatas param bhavaṅga pāto

original: 18. Avibhūte panārammaṇe javanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hoti, natthi tadārammaṇuppādoti.
analyzed: avibhūte pana ārammaṇe javana avasāne bhavaṅga pāto va hoti natthi tad ārammaṇa uppādo ti

original: 19. Vīthicittāni tīṇeva, cittuppādā daseritā.
analyzed: vīthi cittāni tīṇi iva cittuppādāḥ dasa īritā

original: Vitthārena panettheka-cattālīsa vibhāvaye;
analyzed: vitthārena pana itthā ikacattālīsa vibhāvaye

original: Ayamettha parittajavanavāro.
analyzed: ayam ettha paritta javana vāro

original: Appanājavanavāro
analyzed: appanā javana vāraḥ

original: 20. Appanājavanavāre pana vibhūtāvibhūtabhedo natthi, tathā tadārammaṇuppādo ca.
analyzed: appanā javana vāre pana vibhūta avibhūta bhedaḥ natthi tathā tad ārammaṇa uppādo ca

original: 21. Tattha hi ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacarajavanānamaṭṭhannaṃ aññatarasmiṃ parikammopacārānulomagotrabhunāmena
analyzed: tattha hi ñāṇa sampayutta kāmāvacara javanānam aṭṭhannam aññatarasmim parikamma upacāra anuloma gotra bhu nāmena

original: catukkhattuṃ tikkhattumeva vā yathākkamaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhānantarameva yathārahaṃ
analyzed: catu khattum ti khattum eva vā yathākkamam uppajjitvā niruddha anantaram eva yathāraham

original: catutthaṃ, pañcamaṃ vā chabbīsatimahaggatalokuttarajavanesu yathābhinīhāravasena
analyzed: catuttham pañcamam vā chabbīsati mahaggata lokuttara javanesu yathā abhinīhāra vasena

original: yaṃ kiñci javanaṃ appanāvīthimotarati, tato paraṃ appanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hoti.
analyzed: yam kiñci javanam appanā vīthim otarati tatas param appanā avasāne bhavaṅga pātaḥ uva hoti

original: 22. Tattha somanassasahagatajavanānantaraṃ appanāpi somanassasahagatāva pāṭikaṅkhitabbā,
analyzed: tattha somanassa sahagata javana anantaram appanā api somanassa sahagatā ava pāṭikaṅkhitabbā

original: upekkhāsahagatajavanānantaraṃ upekkhāsahagatāva, tatthāpi kusalajavanānantaraṃ kusalajavanañceva
analyzed: upekkhā sahagata javana anantaram upekkhā sahagatā ava tattha api kusala javana anantaram kusala javanam ca iva

original: heṭṭhimañca phalattayamappeti, kiriyajavanānantaraṃ kiriyajavanaṃ arahattaphalañcāti.
analyzed: heṭṭhimam ca phalattayam appeti kiriya javana anantaram kiriya javanam arahatta phalam ca ati

original: 23. Dvattiṃsa sukhapuññamhā, dvādasopekkhakā paraṃ,
analyzed: dvattiṃsa sukha puññamhā dvādasā upekkhakā param

original: Sukhitakriyato aṭṭha, cha sambhonti upekkhakā.
analyzed: sukhitakriyataḥ aṭṭha cha sambhonti upekkhakā

original: 24. Puthujjanāna sekkhānaṃ, kāmapuññatihetuto.
analyzed: puthujjanāna sekkhānam kāma puñña ti hetutaḥ

original: Tihetukāmakriyato, vītarāgānamappanā.
analyzed: vīta rāgān

original: Ayamettha manodvāre vīthicittappavattinayo.
analyzed: ayam ettha manaḥ dvāre vīthi citta ppavatti nayo

original: Tadārammaṇaniyamo
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa niyamaḥ

original: 25. Sabbatthāpi panettha aniṭṭhe ārammaṇe akusalavipākāneva pañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇatadārammaṇāni.
analyzed: sabbattha api pana ittha aniṭṭhe ārammaṇe akusala vipākāni pañca viññāṇa sampaṭicchana santīraṇa tad ārammaṇāni

original: 26. Iṭṭhe kusalavipākāni.
analyzed: iṭṭhe kusala vipākāni

original: 27. Atiiṭṭhe pana somanassasahagatāneva santīraṇatadārammaṇāni, tatthāpi somanassasahagatakiriyajavanāvasāne
analyzed: ati iṭṭhe pana somanassa sahagatāni eva santi īraṇa tad ārammaṇāni tattha api somanassa sahagata kiriya javana avasāne

original: somanassasahagatāneva tadārammaṇāni bhavanti, upekkhāsahagatakiriyajavanāvasāne ca
analyzed: somanassa sahagatānaṃ eva tad ārammaṇāni bhavanti upekkhā sahagata kiriya javana avasāne ca

original: upekkhāsahagatāneva honti.
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatāna eva honti

original: 28. Domanassasahagatajavanāvasāne ca pana tadārammaṇāniceva bhavaṅgāni ca upekkhāsahagatāneva
analyzed: domanassa sahagata javana avasāne ca pana tad ārammaṇāni ca iva bhavaṅgāni ca upekkhā sahagatāni eva

original: bhavanti, tasmā yadi somanassapaṭisandhikassa domanassasahagatajavanāvasāne tadārammaṇasambhavo
analyzed: bhavanti tasmai yadi somanassa paṭisandhikassa domanassa sahagata javana avasāne tad ārammaṇa sambhavaḥ

original: natthi, tadā yaṃ kiñci paricitapubbaṃ parittārammaṇamārabbha upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ
analyzed: na atthi tadā yam kiñci paricita pubbam paritta ārammaṇam ārabbha upekkhā sahagata santīraṇam

original: uppajjati, tamanantaritvā bhavaṅgapātova hotīti vadanti ācariyā.
analyzed: uppajjati tam anantaritvā bhavaṅga pātaḥ uva hoti iti vadanti ācariyā

original: 29. Tathā kāmāvacarajavanāvasāne kāmāvacarasattānaṃ kāmāvacaradhammesveva ārammaṇabhūtesu tadārammaṇaṃ icchantīti.
analyzed: tathā kāmāvacara javana avasāne kāmāvacara sattānam kāmāvacara dhammesu eva ārammaṇa bhūtesu tad ārammaṇam icchanti iti

original: 30. Kāme javanasattālambaṇānaṃ niyame sati.
Vibhūtetimahante ca, tadārammaṇamīritaṃ.
analyzed: vibhūta iti mahante ca tad ārammaṇam īritam

original: Ayamettha tadārammaṇaniyamo.
analyzed: ayam ettha tad ārammaṇa niyamo

original: Javananiyamo
analyzed: javana niyamaḥ

original: 31. Javanesu ca parittajavanavīthiyaṃ kāmāvacarajavanāni sattakkhattuṃ chakkhattumeva vā javanti.
analyzed: javanesu ca paritta javana vīthiyam kāmāvacara javanāni satta kkhattum cha khattum eva vā javanti

original: 32. Mandappavattiyaṃ pana maraṇakālādīsu pañcavārameva.
analyzed: pana maraṇa kāla ādīsu pañca vāram eva

original: 33. Bhagavato pana yamakapāṭihāriyakālādīsu lahukappavattiyaṃ cattāripañca vā paccavekkhaṇacittāni bhavantītipi vadanti.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ pana yamaka pāṭihāriya kāla ādīsu lahu kappavattiyam cattāri pañca vā paccavekkhaṇa cittāni bhavanti iti pi vadanti

original: 34. Ādikammikassa pana paṭhamakappanāyaṃ mahaggatajavanāniabhiññājavanāni ca sabbadāpi ekavārameva javanti, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapāto.
analyzed: ādikammikassa pana paṭhama kappanāyam mahaggata javanāni abhiññā javanāni ca sabbadā api eka vāram eva javanti tato param bhavaṅga pāto

original: 35. Cattāro pana magguppādā ekacittakkhaṇikā, tato paraṃ dve tīṇi phalacittāni yathārahaṃ uppajjanti, tato paraṃ bhavaṅgapāto.
analyzed: cattāro pana magga uppādāḥ eka citta khaṇikā tatas param dve tīṇi phala cittāni yathāraham uppajjanti tatas param bhavaṅgapāto

original: 36. Nirodhasamāpattikāle dvikkhattuṃ catutthāruppajavanaṃ javati, tato paraṃ nirodhaṃ phusati.
analyzed: nirodha samāpatti kāle dvi kkhattum catuttha āruppa javanam javati tato param nirodham phusati

original: 37. Vuṭṭhānakāle ca anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaphalaṃ vā yathārahamekavāraṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe bhavaṅgapātova hoti.
analyzed: vuṭṭhāna kāle ca anāgāmi phalam vā arahatta phalam vā yathāraham eka vāram uppajjitvā niruddhe bhavaṅga pāto va hoti

original: 38. Sabbatthāpi samāpattivīthiyaṃ bhavaṅgasoto viya vīthiniyamo natthīti katvā bahūnipi labbhantīti.
analyzed: sabbattha api samāpatti vīthiyam bhavaṅga sotaḥ viya vīthi niyamaḥ na atthi iti katvā bahūni api labbhanti iti

original: 39. Sattakkhattuṃ parittāni, maggābhiññā sakiṃ matā.
analyzed: satta kkhattum parittāni magga abhiññā sakim matā

original: Avasesāni labbhanti, javanāni bahūnipi.
analyzed: avasesāni labbhanti javanāni bahūni pi

original: Ayamettha javananiyamo.
analyzed: ayam ettha javana niyamaḥ

original: Puggalabhedo
analyzed: puggala bhedaḥ

original: 40. Duhetukānamahetukānañca panettha kiriyajavanāni ceva appanājavanāni ca labbhanti.
analyzed: du hetukānam ahetukānam ca pana ittha kiriya javanāni ca iva appanā javanāni ca labbhanti

original: 41. Tathā ñāṇasampayuttavipākāni ca sugatiyaṃ.
analyzed: tathā ñāṇa sampayutta vipākāni ca sugatiyam

original: 42. Duggatiyaṃ pana ñāṇavippayuttāni ca mahāvipākāni na labbhanti.
analyzed: duggatiyam pana ñāṇa vippayuttāni ca mahā vipākāni na labbhanti

original: 43. Tihetukesu ca khīṇāsavānaṃ kusalākusalajavanāni na labbhanti.
analyzed: ti hetukesu ca khīṇāsavānam kusala akusala javanāni na labbhanti

original: 44. Tathā sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ kiriyajavanāni.
analyzed: tathā sekkha puthujjanānam kiriya javanāni

original: 45. Diṭṭhigatasampayuttavicikicchājavanāni ca sekkhānaṃ.
analyzed: diṭṭhigata sampayutta vicikicchā javanāni ca sekkhānam

original: 46. Anāgāmipuggalānaṃ pana paṭighajavanāni ca na labbhanti.
analyzed: anāgāmi puggalānam pana paṭigha javanāni ca na labbhanti

original: 47. Lokuttarajavanāni ca yathārahaṃ ariyānameva samuppajjantīti.
analyzed: lokuttara javanāni ca yathāraham ariyānam eva samuppajjanti iti

original: 48. Asekkhānaṃ catucattālīsa sekkhānamuddise.
analyzed: asekkhānam catucattālīsa sekkhānam uddise

original: Chappaññāsāvasesānaṃ, catupaññāsa sambhavā.
analyzed: chappaññāsā avasesānam catupaññāsa sambhavā

original: Ayamettha puggalabhedo.
analyzed: ayam ettha puggala bhedaḥ

original: Bhūmivibhāgo
analyzed: bhūmi vibhāgaḥ

original: 49. Kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ panetāni sabbānipi vīthicittāni yathārahamupalabbhanti.
analyzed: kāmāvacara bhūmiyam pana etāni sabbāni api vīthi cittāni yathāraham upalabbhanti

original: 50. Rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ paṭighajavanatadārammaṇavajjitāni.
analyzed: rūpāvacara bhūmiyam paṭigha javana tad ārammaṇa vajjitāni

original: 51. Arūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ paṭhamamaggarūpāvacarahasanaheṭṭhimāruppavajjitāni ca labbhanti.
analyzed: arūpāvacara bhūmiyam paṭhama magga rūpāvacara hasana heṭṭhima āruppa vajjitāni ca labbhanti

original: 52. Sabbatthāpi ca taṃtaṃpasādarahitānaṃ taṃtaṃdvārikavīthicittāni na labbhanteva.
analyzed: sabbattha api ca taṃtaṃ pasāda rahitānam taṃtaṃdvārika vīthi cittāni na labbhanta iva

original: 53. Asaññasattānaṃ pana sabbathāpi cittappavatti natthevāti.
analyzed: asaññasattānam pana sabbathā api citta ppavatti nattha eva ati

original: 54. Asīti vīthicittāni, kāme rūpe yathārahaṃ.
analyzed: asi iti vīthi cittāni kāme rūpe yathāraham

original: Catusaṭṭhi tathārūpe, dvecattālīsa labbhare.
analyzed: tathārūpe dvecattālīsa labbhare

original: Ayamettha bhūmivibhāgo.
analyzed: ayam ettha bhūmi vibhāgaḥ

original: 55. Iccevaṃ chadvārikacittappavatti yathāsambhavaṃ bhavaṅgantaritā yāvatāyukamabbocchinnā pavattati.
analyzed: icca ivam cha dvārika citta ppavatti yathāsambhavam bhavaṅga antaritā pavattati

original: Iti abhidhammatthasaṅgahe vīthisaṅgahavibhāgo nāma
analyzed: iti abhidhamma attha saṅgahe vīthisaṅgahavibhāgaḥ nāma

original: Catuttho paricchedo.
analyzed: catutthaḥ paricchedo

original: 5. Vīthimuttaparicchedo
analyzed: vīthi mutta paricchedaḥ

original: 1. Vīthicittavasenevaṃ, pavattiyamudīrito.
analyzed: vīthi citta vasena ivam

original: Pavattisaṅgaho nāma, sandhiyaṃ dāni vuccati.
analyzed: pavatti saṅgahaḥ nāma sandhiyam dāni vuccati

original: 2. Catasso bhūmiyo, catubbidhā paṭisandhi, cattāri kammāni, catudhā maraṇuppatti ceti vīthimuttasaṅgahe cattāri catukkāni veditabbāni.
analyzed: catasso bhūmiyaḥ catubbidhā paṭisandhi cattāri kammāni catudhā maraṇa uppatti ca iti vīthi mutta saṅgahe cattāri catukkāni veditabbāni

original: Bhūmicatukkaṃ
analyzed: bhūmi catukkam

original: 3. Tattha apāyabhūmi kāmasugatibhūmi rūpāvacarabhūmi arūpāvacarabhūmi ceti catasso bhūmiyo nāma.
analyzed: tattha apāya bhūmi kāma sugati bhūmi rūpāvacara bhūmi arūpāvacara bhūmi ca iti catasso bhūmiyaḥ nāma

original: 4. Tāsu nirayo tiracchānayoni pettivisayo asurakāyo ceti apāyabhūmi catubbidhā hoti.
analyzed: tāsu nirayo tiracchānayoni pettivisayo asura kāyo ca iti apāya bhūmi catubbidhā hoti

original: 5. Manussā cātumahārājikā tāvatiṃsā yāmā tusitā nimmānarati paranimmitavasavattī ceti kāmasugatibhūmi sattavidhā hoti.
analyzed: manussā cātumahārājikā tāvatiṃsā yāmā tusitā nimmānarati paranimmitavasavattī ca iti kāma sugati bhūmi sattavidhā hoti

original: 6. Sā panāyamekādasavidhāpi kāmāvacarabhūmicceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: sā sā pana ayam ekādasavidhā api saṅkham gacchati

original: 7. Brahmapārisajjā brahmapurohitā mahābrahmā ceti paṭhamajjhānabhūmi.
analyzed: brahmapārisajjā brahmapurohitāḥ mahābrahmā ca iti

original: 8. Parittābhā appamāṇābhā ābhassarā ceti dutiyajjhānabhūmi.
analyzed: paritta ābhā appamāṇa ābhā ābhassarā ca iti dutiya jhāna bhūmi

original: 9. Parittasubhā appamāṇasubhā subhakiṇhā ceti tatiyajjhānabhūmi.
analyzed: paritta subhā appamāṇa subhā subha kiṇhā ca iti tatiya jhāna bhūmi

original: 10. Vehapphalā asaññasattā suddhāvāsā ceti catutthajjhānabhūmīti rūpāvacarabhūmi soḷasavidhā hoti.
analyzed: vehapphalā asaññasattā suddhāvāsā ca iti catuttha jhāna bhūmi iti rūpāvacara bhūmi soḷasavidhā hoti

original: 11. Avihā atappā sudassā sudassī akaniṭṭhā ceti suddhāvāsabhūmi pañcavidhā hoti.
analyzed: avihā atappā sudassā sudassī akaniṭṭhā ca iti suddhāvāsa bhūmi pañcavidhā hoti

original: 12. Ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmi viññāṇañcāyatanabhūmi ākiñcaññāyatanabhūmi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhūmi ceti arūpabhūmi catubbidhā hoti.
analyzed: ākāsānañcāyatana bhūmi viññāṇañcāyatana bhūmi ākiñcaññāyatana bhūmi nevasaññānāsaññāyatana bhūmi ca iti arūpa bhūmi catubbidhā hoti

original: 13. Puthujjanā na labbhanti, suddhāvāsesu sabbathā.
analyzed: puthujjanāḥ na labbhanti suddha āvāsesu sabbathā

original: Sotāpannā ca sakadāgāmino cāpi puggalā.
analyzed: ca sotāpannā ca api puggalā

original: 14. Ariyā nopalabbhanti, asaññāpāyabhūmisu.
analyzed: ariyāḥ na upalabbhanti asaññā apāya bhūmisu

original: Sesaṭṭhānesu labbhanti, ariyānariyāpi ca.
analyzed: sesa ṭṭhānesu labbhanti ariya anariyā api ca

original: Idamettha bhūmicatukkaṃ.
analyzed: idam ettha bhūmi catukkam

original: Paṭisandhicatukkaṃ
analyzed: paṭisandhi catukkam

original: 15. Apāyapaṭisandhi kāmasugatipaṭisandhi rūpāvacarapaṭisandhi arūpāvacarapaṭisandhi ceti catubbidhā paṭisandhi nāma.
analyzed: apāya paṭisandhi kāma sugati paṭisandhi rūpāvacara paṭisandhi arūpāvacara paṭisandhi ca iti catubbidhā paṭisandhi nāma

original: 16. Tattha akusalavipākopekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ apāyabhūmiyaṃ okkantikkhaṇe paṭisandhi hutvā tato paraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ pariyosāne cavanaṃ hutvā vocchijjati, ayamekāpāyapaṭisandhi nāma.
analyzed: tattha akusala vipāka upekkhā sahagata santīraṇam apāya bhūmiyam okkanti khaṇe paṭisandhi hutvā tato param bhavaṅgam pariyosāne cavanam hutvā vā ucchijjati ayam eka apāya paṭisandhi nāma

original: 17. Kusalavipākopekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ pana kāmasugatiyaṃ manussānañceva jaccandhādīnaṃ bhummassitānañca vinipātikāsurānaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattati.
analyzed: kusala vipāka upekkhā sahagata santīraṇam pana kāma sugatiyam manussānam ca iva jaccandha ādīnam bhummassitānam ca vinipātika asurānam paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena pavattati

original: 18. Mahāvipākāni pana aṭṭha sabbatthāpi kāmasugatiyaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattanti.
analyzed: mahā vipākāni pana aṭṭha sabbattha api kāma sugatiyam paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena pavattanti

original: 19. Imā nava kāmasugatipaṭisandhiyo nāma.
analyzed: imāḥ nava kāma sugati paṭisandhiyaḥ nāma

original: 20. Sā panāyaṃ dasavidhāpi kāmāvacarapaṭisandhicceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: sā pana ayam dasavidhā api saṅkham gacchati

original: 21. Tesu catunnaṃ apāyānaṃ manussānaṃ vinipātikāsurānañca āyuppamāṇagaṇanāya niyamo natthi.
analyzed: tesu catunnam apāyānam manussānam vinipātika asurānam ca āyu ppamāṇa gaṇanāya niyamaḥ natthi

original: 22. Cātumahārājikānaṃ pana devānaṃ dibbāni pañcavassasatāni āyuppamāṇaṃ, manussagaṇanāya
analyzed: cātumahārājikānam pana devānam dibbāni pañca vassa satāni āyu ppamāṇam manussa gaṇanāya

original: navutivassasatasahassappamāṇaṃ hoti, tato catugguṇaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ, tato catugguṇaṃ
analyzed: navuti vassa sata sahassa ppamāṇam hoti tato catugguṇam tāvatiṃsānam tato catugguṇam

original: yāmānaṃ, tato catugguṇaṃ tusitānaṃ, tato catugguṇaṃ nimmānaratīnaṃ, tato catugguṇaṃ
analyzed: yāmānam tatas catugguṇam tusitānam tatas catugguṇam nimmānaratīnam tatas catugguṇam

original: paranimmitavasavattīnaṃ.
analyzed: para nimmita vasa vattīnam

original: 23. Navasatañcekavīsa-vassānaṃ koṭiyo tathā.
analyzed: nava satam ca ekavīsa vassānam koṭiyaḥ tathā

original: Vassasatasahassāni, saṭṭhi ca vasavattisu.
analyzed: vassa sata sahassāni ca vasa vattisu

original: 24. Paṭhamajjhānavipākaṃ paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattati.
analyzed: paṭhama jhāna vipākam paṭhama jhāna bhūmiyam paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena pavattati

original: 25. Tathā dutiyajjhānavipākaṃ tatiyajjhānavipākañca dutiyajjhānabhūmiyaṃ.
analyzed: tathā dutiya jhāna vipākam tatiya jhāna vipākam ca dutiya jhāna bhūmiyam

original: 26. Catutthajjhānavipākaṃ tatiyajjhānabhūmiyaṃ.
27. Pañcamajjhānavipākaṃ catutthajjhānabhūmiyaṃ.
analyzed: pañcama jhāna vipākam

original: 28. Asaññasattānaṃ pana rūpameva paṭisandhi hoti. Tathā tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ cavanakāle ca rūpameva pavattitvā nirujjhati, imā cha rūpāvacarapaṭisandhiyo nāma.
analyzed: asaññasattānam pana rūpam eva paṭisandhi hoti tathā tato param cavana kāle ca rūpam eva pavattitvā nirujjhati imā cha rūpāvacara paṭisandhiyaḥ nāma

original: 29. Tesu brahmapārisajjānaṃ devānaṃ kappassa tatiyo bhāgo āyuppamāṇaṃ.
analyzed: tesu brahmapārisajjānam devānam kappassa tatiyaḥ bhāgaḥ āyu ppamāṇam

original: 30. Brahmapurohitānaṃ upaḍḍhakappo.
analyzed: brahmapurohitānam upaḍḍha kappo

original: 31. Mahābrahmānaṃ eko kappo.
analyzed: mahābrahmānam ekaḥ kappo

original: 32. Parittābhānaṃ dve kappāni.
analyzed: paritta ābhānam dve kappāni

original: 33. Appamāṇābhānaṃ cattārikappāni.
analyzed: appamāṇa ābhānam cattāri kappāni

original: 34. Ābhassarānaṃ aṭṭha kappāni.
analyzed: aṭṭha kappāni

original: 35. Parittasubhānaṃ soḷasa kappāni.
analyzed: soḷasa kappāni

original: 36. Appamāṇasubhānaṃ dvattiṃsa kappāni.
analyzed: appamāṇa subhānam dvattiṃsa kappāni

original: 37. Subhakiṇhānaṃ catusaṭṭhi kappāni.
analyzed: subhakiṇhānam catusaṭṭhi kappāni

original: 38. Vehapphalānaṃ asaññasattānañca pañcakappasatāni.
analyzed: vehapphalānam asaññasattānam ca pañca kappa satāni

original: 39. Avihānaṃ kappasahassāni.
analyzed: a vihānam kappa sahassāni

original: 40. Atappānaṃ dve kappasahassāni.
analyzed: atappānam dve kappa sahassāni

original: 41. Sudassānaṃ cattāri kappasahassāni.
analyzed: sudassānam cattāri kappa sahassāni

original: 42. Sudassīnaṃ aṭṭha kappasahassāni.
analyzed: sudassīnam aṭṭha kappa sahassāni

original: 43. Akaniṭṭhānaṃ soḷasa kappasahassāni.
analyzed: akaniṭṭhānam soḷasa kappa sahassāni

original: 44. Paṭhamāruppādivipākāni paṭhamāruppādibhūmīsu yathākkamaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattanti. Imā catasso arūpapaṭisandhiyo nāma.
analyzed: paṭhama āruppa ādi vipākāni paṭhama āruppa ādi bhūmīsu yathākkamam paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena pavattanti imā catasso arūpa paṭisandhiyaḥ nāma

original: 45. Tesu pana ākāsānañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ vīsatikappasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ.
analyzed: tesu pana ākāsa anañcāyatana upagānam devānam vīsati kappa sahassāni āyu ppamāṇam

original: 46. Viññāṇañcāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ cattālīsakappasahassāni.
analyzed: viññāṇañcāyatanūpagānam devānam cattālīsa kappa sahassāni

original: 47. Ākiñcaññāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ saṭṭhikappasahassāni.
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatanūpagānam devānam saṭṭhi kappa sahassāni

original: 48. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagānaṃ devānaṃ caturāsītikappasahassāni.
analyzed: nevasaññānāsaññāyatana upagānam devānam caturāsīti kappa sahassāni

original: 49. Paṭisandhi bhavaṅgañca, tathā cavanamānasaṃ.
analyzed: paṭisandhi bhavaṅgam ca tathā cavana mānasam

original: Ekameva tathevekavisayañcekajātiyaṃ.
analyzed: ekam eva tathā iva eka visayam ca eka jātiyam

original: Idamettha paṭisandhicatukkaṃ.
analyzed: idam ettha paṭisandhi catukkam

original: Kammacatukkaṃ
analyzed: kamma catukkam

original: 50. Janakaṃ upatthambhakaṃ upapīḷakaṃ upaghātakañceti kiccavasena.
analyzed: janakam upatthambhakam upapīḍakam upaghātakam ca iti kicca vasena

original: 51. Garukaṃ āsannaṃ āciṇṇaṃ kaṭattākammañceti pākadānapariyāyena.
analyzed: garukam āsannam āciṇṇam kaṭattā kammam ca iti pāka dāna pariyāyena

original: 52. Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ ahosikammañceti pākakālavasena cattāri kammāni nāma.
analyzed: diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyam upapajja vedanīyam aparāpariya vedanīyam ahosikammam ca iti pāka kāla vasena cattāri kammāni nāma

original: 53. Tathā akusalaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ arūpāvacarakusalañceti pākaṭhānavasena.
analyzed: tathā akusalam kāmāvacara kusalam rūpāvacara kusalam arūpāvacara kusalam ca iti pākaṭhāna vasena

original: 54. Tattha akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammañceti kammadvāravasena tividhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tattha akusalam kāya kammam vacī kammam manaḥ kammam ca iti kamma dvāra vasena tividham hoti

original: 55. Kathaṃ? Pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ kāmesumicchācāro ceti kāyaviññattisaṅkhāte kāyadvāre bāhullavuttito kāyakammaṃ nāma.
analyzed: katham pāṇa atipātaḥ adinnādānam kāmesum icchā ācāro ca iti kāya viññatti saṅkhāte kāya dvāre bāhulla vuttitaḥ kāyakammam nāma

original: 56. Musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpo ceti vacīviññattisaṅkhāte vacīdvāre bāhullavuttito vacīkammaṃ nāma.
analyzed: musāvādaḥ pisuṇa vācā pharusa vācā samphappalāpaḥ ca iti vacī viññatti saṅkhāte vacī dvāre bāhulla vuttitaḥ vacīkammam nāma

original: 57. Abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhi ceti aññatrāpi viññattiyā manasmiṃyeva bāhullavuttito manokammaṃ nāma.
analyzed: abhijjhā byāpādaḥ micchādiṭṭhi ca iti aññatra api viññattiyāḥ manasmiṃyeva bāhulla vuttitaḥ manokammam nāma

original: 58. Tesu pāṇātipāto pharusavācā byāpādo ca dosamūlena jāyanti.
analyzed: tesu pāṇa atipātaḥ pharusa vācā byāpādaḥ ca dosa mūlena jāyanti

original: 59. Kāmesumicchācāro abhijjhā micchādiṭṭhi ca lobhamūlena.
analyzed: kāmesu micchā ācāraḥ abhijjhā micchādiṭṭhi ca lobha mūlena

original: 60. Sesāni cattāripi dvīhi mūlehi sambhavanti.
analyzed: sesāni dvīhi mūlehi sambhavanti

original: 61. Cittuppādavasena panetaṃ akusalaṃ sabbathāpi dvādasavidhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: cittuppāda vasena pana itam akusalam sabbathā api dvādasavidham hoti

original: 62. Kāmāvacarakusalampi kāyadvāre pavattaṃ kāyakammaṃ, vacīdvāre pavattaṃ vacīkammaṃ, manodvāre pavattaṃ manokammañceti kammadvāravasena tividhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusalam pi kāya dvāre pavattam kāya kammam vacī dvāre pavattam vacī kammam manaḥ dvāre pavattam manaḥ kammam ca iti kamma dvāra vasena tividham hoti

original: 63. Tathā dānasīlabhāvanāvasena.
analyzed: tathā dāna sīla bhāvanā vasena

original: 64. Cittuppādavasena panetaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: cittuppāda vasena pana itam aṭṭhavidham hoti

original: 65. Dānasīlabhāvanāpacāyanaveyyāvaccapattidānapattānumodanadhammassavanadhammadesanā diṭṭhijukammavasena dasavidhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: dāna sīla bhāvanā apacāyana veyyāvacca patti dāna patta anumodana dhamma ssavana dhamma desanā diṭṭhi ju kamma vasena dasavidham hoti

original: 66. Taṃ panetaṃ vīsatividhampi kāmāvacarakammamicceva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: tam pana itam vīsatividham pi kāmāvacara kammam icca iva saṅkham gacchati

original: 67. Rūpāvacarakusalaṃ pana manokammameva, tañca bhāvanāmayaṃ appanāppattaṃ, jhānaṅgabhedena pañcavidhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: rūpāvacara kusalam pana manaḥ kammam eva tat ca bhāvanā mayam appanā appattam jhā aṅga bhedena pañcavidham hoti

original: 68. Tathā arūpāvacarakusalañca manokammaṃ, tampi bhāvanāmayaṃ appanāppattaṃ. Ārammaṇabhedena catubbidhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tathā arūpa avacara kusalam ca manaḥ kammam tat pi bhāvanā mayam appanā appattam ārammaṇa bhedena catubbidham hoti

original: 69. Etthākusalakammamuddhaccarahitaṃ apāyabhūmiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janeti, pavattiyaṃ
analyzed: ettha akusala kammam uddhacca rahitam apāya bhūmiyam paṭisandhim janeti pavattiyam

original: pana sabbampi dvādasavidhaṃ sattākusalapākāni sabbatthāpi kāmaloke rūpaloke ca yathārahaṃ vipaccati.
