analyzed: pana sabbam pi dvādasavidham satta akusala pākāni sabbattha api kāma loke rūpa loke ca yathāraham vipaccati

original: 70. Kāmāvacarakusalampi kāmasugatiyameva paṭisandhiṃ janeti, tathā pavattiyañca mahāvipākāni, ahetukavipākāni pana aṭṭhapi sabbatthāpi kāmaloke rūpaloke ca yathārahaṃ vipaccati.
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusalam pi kāma sugatiyam eva paṭisandhim janeti tathā pavattiyam ca mahā vipākāni ahetuka vipākāni pana aṭṭha api sabbattha api kāma loke rūpa loke ca yathāraham vipaccati

original: 71. Tatthāpi tihetukamukkaṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ tihetukaṃ paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte soḷasa vipākāni vipaccati.
analyzed: tattha api ti hetukam ukkaṭṭham kusalam ti hetukam paṭisandhim da tvā pavatte soḷasa vipākāni vipaccati

original: 72. Tihetukamomakaṃ dvihetukamukkaṭṭhañca kusalaṃ dvihetukaṃ paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte tihetukarahitāni dvādasa vipākāni vipaccati.
analyzed: ti hetuka momakam dvi hetukam ukkaṭṭham ca kusalam dvi hetukam paṭisandhim da tvā pavatte ti hetuka rahitāni dvādasa vipākāni vipaccati

original: 73. Dvihetukamomakaṃ pana kusalaṃ ahetukameva paṭisandhiṃ deti, pavatte ca ahetukavipākāneva vipaccati.
analyzed: dvi hetukam omakam pana kusalam ahetukam eva paṭisandhim deti pavatte ca ahetuka vipākān eva vipaccati

original: 74. Asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhāra-vipākāni na paccati.
analyzed: asaṅkhāram sa saṅkhāra vipākāni na paccati

original: Sasaṅkhāramasaṅkhāra-vipākānīti kecana.
analyzed: sa saṅkhāram asaṅkhāra vipākāni iti kecana

original: Tesaṃ dvādasa pākāni, dasāṭṭha ca yathākkamaṃ;
analyzed: tesam dvādasa pākāni ca yathākkamam

original: Yathāvuttānusārena yathāsambhavamuddise.
analyzed: yathāvutta anusārena yathāsambhavam uddise

original: 75. Rūpāvacarakusalaṃ pana paṭhamajjhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā brahmapārisajjesu uppajjati.
analyzed: rūpāvacara kusalam pana paṭhama jhānam parittam bhāvetvā brahma pārisajjesu uppajjati

original: 76. Tadeva majjhimaṃ bhāvetvā brahmapurohitesu.
analyzed: tat eva majjhimam bhāvetvā brahma purohitesu

original: 77. Paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā mahābrahmesu.
analyzed: paṇītam bhāvetvā mahābrahmesu

original: 78. Tathā dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānañca parittaṃ bhāvetvā parittābhesu.
analyzed: tathā dutiya jhānam tatiya jhānañca parittam bhāvetvā paritta ābhesu

original: 79. Majjhimaṃ bhāvetvā appamāṇābhesu.
analyzed: majjhimam bhāvetvā appamāṇa ābhesu

original: 80. Paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā ābhassaresu.
analyzed: paṇītam bhāvetvā ābhassaresu

original: 81. Catutthajjhānaṃ parittaṃ bhāvetvā parittasubhesu.
analyzed: catuttha jhānam parittam bhāvetvā paritta subhesu

original: 82. Majjhimaṃ bhāvetvā appamāṇasubhesu.
analyzed: majjhimam bhāvetvā appamāṇa subhesu

original: 83. Paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā subhakiṇhesu.
analyzed: paṇītam bhāvetvā subha kiṇhesu

original: 84. Pañcamajjhānaṃ bhāvetvā vehapphalesu.
analyzed: pañcama jhānam bhāvetvā vehapphalesu

original: 85. Tadeva saññāvirāgaṃ bhāvetvā asaññasattesu.
analyzed: tat eva saññā virāgam bhāvetvā asañña sattesu

original: 86. Anāgāmino pana suddhāvāsesu uppajjanti.
analyzed: anāgāminaḥ pana suddhāvāsesu uppajjanti

original: 87. Arūpāvacarakusalañca yathākkamaṃ bhāvetvā āruppesu uppajjantīti.
analyzed: arūpāvacara kusalam ca yathākkamam bhāvetvā āruppesu uppajjanti iti

original: 88. Itthaṃ mahaggataṃ puññaṃ, yathābhūmivavatthitaṃ.
analyzed: ittham mahaggatam puññam yathābhūmi vavatthitam

original: Janeti sadisaṃ pākaṃ, paṭisandhipavattiyaṃ.
analyzed: janeti sadisam pākam paṭisandhi pavattiyam

original: Idamettha kammacatukkaṃ.
analyzed: idam ettha kamma catukkam

original: Cutipaṭisandhikkamo
analyzed: cuti paṭisandhi kkamaḥ

original: 89. Āyukkhayena kammakkhayena ubhayakkhayena upacchedakakammunā ceti catudhā maraṇuppatti nāma.
analyzed: āyu kkhayena kamma kkhayena ubhaya kkhayena upacchedaka kammunā ca iti catudhā maraṇuppatti nāma

original: 90. Tathā ca marantānaṃ pana maraṇakāle yathārahaṃ abhimukhībhūtaṃ bhavantare paṭisandhijanakaṃ
analyzed: tathā ca marantānam pana maraṇa kāle yathāraham abhimukhībhūtam bhavantare paṭisandhi janakam

original: kammaṃ vā, taṃkammakaraṇakāle rūpādikamupaladdhapubbamupakaraṇabhūtañca kammanimittaṃ
analyzed: kammam vā tad kamma karaṇa kāle rūpa ādikam upaladdha pubbam upakaraṇa bhūtam ca kamma nimittam

original: vā, anantaramuppajjamānabhave upalabhitabbamupabhogabhūtañca gatinimittaṃ vā kammabalena
analyzed: vā anantaram uppajjamāna bhave upalabhitabbam upabhoga bhūtam ca gati nimittam vā kamma balena

original: channaṃ dvārānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ paccupaṭṭhāti, tato paraṃ tameva tathopaṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: channam dvārānam aññatarasmim paccupaṭṭhāti tatas param tam eva tathā upaṭṭhitam ārammaṇam

original: ārabbha vipaccamānakakammānurūpaṃ parisuddhaṃ upakkiliṭṭhaṃ vā upalabhitabbabhavānurūpaṃ
analyzed: ārabbha vipaccamānaka kamma anurūpam parisuddham upakkiliṭṭham vā upalabhitabba bhava anurūpam

original: tatthoṇataṃva cittasantānaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pavattati bāhullena, tameva vā pana janakabhūtaṃ
analyzed: citta santānam abhiṇham pavattati bāhullena tam eva vā pana janaka bhūtam

original: kammaṃ abhinavakaraṇavasena dvārappattaṃ hoti.
analyzed: kammam abhinava karaṇa vasena dvāra ppattam hoti

original: 91. Paccāsannamaraṇassa tassa vīthicittāvasāne bhavaṅgakkhaye vā cavanavasena paccuppannabhavapariyosānabhūtaṃ
analyzed: pacca āsanna maraṇassa tassa vīthi citta avasāne bhavaṅga kkhaye vā cavana vasena paccuppanna bhava pariyosāna bhūtam

original: cuticittaṃ uppajjitvā nirujjhati, tasmiṃ niruddhāvasāne tassānantarameva tathāgahitaṃ
analyzed: cuti cittam uppajjitvā nirujjhati tasmin niruddha avasāne tassa anantaram eva tathāgahitam

original: ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha savatthukaṃ avatthukameva vā yathārahaṃ avijjānusayaparikkhittena
analyzed: ārammaṇam ārabbha sa vatthukam avatthukam eva vā yathāraham avijjā anusaya parikkhittena

original: taṇhānusayamūlakena saṅkhārena janiyamānaṃ sampayuttehi pariggayhamānaṃ sahajātānamadhiṭṭhānabhāvena
analyzed: taṇhā anusaya mūlakena saṅkhārena janiyamānam sampayuttehi pariggayhamānam sahajātānam adhiṭṭhāna bhāvena

original: pubbaṅgamabhūtaṃ bhavantarapaṭisandhānavasena paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ mānasaṃ uppajjamānameva
analyzed: pubbaṅgam abhūtam bhava antara paṭisandhāna vasena paṭisandhi saṅkhātam mānasam uppajjamānam eva

original: patiṭṭhāti bhavantare.
analyzed: patiṭṭhāti bhavantare

original: 92. Maraṇāsannavīthiyaṃ panettha mandappavattāni pañceva javanāni pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni,
analyzed: maraṇa āsanna vīthiyam pana ittha manda pavattāni pañca iva javanāni pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni

original: tasmā yadi paccuppannārammaṇesu āpāthagatesu dharantesveva maraṇaṃ hoti, tadā paṭisandhibhavaṅgānampi
analyzed: tasmā yadi paccuppanna ārammaṇesu āpātha gatesu dharantesu eva maraṇam hoti tadā paṭisandhi bhavaṅgānam pi

original: paccuppannārammaṇatā labbhatīti katvā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhiyā chadvāraggahitaṃ kammanimittaṃ
analyzed: paccuppanna ārammaṇa tā labbhati iti katvā kāmāvacara paṭisandhiyā cha dvāra ggahitam kamma nimittam

original: gatinimittañca paccuppannamatītārammaṇaṃ upalabbhati, kammaṃ pana atītameva, tañca
analyzed: gati nimittam ca paccuppannam atīta ārammaṇam upalabbhati kammam pana atītam eva tat ca

original: manodvāraggahitaṃ, tāni pana sabbānipi parittadhammabhūtānevārammaṇāni.
analyzed: manaḥ dvāra ggahitam tāni pana sabbāni pi paritta dhamma bhūta aneva ārammaṇāni

original: 93. Rūpāvacarapaṭisandhiyā pana paññattibhūtaṃ kammanimittamevārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: rūpāvacara paṭisandhiyā pana paññatti bhūtam kamma nimittam eva ārammaṇam hoti

original: 94. Tathā arūpapaṭisandhiyā ca mahaggatabhūtaṃ paññattibhūtañca kammanimittameva yathārahamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tathā arūpa paṭisandhiyā ca mahaggata bhūtam paññatti bhūtam ca kamma nimittam eva yathāraham ārammaṇam hoti

original: 95. Asaññasattānaṃ pana jīvitanavakameva paṭisandhibhāvena patiṭṭhāti, tasmā te rūpapaṭisandhikā nāma.
analyzed: asaññasattānam pana jīvita navakam eva paṭisandhi bhāvena patiṭṭhāti tasmā te rūpa paṭisandhikāḥ nāma

original: 96. Arūpā arūpapaṭisandhikā.
analyzed: arūpā arūpa paṭisandhikā

original: 97. Sesā rūpārūpapaṭisandhikā.
analyzed: sesā rūpa arūpa paṭisandhikā

original: 98. Āruppacutiyā honti, heṭṭhimāruppavajjitā.
analyzed: āruppa cutiyā honti heṭṭhima āruppa vajjitā

original: Paramāruppasandhī ca, tathā kāmatihetukā.
analyzed: parama āruppa sandhī ca tathā kāmati hetukā

original: Rūpāvacaracutiyā, aheturahitā siyuṃ;
analyzed: rūpāvacara cutiyāḥ siyum

original: Sabbā kāmatihetumhā, kāmesveva panetarā.
analyzed: sabbā kāmati hetumhā kāmesu eva pana itarā

original: Ayamettha cutipaṭisandhikkamo.
analyzed: ayam ettha cuti paṭisandhi kkamaḥ

original: 99. Iccevaṃ gahitapaṭisandhikānaṃ pana paṭisandhinirodhānantarato pabhuti tamevārammaṇamārabbha
analyzed: icc evam gahita paṭisandhikānam pana paṭisandhi nirodha anantarataḥ pabhuti tam eva ārammaṇam ārabbha

original: tadeva cittaṃ yāva cuticittuppādā asati vīthicittuppāde bhavassa aṅgabhāvena bhavaṅgasantatisaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: tat eva cittam yāva cuti cittuppādāḥ asati vīthi cittuppāde bhavassa aṅga bhāvena bhavaṅga santati saṅkhātam

original: mānasaṃ abbocchinnaṃ nadīsoto viya pavattati.
analyzed: mānasam abbocchinnam nadī sotaḥ viya pavattati

original: 100. Pariyosāne ca cavanavasena cuticittaṃ hutvā nirujjhati.
analyzed: pariyosāne ca cavana vasena cuti cittam hutvā nirujjhati

original: 101. Tato parañca paṭisandhādayo rathacakkamiva yathākkamaṃ eva parivattantā pavattanti.
analyzed: tatas parañca paṭisandhā ādayaḥ ratha cakkam iva yathākkamam eva parivattantā pavattanti

original: 102. Paṭisandhibhavaṅgavīthiyo, cuticeha tathā bhavantare.
analyzed: paṭisandhi bhavaṅga vīthiyo tathā bhavantare

original: Puna sandhi bhavaṅgamiccayaṃ, parivattati cittasantati.
analyzed: punar

original: Paṭisaṅkhāyapanetamaddhuvaṃ, adhigantvā padamaccutaṃ budhā;
analyzed: adhigantvā padam at cutam budhā

original: Susamucchinnasinehabandhanā, samamessanti cirāya subbatā.
analyzed: su samucchinna sineha bandhanā cirāya subbatā

original: Iti abhidhammatthasaṅgahe vīthimuttasaṅgahavibhāgo nāma
analyzed: iti abhidhamma attha saṅgahe vīthimuttasaṅgahavibhāgaḥ nāma

original: Pañcamo paricchedo.
analyzed: pañcamo paricchedo

original: 6. Rūpaparicchedo
analyzed: rūpa paricchedaḥ

original: 1. Ettāvatā vibhattā hi, sappabhedappavattikā.
analyzed: ettāvatā vibhattā hi sa ppabheda ppavattikā

original: Cittacetasikā dhammā, rūpaṃ dāni pavuccati.
analyzed: citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ rūpam dāni pavuccati

original: 2. Samuddesā vibhāgā ca, samuṭṭhānā kalāpato.
analyzed: samuddesā vibhāgā ca samuṭṭhānā kalāpato

original: Pavattikkamato ceti, pañcadhā tattha saṅgaho.
analyzed: pavatti kkamataḥ ca iti pañcadhā tattha saṅgaho

original: Rūpasamuddeso
analyzed: rūpa samuddesaḥ

original: 3. Cattāri mahābhūtāni, catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpanti duvidhampetaṃ rūpaṃ ekādasavidhena saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: cattāri mahābhūtāni catunnam ca mahābhūtānam duvidham petam rūpam ekādasavidhena saṅgaham gacchati

original: 4. Kathaṃ? Pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu bhūtarūpaṃ nāma.
analyzed: katham pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyaḥ dhātu bhūta rūpam nāma

original: 5. Cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo pasādarūpaṃ nāma.
analyzed: cakkhu sotam ghānam jivhā kāyo pasāda rūpam nāma

original: 6. Rūpaṃ saddo gandho raso āpodhātuvivajjitaṃ bhūtattayasaṅkhātaṃ phoṭṭhabbaṃ gocararūpaṃ nāma.
analyzed: rūpam saddaḥ gandhaḥ rasaḥ āpaḥ dhātu vivajjitam bhūta ttaya saṅkhātam phoṭṭhabbam gocara rūpam nāma

original: 7. Itthattaṃ purisattaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ nāma.
analyzed: itthattam purisattam bhāvarūpam nāma

original: 8. Hadayavatthu hadayarūpaṃ nāma.
analyzed: hadayavatthu hadaya rūpam nāma

original: 9. Jīvitindriyaṃ jīvitarūpaṃ nāma.
analyzed: jīvitindriyam jīvita rūpam nāma

original: 10. Kabaḷīkāro āhāro āhārarūpaṃ nāma.
analyzed: kabaḷīkāraḥ āhāraḥ āhāra rūpam nāma

original: 11. Iti ca aṭṭhārasavidhampetaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvarūpaṃ salakkhaṇarūpaṃ nipphannarūpaṃ rūparūpaṃ sammasanarūpanti ca saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: iti ca aṭṭhārasavidham petam rūpam sabhāva rūpam salakkhaṇa rūpam nipphanna rūpam rūpa rūpam sammasana rūpam ca saṅgaham gacchati

original: 12. Ākāsadhātu paricchedarūpaṃ nāma.
analyzed: ākāsadhātu pariccheda rūpam nāma

original: 13. Kāyaviññatti vacīviññatti viññattirūpaṃ nāma.
analyzed: kāya viññatti vacī viññatti viññatti rūpam nāma

original: 14. Rūpassa lahutā mudutā kammaññatā viññattidvayaṃ vikārarūpaṃ nāma.
analyzed: rūpassa lahu tā mudu tā kammañña tā viññatti dvayam vikāra rūpam nāma

original: 15. Rūpassa upacayo santati jaratā aniccatā lakkhaṇarūpaṃ nāma.
analyzed: rūpassa upacayaḥ santati jara tā anicca tā lakkhaṇa rūpam nāma

original: 16. Jātirūpameva panettha upacayasantatināmena pavuccatīti ekādasavidhampetaṃ rūpaṃ aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ hoti sarūpavasena.
analyzed: jāti rūpam eva pana ittha upacaya santati nāmena pavuccati iti ekādasavidham petam rūpam aṭṭhavīsatividham hoti sarūpa vasena

original: 17. Kathaṃ –
analyzed: katham

original: Bhūtappasādavisayā, bhāvo hadayamiccapi;
analyzed: bhūta ppasāda visayāḥ bhāvaḥ hadayam id api

original: Jīvitāhārarūpehi, aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ tathā.
analyzed: jīvita āhāra rūpehi aṭṭhārasavidham tathā

original: Paricchedo ca viññatti, vikāro lakkhaṇanti ca;
analyzed: paricchedaḥ ca viññatti vikāraḥ lakkhaṇanti ca

original: Anipphannā dasa ceti, aṭṭhavīsavidhaṃ bhave.
analyzed: anipphannāḥ dasa ca iti aṭṭhavīsavidham bhave

original: Ayamettha rūpasamuddeso.
analyzed: ayam ettha rūpa samuddesaḥ

original: Rūpavibhāgo
analyzed: rūpa vibhāgaḥ

original: 18. Sabbañca panetaṃ rūpaṃ ahetukaṃ sappaccayaṃ sāsavaṃ saṅkhataṃ lokiyaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ anārammaṇaṃ appahātabbamevāti ekavidhampi ajjhattikabāhirādivasena bahudhā bhedaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: sabbam ca pana etam rūpam ahetukam sappaccayam sa āsavam saṅkhatam lokiyam kāmāvacaram anārammaṇam a pahātabbam eva ati ekavidham pi ajjhattika bāhira ādi vasena bahudhā bhedam gacchati

original: 19. Kathaṃ? Pasādasaṅkhātaṃ pañcavidhampi ajjhattikarūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ bāhirarūpaṃ.
analyzed: katham pasāda saṅkhātam pañcavidham pi ajjhattika rūpam nāma itaram bāhira rūpam

original: 20. Pasādahadayasaṅkhātaṃ chabbidhampi vatthurūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ avatthurūpaṃ.
analyzed: pasāda hadaya saṅkhātam chabbidham pi vatthu rūpam nāma itaram a vatthu rūpam

original: 21. Pasādaviññattisaṅkhātaṃ sattavidhampi dvārarūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ advārarūpaṃ.
analyzed: pasāda viññatti saṅkhātam sattavidham pi dvāra rūpam nāma itaram a dvāra rūpam

original: 22. Pasādabhāvajīvitasaṅkhātaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi indriyarūpaṃ nāma, itaraṃ anindriyarūpaṃ.
analyzed: pasāda bhāva jīvita saṅkhātam aṭṭhavidham pi indriya rūpam nāma itaram an indriya rūpam

original: 23. Pasādavisayasaṅkhātaṃ dvādasavidhampi oḷārikarūpaṃ santikerūpaṃ, sappaṭigharūpañca, itaraṃ sukhumarūpaṃ dūrerūpaṃ appaṭigharūpañca.
analyzed: pasāda visaya saṅkhātam dvādasavidham pi oḷārika rūpam santikerūpam sappaṭigha rūpam ca itaram sukhuma rūpam dūrerūpam appaṭigha rūpam ca

original: 24. Kammajaṃ upādinnarūpaṃ, itaraṃ anupādinnarūpaṃ.
analyzed: kamma jam upādinna rūpam itaram an upādinna rūpam

original: 25. Rūpāyatanaṃ sanidassanarūpaṃ, itaraṃ anidassanarūpaṃ.
analyzed: rūpa āyatanam sa nidassana rūpam itaram a nidassana rūpam

original: 26. Cakkhādidvayaṃ asampattavasena, ghānādittayaṃ sampattavasenāti pañcavidhampi gocaraggāhikarūpaṃ, itaraṃ agocaraggāhikarūpaṃ.
analyzed: cakkha ādi dvayam a sampatta vasena ghāna ādi tayam sampatta vasena ati pañcavidham pi gocara ggāhika rūpam itaram a gocara ggāhika rūpam

original: 27. Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā bhūtacatukkañceti aṭṭhavidhampi avinibbhogarūpaṃ, itaraṃ vinibbhogarūpaṃ.
analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ gandhaḥ rasaḥ ojā bhūta catukkam ca iti aṭṭhavidham pi a vinibbhoga rūpam itaram vinibbhoga rūpam

original: 28. Iccevamaṭṭhavīsati-vidhampi ca vicakkhaṇā.
analyzed: iccā ivam aṭṭhavīsatividham pi ca vicakkhaṇā

original: Ajjhattikādibhedena, vibhajanti yathārahaṃ.
analyzed: ajjhattika ādi bhedena vibhajanti yathāraham

original: Ayamettha rūpavibhāgo.
analyzed: ayam ettha rūpa vibhāgaḥ

original: Rūpasamuṭṭhānanayo
analyzed: rūpa samuṭṭhāna nayaḥ

original: 29. Kammaṃ cittaṃ utu āhāro ceti cattāri rūpasamuṭṭhānāni nāma.
analyzed: kammam cittam utu āhāro ca iti cattāri rūpa samuṭṭhānāni nāma

original: 30. Tattha kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacarañceti pañcavīsatividhampi kusalākusalakammamabhisaṅkhataṃ ajjhattikasantāne kammasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ paṭisandhimupādāya khaṇe khaṇe samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: tattha kāmāvacaram rūpāvacaram ca iti pañcavīsatividham pi kusala akusala kammam abhisaṅkhatam ajjhattika santāne kamma samuṭṭhāna rūpam paṭisandhim upādāya khaṇe khaṇe samuṭṭhāpeti

original: 31. Arūpavipākadvipañcaviññāṇavajjitaṃ pañcasattatividhampi cittaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgamupādāya jāyantameva samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: arūpa vipāka dvi pañca viññāṇa vajjitam pañca sattatividham pi cittam citta samuṭṭhāna rūpam paṭhama bhavaṅgam upādāya jāyantam eva samuṭṭhāpeti

original: 32. Tattha appanājavanaṃ iriyāpathampi sannāmeti.
analyzed: tattha appanājavanam iriyāpatham pi sannāma iti

original: 33. Voṭṭhabbanakāmāvacarajavanābhiññā pana viññattimpi samuṭṭhāpenti.
analyzed: voṭṭhabbana kāmāvacara javana abhiññā pana viññattim pi samuṭṭhāpenti

original: 34. Somanassajavanāni panettha terasa hasanampi janenti.
analyzed: somanassa javanāni pana ittha terasa hasanam pi janenti

original: 35. Sītuṇhotusamaññātā tejodhātu ṭhitippattāva utusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca yathārahaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: sītuṇhā utu samaññātā tejaḥ dhātu ṭhiti pattāvaḥ utu samuṭṭhāna rūpam ajjhattam ca bahiddhā ca yathāraham samuṭṭhāpeti

original: 36. Ojāsaṅkhāto āhāro āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ ajjhoharaṇakāle ṭhānappattova samuṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: ojā saṅkhātaḥ āhāraḥ āhāra samuṭṭhāna rūpam ajjhoharaṇa kāle ṭhāna ppattaḥ va samuṭṭhāpeti

original: 37. Tattha hadayaindriyarūpāni kammajāneva.
analyzed: tattha hadaya aindriya rūpāni kamma jāna eva

original: 38. Viññattidvayaṃ cittajameva.
analyzed: viññatti dvayam citta jam eva

original: 39. Saddo cittotujo.
analyzed: saddaḥ citta utujaḥ

original: 40. Lahutādittayaṃ utucittāhārehi sambhoti.
analyzed: utu citta āhārehi

original: 41. Avinibbhogarūpāni ceva ākāsadhātu ca. Catūhi sambhūtāni.
analyzed: a vinibbhoga rūpāni ca iva ākāsadhātu ca catūhi sambhūtāni

original: 42. Lakkhaṇarūpāni na kutoci jāyanti.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa rūpāni na kutoci jāyanti

original: 43. Aṭṭhārasa pannarasa, terasa dvādasāti ca.
analyzed: ca

original: Kammacittotukāhāra-jāni honti yathākkamaṃ.
analyzed: honti yathākkamam

original: 44. Jāyamānādirūpānaṃ, sabhāvattā hi kevalaṃ.
analyzed: sabhāvattā hi kevalam

original: Lakkhaṇāni na jāyanti, kehicīti pakāsitaṃ.
analyzed: lakkhaṇāni na jāyanti kehici iti pakāsitam

original: Ayamettha rūpasamuṭṭhānanayo.
analyzed: ayam ettha rūpa samuṭṭhāna nayaḥ

original: Kalāpayojanā
analyzed: kalāpa yojanā

original: 45. Ekuppādā ekanirodhā ekanissayā sahavuttino ekavīsati rūpakalāpā nāma.
analyzed: eka uppādāḥ eka nirodhāḥ eka nissayā sahavuttinaḥ ekavīsati rūpa kalāpāḥ nāma

original: 46. Tattha jīvitaṃ avinibbhogarūpañca cakkhunā saha cakkhudasakanti pavuccati. Tathā
analyzed: tattha jīvitam avinibbhoga rūpam ca cakkhunā saha cakkhudasakan ti pavuccati tathā

original: sotādīhi saddhiṃ sotadasakaṃ ghānadasakaṃ jivhādasakaṃ kāyadasakaṃ itthibhāvadasakaṃ
analyzed: sota ādīhi saddhim sota dasakam ghāna dasakam jivhā dasakam kāya dasakam itthi bhāva dasakam

original: pumbhāvadasakaṃ vatthudasakañceti yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Avinibbhogarūpameva jīvitena
analyzed: pumbhāva dasakam vatthu dasakam ca iti yathākkamam yojetabbam a vinibbhoga rūpam eva jīvitena

original: saha jīvitanavakanti pavuccati. Ime nava kammasamuṭṭhānakalāpā.
analyzed: saha jīvita navakan ti pavuccati ime nava kamma samuṭṭhāna kalāpā

original: 47. Avinibbhogarūpaṃ pana suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, tadeva kāyaviññattiyā saha kāyaviññattinavakaṃ,
analyzed: avinibbhoga rūpam pana suddhaṭṭhakam tat eva kāya viññattiyā saha kāya viññatti navakam

original: vacīviññattisaddehi saha vacīviññattidasakaṃ, lahutādīhi saddhiṃ lahutādekādasakaṃ,
analyzed: vacī viññatti saddehi saha vacī viññatti dasakam lahutādīhi saddhim lahutād ekādasakam

original: kāyaviññattilahutādidvādasakaṃ, vacīviññattisaddalahutāditerasakañceti cha cittasamuṭṭhānakalāpā.
analyzed: kāya viññatti lahuta ādi dvādasakam vacī viññatti saddala huta ādi terasakam ca iti cha citta samuṭṭhāna kalāpāḥ

original: 48. Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ saddanavakaṃ lahutādekādasakaṃ saddalahutādidvādasakañceti cattāro utusamuṭṭhānakalāpā.
analyzed: suddha ṭṭhakam sadda navakam lahutāda ekādasakam sadda lahutādi dvādasakam ca iti cattāro utu samuṭṭhāna kalāpā

original: 49. Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ lahutādekādasakañceti dveāhārasamuṭṭhānakalāpā.
analyzed: suddhaṭṭhakam dve āhāra samuṭṭhāna kalāpā

original: 50. Tattha suddhaṭṭhakaṃ saddanavakañceti dve utusamuṭṭhānakalāpā bahiddhāpi labbhanti, avasesā pana sabbepi ajjhattikamevāti.
analyzed: tattha suddhaṭṭhakam sadda navakam ca iti dve utu samuṭṭhāna kalāpā bahiddhā api labbhanti avasesā pana sabbe pi ajjhattikam eva ati

original: 51. Kammacittotukāhāra-samuṭṭhānā yathākkamaṃ.
analyzed: kamma citta ūtuka āhāra samuṭṭhānāḥ yathākkamam

original: Nava cha caturo dveti, kalāpā ekavīsati.
analyzed: nava cha caturaḥ dvā iti kalāpāḥ ekavīsati

original: Kalāpānaṃ pariccheda-lakkhaṇattā vicakkhaṇā;
analyzed: kalā pānam pariccheda lakkhaṇa ttā vicakkhaṇā

original: Na kalāpaṅgamiccāhu, ākāsaṃ lakkhaṇāni ca.
analyzed: na kalā paṅgam iccā āhu ākāsam lakkhaṇāni ca

original: Ayamettha kalāpayojanā.
analyzed: ayam ettha kalāpa yojanā

original: Rūpapavattikkamo
analyzed: rūpa pavatti kkamaḥ

original: 52. Sabbānipi panetāni rūpāni kāmaloke yathārahaṃ anūnāni pavattiyaṃ upalabbhanti.
analyzed: sabbāni api pana etāni rūpāni kāma loke yathāraham anūnāni pavattiyam upalabbhanti

original: 53. Paṭisandhiyaṃ pana saṃsedajānañceva opapātikānañca cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyabhāvavatthudasakasaṅkhātāni
analyzed: paṭisandhiyam pana saṃseda jānam ca iva opapātikānam ca cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya bhāva vatthu dasaka saṅkhātāni

original: satta dasakāni pātubhavanti ukkaṭṭhavasena, omakavasena pana cakkhusotaghānabhāvadasakāni
analyzed: satta dasakāni pātubhavanti ukkaṭṭha vasena omaka vasena pana cakkhu sota ghāna bhāva dasakāni

original: kadācipi na labbhanti, tasmā tesaṃ vasena kalāpahāni veditabbā.
analyzed: kadācipi na labbhanti tasmā tesam vasena kalā apahāni veditabbā

original: 54. Gabbhaseyyakasattānaṃ pana kāyabhāvavatthudasakasaṅkhātāni tīṇi dasakāni pātubhavanti,
analyzed: gabbhaseyyaka sattānam pana kāya bhāva vatthu dasaka saṅkhātāni tīṇi dasakāni pātubhavanti

original: tatthāpi bhāvadasakaṃ kadāci na labbhati, tato paraṃ pavattikāle kamena cakkhudasakādīni ca pātubhavanti.
analyzed: tattha api bhāva dasakam kadāci na labbhati tato param pavatti kāle kamena cakkhu dasaka ādīni ca pātubhavanti

original: 55. Iccevaṃ paṭisandhimupādāya kammasamuṭṭhānā, dutiyacittamupādāya cittasamuṭṭhānā,
analyzed: iccā ivam paṭisandhim upādāya kamma samuṭṭhānā dutiya cittam upādāya citta samuṭṭhānā

original: ṭhitikālamupādāya utusamuṭṭhānā, ojāpharaṇamupādāya āhārasamuṭṭhānā ceti catusamuṭṭhānarūpakalāpasantati
analyzed: ṭhiti kālam upādāya utu samuṭṭhānā ojā pharaṇam upādāya āhāra samuṭṭhānā ca iti catu samuṭṭhāna rūpa kalāpa santati

original: kāmaloke dīpajālā viya, nadīsoto viya ca yāvatāyukamabbocchinnā pavattati.
analyzed: kāma loke dīpa jālā viya nadī sotaḥ viya ca pavattati

original: 56. Maraṇakāle pana cuticittoparisattarasamacittassa ṭhitikālamupādāya kammajarūpāni
analyzed: maraṇa kāle pana cuti citta upari satta rasama cittassa ṭhiti kālam upādāya kamma ja rūpāni

original: na uppajjanti, puretaramuppannāni ca kammajarūpāni cuticittasamakālameva pavattitvā
analyzed: na uppajjanti puretaram uppannāni ca kamma ja rūpāni cuti citta sama kālam eva

original: nirujjhanti, tato paraṃ cittajāhārajarūpañca vocchijjati, tato paraṃ utusamuṭṭhānarūpaparamparā
analyzed: nirujjhanti tatas param citta ja āhāra ja rūpam ca vā ucchijjati tatas param utu samuṭṭhāna rūpa paramparā

original: yāva matakaḷevarasaṅkhātā pavattanti.
analyzed: yāva mataka ḷevara saṅkhātā pavattanti

original: 57. Iccevaṃ matasattānaṃ, punadeva bhavantare.
analyzed: id ca ivam mata sattānam punar eva bhavantare

original: Paṭisandhimupādāya, tathā rūpaṃ pavattati.
analyzed: paṭisandhim upādāya tathā rūpam pavattati

original: 58. Rūpaloke pana ghānajivhākāyabhāvadasakāni ca āhārajakalāpāni ca na labbhanti,
analyzed: rūpa loke pana ghāna jivhā kāya bhāva dasakāni ca āhāra ja kalāpāni ca na labbhanti

original: tasmā tesaṃ paṭisandhikāle cakkhusotavatthuvasena tīṇi dasakāni jīvitanavakañceti
analyzed: tasmā tesam paṭisandhi kāle cakkhu sota vatthu vasena tīṇi dasakāni jīvita navakam ca iti

original: cattāro kammasamuṭṭhānakalāpā, pavattiyaṃ cittotusamuṭṭhānā ca labbhanti.
analyzed: cattāro kamma samuṭṭhāna kalāpā pavattiyam citta utu samuṭṭhānā ca labbhanti

original: 59. Asaññasattānaṃ pana cakkhusotavatthusaddāpi na labbhanti, tathā sabbānipi cittajarūpāni,
analyzed: asaññasattānam pana cakkhu sota vatthu saddā api na labbhanti tathā sabbāni pi citta ja rūpāni

original: tasmā tesaṃ paṭisandhikāle jīvitanavakameva, pavattiyañca saddavajjitaṃ utusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ atiricchati.
analyzed: tasmā tesam paṭisandhi kāle jīvita navakam eva pavattiyam ca sadda vajjitam utu samuṭṭhāna rūpam atiricchati

original: 60. Iccevaṃ kāmarūpāsaññīsaṅkhātesu tīsu ṭhānesu paṭisandhipavattivasena duvidhā rūpappavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: icca evam kāmarūpa asaññī saṅkhātesu tīsu ṭhānesu paṭisandhi pavatti vasena duvidhā rūpa ppavatti veditabbā

original: 61. Aṭṭhavīsati kāmesu, honti tevīsa rūpisu.
analyzed: aṭṭhavīsati kāmesu honti tevīsa rūpisu

original: Sattaraseva saññīnaṃ, arūpe natthi kiñcipi.
analyzed: sattarasa iva saññīnam arūpe natthi kiñcipi

original: Saddo vikāro jaratā, maraṇañcopapattiyaṃ;
analyzed: saddo vikāraḥ jaratā maraṇam ca upapattiyaṃ

original: Na labbhanti pavatte tu, na kiñcipi na labbhati.
analyzed: na labbhanti pavatte tu na kiñcipi na labbhati

original: Ayamettha rūpapavattikkamo.
analyzed: ayam ettha rūpa pavatti kkamaḥ

original: Nibbānabhedo
analyzed: nibbāna bhedaḥ

original: 62. Nibbānaṃ pana lokuttarasaṅkhātaṃ catumaggañāṇena sacchikātabbaṃ maggaphalānamārammaṇabhūtaṃ vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya nikkhantattā nibbānanti pavuccati.
analyzed: nibbānam pana lokuttara saṅkhātam catu magga ñāṇena sacchikātabbam magga phalānam ārammaṇa bhūtam vāna saṅkhātāya taṇhāya nikkhanta ttā nibbānanti pavuccati

original: 63. Tadetaṃ sabhāvato ekavidhampi saupādisesanibbānadhātu anupādisesanibbānadhātu ceti duvidhaṃ hoti kāraṇapariyāyena.
analyzed: tat etam sabhāvataḥ ekavidham pi sa aupādisesa nibbāna dhātu anupādisesa nibbāna dhātu ca iti duvidham hoti kāraṇa pariyāyena

original: 64. Tathā suññataṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitañceti tividhaṃ hoti ākārabhedena.
analyzed: tathā suññatam animittam appaṇihitam ca iti tividham hoti ākāra bhedena

original: 65. Padamaccutamaccantaṃ, asaṅkhatamanuttaraṃ.
analyzed: asaṅkhatam anuttaram

original: Nibbānamiti bhāsanti, vānamuttā mahesayo.
analyzed: nibbānam iti bhāsanti vānamuttāḥ mahesayaḥ

original: Iti cittaṃ cetasikaṃ, rūpaṃ nibbānamiccapi;
analyzed: iti cittam cetasikam rūpam nibbānam icca api

original: Paramatthaṃ pakāsenti, catudhāva tathāgatā.
analyzed: paramattham pakāsenti catudhā va tathāgatā

original: Iti abhidhammatthasaṅgahe rūpasaṅgahavibhāgo nāma
analyzed: iti abhidhamma ttha saṅgahe rūpasaṅgahavibhāgaḥ nāma

original: Chaṭṭho paricchedo.
analyzed: chaṭṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: 7. Samuccayaparicchedo
analyzed: samuccaya paricchedaḥ

original: 1. Dvāsattatividhā vuttā, vatthudhammā salakkhaṇā.
analyzed: dvāsattatividhāḥ vuttāḥ vatthu dhammāḥ sa lakkhaṇā

original: Tesaṃ dāni yathāyogaṃ, pavakkhāmi samuccayaṃ.
analyzed: tesam dāni yathāyogam pavakkhāmi samuccayam

original: 2. Akusalasaṅgaho missakasaṅgaho bodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho sabbasaṅgaho ceti samuccayasaṅgaho catubbidho veditabbo.
analyzed: akusala saṅgahaḥ missaka saṅgahaḥ bodhi pakkhiya saṅgahaḥ sabba saṅgahaḥ ca iti samuccaya saṅgahaḥ catubbidhaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Akusalasaṅgaho
analyzed: akusala saṅgahaḥ

original: 3. Kathaṃ? Akusalasaṅgahe tāva cattāro āsavā – kāmāsavo bhavāsavo diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo.
analyzed: katham akusala saṅgahe tāva cattāro āsavā kāma āsavaḥ bhava āsavaḥ diṭṭha āsavaḥ avijja āsavaḥ

original: 4. Cattāro oghā – kāmogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjogho.
analyzed: cattāro oghā kāma oghaḥ bhava oghaḥ diṭṭha oghaḥ avijja oghaḥ

original: 5. Cattāro yogā – kāmayogo bhavayogo diṭṭhiyogo avijjāyogo.
analyzed: cattāro yogā kāma yogaḥ bhava yogaḥ diṭṭhi yogaḥ avijjā yogaḥ

original: 6. Cattāro ganthā – abhijjhākāyagantho, byāpādo kāyagantho, sīlabbataparāmāso kāyagantho, idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho.
analyzed: cattāro ganthāḥ abhijjhā kāya ganthaḥ byāpādaḥ kāya ganthaḥ sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ kāya ganthaḥ idaṃsacca abhinivesaḥ kāya ganthaḥ

original: 7. Cattāro upādānā – kāmupādānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānaṃ.
analyzed: cattāro upādānā kāma upādānam diṭṭha upādānam sīla bbata upādānam atta vāda upādānam

original: 8. Cha nīvaraṇāni – kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇaṃ vicikicchānīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: cha nīvaraṇāni kāmacchanda nīvaraṇam byāpāda nīvaraṇam thinamiddha nīvaraṇam uddhacca kukkucca nīvaraṇam vicikicchā nīvaraṇam avijjā nīvaraṇam

original: 9. Satta anusayā – kāmarāgānusayo bhavarāgānusayo paṭighānusayo mānānusayo diṭṭhānusayo vicikicchānusayo avijjānusayo.
analyzed: satta anusayā kāma rāga anusayaḥ bhava rāga anusayaḥ paṭigha anusayaḥ māna anusayaḥ diṭṭha anusayaḥ vicikicchā anusayaḥ avijjā anusayaḥ

original: 10. Dasa saṃyojanāni – kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ rūparāgasaṃyojanaṃ arūparāgasaṃyojanaṃ
analyzed: dasa saṃyojanāni kāma rāga saṃyojanam rūpa rāga saṃyojanam arūpa rāga saṃyojanam

original: paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ mānasaṃyojanaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ
analyzed: paṭigha saṃyojanam māna saṃyojanam diṭṭhi saṃyojanam sīlabbata parāmāsa saṃyojanam vicikicchā saṃyojanam

original: uddhaccasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ suttante.
analyzed: uddhacca saṃyojanam avijjā saṃyojanam suttante

original: 11. Aparānipi dasa saṃyojanāni – kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ
analyzed: aparāni pi dasa saṃyojanāni kāma rāga saṃyojanam bhava rāga saṃyojanam paṭigha saṃyojanam

original: mānasaṃyojanaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ sīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojanaṃ
analyzed: māna saṃyojanam diṭṭhi saṃyojanam sīlabbata parāmāsa saṃyojanam vicikicchā saṃyojanam

original: issāsaṃyojanaṃ macchariyasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojanaṃ abhidhamme.
analyzed: issā saṃyojanam macchariya saṃyojanam avijjā saṃyojanam abhidhamme

original: 12. Dasa kilesā – lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ.
analyzed: dasa kilesāḥ lobhaḥ dosaḥ mohaḥ mānaḥ diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinam uddhaccam ahirikam anottappam

original: 13. Āsavādīsu panettha kāmabhavanāmena tabbatthukā taṇhā adhippetā, sīlabbataparāmāso idaṃsaccābhiniveso attavādupādo ca tathāpavattaṃ diṭṭhigatameva pavuccati.
analyzed: āsava ādīsu pana ittha kāma bhava nāmena tad batthukā taṇhā adhippetā sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ idaṃsacca abhinivesaḥ ca tathāpavattam diṭṭhi gatam eva pavuccati

original: 14. Āsavoghā ca yogā ca,
analyzed: āsavaḥ oghā ca yogā ca

original: Tayo ganthā ca vatthuto;
analyzed: tayo ganthā ca vatthuto

original: Upādānā duve vuttā,

original: 19. Nava balāni – saddhābalaṃ vīriyabalaṃ satibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ paññābalaṃ hiribalaṃ ottappabalaṃ ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalaṃ.

analyzed: cattāraḥ adhipatī chanda adhipati vīriya adhipati citta adhipati vīmaṃsā adhipati

original: 21. Cattāro āhārā – kabaḷīkāro āhāro, phasso dutiyo, manosañcetanā tatiyā, viññāṇaṃ catutthaṃ.

original: 25. Jīvitindriyañca rūpārūpavasena duvidhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: jīvita indriyam ca rūpa arūpa vasena duvidham

analyzed: pañcaviññāṇesu jhāna aṅgāni avīriyesu balāni ahetukesu maggaṅgāni na labbhanti

original: 27. Tathā vicikicchācitte ekaggatā maggindriyabalabhāvaṃ na gacchati.
analyzed: tathā vicikicchā citte ekagga tā maggindriya bala bhāvam na gacchati

original: Soḷasindriyadhammā ca, baladhammā naveritā.

analyzed: vuttā sattadhā

analyzed: kusala ādi samākiṇṇaḥ vuttaḥ umissaka saṅgahaḥ

analyzed: bodhi pakkhiya saṅgahaḥ

analyzed: bodhi pakkhiya saṅgahe cattāro sati paṭṭhānā kāya anupassanā sati paṭṭhānam vedanā anupassanā sati paṭṭhānam citta anupassanā sati paṭṭhānam dhamma anupassanā sati paṭṭhānam

original: 31. Cattāro sammappadhānā uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ pahānāya vāyāmo, anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ
analyzed: cattāro sammappadhānāḥ uppannānam pāpakānam pahānāya vā āyāmaḥ anuppannānam pāpakānam

original: anuppādāya vāyāmo, anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ uppādāya vāyāmo, uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya vāyāmo.
analyzed: anuppādāya vā āyāmaḥ anuppannānam kusalānam uppādāya vā āyāmaḥ uppannānam kusalānam bhiyyobhāvāya vā āyāmaḥ

original: 32. Cattāro iddhipādā – chandiddhipādo vīriyiddhipādo cittiddhipādo vīmaṃsiddhipādo.
analyzed: cattāro iddhipādā chandiddhipādaḥ vīriyiddhipādaḥ cittiddhipādaḥ vīmaṃsiddhipādaḥ

analyzed: pañca indriyāni saddhindriyam vīriyindriyam satindriyam samādhindriyam pañcindriyam

original: 34. Pañca balāni – saddhābalaṃ vīriyabalaṃ satibalaṃ samādhibalaṃ paññābalaṃ.
analyzed: pañca balāni saddhā balam vīriya balam sati balam samādhi balam paññā balam

original: 35. Satta bojjhaṅgā – satisambojjhaṅgo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo pītisambojjhaṅgo passaddhisambojjhaṅgo samādhisambojjhaṅgo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo.
analyzed: satta bojjhaṅgāḥ sati sambojjhaṅgaḥ dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ vīriya sambojjhaṅgaḥ pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ passaddhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ upekkhā sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: 36. Aṭṭha maggaṅgāni – sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
analyzed: aṭṭha maggaṅgāni sammā diṭṭhi sammā saṅkappo sammā vācā sammā kammanto sammā ājīvo sammā vāyāmaḥ sammā sati sammā samādhi

original: 43. Pañcupādānakkhandhā – rūpupādānakkhandho vedanupādānakkhandho saññupādānakkhandho saṅkhārupādānakkhandho viññāṇupādānakkhandho.
analyzed: pañca upādānakkhandhāḥ rūpa upādānakkhandhaḥ vedanā upādānakkhandhaḥ saññu pādānakkhandhaḥ saṅkhāru pādānakkhandhaḥ viññāṇu pādānakkhandhaḥ

analyzed: manāyatanam rūpa āyatanam sadda āyatanam gandha āyatanam rasa āyatanam phoṭṭhabba āyatanam dhamma āyatanam

analyzed: aṭṭhārasa dhātuyaḥ cakkhu dhātu sota dhātu ghāna dhātu jivhā dhātu kāya dhātu rūpa dhātu

analyzed: ghāna viññāṇa dhātu jivhā viññāṇa dhātu kāya viññāṇa dhātu manaḥ dhātu dhammadhātu manas viññāṇa dhātu

original: 46. Cattāri ariyasaccāni – dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodho ariyasaccaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ.

original: 47. Ettha pana cetasikasukhumarūpanibbānavasena ekūnasattati dhammā dhammāyatanadhammadhātūti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti.
analyzed: ettha pana cetasika sukhuma rūpa nibbāna vasena ekūnasattati dhammāḥ dhammāyatana dhammadhātu uti saṅkham gacchanti

original: 48. Manāyatanameva sattaviññāṇadhātuvasena bhijjati.
analyzed: mana āyatanam eva satta viññāṇa dhātu vasena bhijjati

original: 49. Rūpañca vedanā saññā, sesacetasikā tathā.
analyzed: rūpam ca vedanā saññā sesa cetasikā tathā

original: 50. Pañcupādānakkhandhāti, tathā tebhūmakā matā.

analyzed: bheda abhāvena nibbānam khandha saṅgaha nissaṭam

original: 51. Dvārārammaṇabhedena, bhavantāyatanāni ca.
analyzed: dvāra ārammaṇa bhedena bhavanta āyatanāni ca

analyzed: dvāra ālamba tad uppanna pariyāyena

original: 52. Dukkhaṃ tebhūmakaṃ vaṭṭaṃ, taṇhā samudayo bhave.
analyzed: dukkham tebhūmakam vaṭṭam taṇhā samudayaḥ bhave

original: Nirodho nāma nibbānaṃ, maggo lokuttaro mato.
analyzed: nirodhaḥ nāma nibbānam maggo lokuttaraḥ mato

original: 53. Maggayuttā phalā ceva, catusaccavinissaṭā.
analyzed: magga yuttā phalā ca iva catu sacca vinissaṭā

original: Iti pañcappabhedena, pavutto sabbasaṅgaho.
analyzed: iti pañca ppabhedena pavuttaḥ sabba saṅgaho

original: Iti abhidhammatthasaṅgahe samuccayasaṅgahavibhāgo nāma
analyzed: iti abhidhamma ttha saṅgahe samuccaya saṅgaha vibhāgaḥ nāma

original: Sattamo paricchedo.
analyzed: sattamaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: 8. Paccayaparicchedo
analyzed: paccaya paricchedaḥ

original: 1. Yesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ, ye dhammā paccayā yathā.
analyzed: yesam saṅkhata dhammānam ye dhammā paccayāḥ yathā

original: Taṃ vibhāgamihedāni, pavakkhāmi yathārahaṃ.
analyzed: tam vibhāgam iha idāni pavakkhāmi yathāraham

original: 2. Paṭiccasamuppādanayo paṭṭhānanayo ceti paccayasaṅgaho duvidho veditabbo.
analyzed: paṭicca samuppāda nayaḥ paṭṭhāna nayaḥ ca iti paccaya saṅgahaḥ duvidhaḥ veditabbo

original: 3. Tattha tabbhāvabhāvībhāvākāramattopalakkhito paṭiccasamuppādanayo, paṭṭhānanayo pana āhaccapaccayaṭṭhitimārabbha pavuccati, ubhayaṃ pana vomissetvā papañcenti ācariyā.
analyzed: tattha tad bhāva bhāvībhāva ākāra matta upalakkhito paṭicca samuppāda nayo paṭṭhāna nayo pana āhacca paccaya ṭṭhitim ārabbha pavuccati ubhayam pana vomissetvā papañcenti ācariyāḥ

original: Paṭiccasamuppādanayo
analyzed: paṭicca samuppādanayo

original: 4. Tattha avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ,
analyzed: tattha avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇam viññāṇa paccayā nāma rūpam

original: nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā
analyzed: nāma rūpa paccayā saḷāyatanam saḷāyatana paccayā phassaḥ phassa paccayā vedanā vedanā paccayā

original: taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā
analyzed: taṇhā taṇhā paccayā upādānam upādāna paccayā bhavaḥ bhava paccayā jāti jāti paccayā

original: jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti. Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa
analyzed: jarā maraṇam soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā sambhavanti evam etassa kevalassa dukkha kkhandhassa

original: samudayo hotīti ayamettha paṭiccasamuppādanayo.
analyzed: samudayaḥ hoti iti ayam ettha

original: 5. Tattha tayo addhā dvādasaṅgāni vīsatākārā tisandhi catusaṅkhepā tīṇi vaṭṭāni dve mūlāni ca veditabbāni.
analyzed: tattha tayaḥ addhā dvādasaṅgāni vīsata ākārā ti sandhi catu saṅkhepā tīṇi vaṭṭāni dve mūlāni ca veditabbāni

original: 6. Kathaṃ? Avijjāsaṅkhārā atīto addhā, jātijarāmaraṇaṃ anāgato addhā, majjhe aṭṭha paccuppanno addhāti tayo addhā.
analyzed: katham avijjā saṅkhārāḥ atītaḥ addhā jāti jarā maraṇam anāgataḥ addhā majjhe aṭṭha paccuppanno addhā ati tayo addhā

original: 7. Avijjā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ nāmarūpaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ phasso vedanā taṇhā upādānaṃ bhavo jāti jarāmaraṇanti dvādasaṅgāni.
analyzed: avijjā saṅkhārāḥ viññāṇam nāma rūpam saḷāyatanam phassaḥ vedanā taṇhā upādānam bhavaḥ jāti jarā maraṇanti dvādasaṅgāni

original: 8. Sokādivacanaṃ panettha nissandaphalanidassanaṃ.
analyzed: soka ādi vacanam pana ittha nissanda phala nidassanam

original: 9. Avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇena panettha taṇhupādānabhavāpi gahitā bhavanti, tathā taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena
analyzed: avijjā saṅkhāra ggahaṇena pana ittha taṇhā upādāna bhavā api gahitāḥ bhavanti tathā taṇhā upādāna bhava ggahaṇena

original: ca avijjāsaṅkhārā, jātijarāmaraṇaggahaṇena ca viññāṇādiphalapañcakameva gahitanti katvā –
analyzed: ca avijjā saṅkhārāḥ jāti jarā maraṇa ggahaṇena ca viññāṇa ādi phala pañcakam eva gahitan ti katvā

original: 10. Atīte hetavo pañca, idāni phalapañcakaṃ.
analyzed: atīte pañca idāni phala pañcakam

original: Idāni hetavo pañca, āyatiṃ phalapañcakanti;
analyzed: idāni pañca āyatim

original: Vīsatākārā tisandhi, catusaṅkhepā ca bhavanti.
analyzed: ca bhavanti

original: 11. Avijjātaṇhupādānā ca kilesavaṭṭaṃ, kammabhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadeso saṅkhārā ca kammavaṭṭaṃ, upapattibhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadeso avasesā ca vipākavaṭṭanti tīṇi vaṭṭāni.
analyzed: ca kilesa vaṭṭam kamma bhava saṅkhātaḥ bhava eka deso saṅkhārā ca kamma vaṭṭam upapatti bhava saṅkhātaḥ bhava eka deso avasesā ca vipāka vaṭṭanti tīṇi vaṭṭāni

original: 12. Avijjātaṇhāvasena dve mūlāni ca veditabbāni.
analyzed: avijjā taṇhā vasena dve mūlāni ca veditabbāni

original: 13. Tesameva ca mūlānaṃ, nirodhena nirujjhati.
analyzed: tesam eva ca mūlānam nirodhena nirujjhati

original: Jarāmaraṇamucchāya, pīḷitānamabhiṇhaso;
analyzed: jarā maraṇam ucchāya

original: Āsavānaṃ samuppādā, avijjā ca pavattati.
analyzed: āsavānam samuppādāḥ avijjā ca pavattati

original: Vaṭṭamābandhamiccevaṃ, tebhūmakamanādikaṃ;
analyzed: vaṭṭam ābandham iti evam

original: Paṭiccasamuppādoti, paṭṭhapesi mahāmuni.
analyzed: paṭiccasamuppādo ti paṭṭhapesi mahā muni

original: Paṭṭhānanayo
analyzed: paṭṭhāna nayo

original: 14. Hetupaccayo ārammaṇapaccayo adhipatipaccayo anantarapaccayo samanantarapaccayo
analyzed: hetu paccayaḥ ārammaṇa paccayaḥ adhipati paccayaḥ anantara paccayaḥ samanantara paccayaḥ

original: sahajātapaccayo aññamaññapaccayo nissayapaccayo upanissayapaccayo purejātapaccayo
analyzed: sahajāta paccayaḥ aññamañña paccayaḥ nissaya paccayaḥ upanissaya paccayaḥ purejāta paccayaḥ

original: pacchājātapaccayo āsevanapaccayo kammapaccayo vipākapaccayo āhārapaccayo indriyapaccayo
analyzed: pacchājāta paccayaḥ āsevana paccayaḥ kamma paccayaḥ vipāka paccayaḥ āhāra paccayaḥ indriya paccayaḥ

original: jhānapaccayo maggapaccayo sampayuttapaccayo vippayuttapaccayo atthipaccayo natthipaccayo
analyzed: jhāna paccayaḥ magga paccayaḥ sampayutta paccayaḥ vippayutta paccayaḥ atthi paccayaḥ natthi paccayaḥ

original: vigatapaccayo avigatapaccayoti ayamettha paṭṭhānanayo.
analyzed: vigata paccayaḥ avigata paccayo ti ayam ettha paṭṭhāna nayo

original: 15. Chadhā nāmaṃ tu nāmassa, pañcadhā nāmarūpinaṃ.
analyzed: chadhā nāmam tu pañcadhā nāma rūpinam

original: Ekadhā puna rūpassa, rūpaṃ nāmassa cekadhā.
analyzed: ekadhā puna rūpassa rūpam nāmassa ca ekadhā

original: Paññattināmarūpāni, nāmassa duvidhā dvayaṃ;
analyzed: paññatti nāma rūpāni nāmassa duvidhā dvayam

original: Dvayassa navadhā ceti, chabbidhā paccayā kathaṃ.
analyzed: dvayassa navadhā ca iti chabbidhā paccayā katham

original: 16. Anantaraniruddhā cittacetasikā dhammā paṭuppannānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ
analyzed: anantara niruddhāḥ citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ paṭuppannānam citta cetasikānam dhammānam

original: anantarasamanantaranatthivigatavasena, purimāni javanāni pacchimānaṃ javanānaṃ āsevanavasena,
analyzed: anantara samanantara natthi vigata vasena purimāni javanāni pacchimānam javanānam āsevana vasena

original: sahajātā cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ sampayuttavaseneti ca chadhā nāmaṃ nāmassa paccayo hoti.
analyzed: sahajātāḥ citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ aññam aññam sampayutta vasena iti ca chadhā nāmam nāmassa paccayaḥ hoti

original: 17. Hetujhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ hetādivasena, sahajātā cetanā
analyzed: sahajātāni nāma rūpāṇi sahajātā cetanā

original: sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ, nānākkhaṇikā cetanā kammābhinibbattānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ kammavasena,
analyzed: sahajātānam nāma rūpānam nānākkhaṇikā cetanā kamma abhinibbattānam nāma rūpānam kamma vasena

original: vipākakkhandhā aññamaññaṃ sahajātānaṃ rūpānaṃ vipākavaseneti ca pañcadhā nāmaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ paccayo hoti.
analyzed: vipāka kkhandhāḥ aññamaññam sahajātānam rūpānam vipāka vasena iti ca pañcadhā nāmam nāma rūpānam paccayaḥ hoti

original: 18. Pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātavaseneti ekadhāva nāmaṃ rūpassa paccayo hoti.
analyzed: pacchājātāḥ citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājāta vasena iti ekadhāva nāmam rūpassa paccayaḥ hoti

original: 19. Cha vatthūni pavattiyaṃ sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ pañcārammaṇāni ca pañcaviññāṇavīthiyā purejātavaseneti ekadhāva rūpaṃ nāmassa paccayo hoti.
analyzed: cha vatthūni pavattiyam sattannam viññāṇa dhātūnam pañca ārammaṇāni ca pañca viññāṇa vīthiyā purejāta vasena iti ekadhā ava rūpam nāmassa paccayaḥ hoti

original: 20. Ārammaṇavasena upanissayavaseneti ca duvidhā paññattināmarūpāni nāmasseva paccayā honti.
analyzed: ārammaṇa vasena upanissaya vasena iti ca duvidhā paññatti nāma rūpāni nāmassa iva paccayāḥ honti

original: 21. Tattha rūpādivasena chabbidhaṃ hoti ārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: tattha rūpa ādi vasena chabbidham hoti ārammaṇam

original: 22. Upanissayo pana tividho hoti – ārammaṇūpanissayo anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayo ceti.
analyzed: upanissayaḥ pana tividhaḥ hoti ārammaṇa upanissayaḥ anantara upanissayaḥ pakata upanissayaḥ ca iti

original: 23. Tattha ārammaṇameva garukataṃ ārammaṇūpanissayo.
analyzed: tattha ārammaṇam eva garukatam ārammaṇa upanissayaḥ

original: 24. Anantaraniruddhā cittacetasikā dhammā anantarūpanissayo.
analyzed: anantara niruddhā citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ ananta rūpa nissayo

original: 25. Rāgādayo pana dhammā saddhādayo ca sukhaṃ dukkhaṃ puggalo bhojanaṃ utusenāsanañca
analyzed: rāga ādayaḥ pana dhammā saddhā ādayaḥ ca sukham dukkham puggalaḥ bhojanam utu senāsanam ca

original: yathārahaṃ ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca kusalādidhammānaṃ, kammaṃ vipākānanti ca bahudhā
analyzed: yathāraham ajjhattam ca bahiddhā ca kusala ādi dhammānam kammam ca bahudhā

original: hoti pakatūpanissayo.
analyzed: hoti pakata upanissayaḥ

original: 26. Adhipatisahajātaaññamaññanissayaāhāraindriyavippayuttaatthiavigatavaseneti yathārahaṃ navadhā nāmarūpāni nāmarūpānaṃ paccayā bhavanti.
analyzed: adhipati sahajāta aññamañña nissaya āhāra aindriya vippayutta atthi avigata vasena iti yathāraham navadhā nāma rūpāni nāma rūpānam paccayāḥ bhavanti

original: 27. Tattha garukatamārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇādhipativasena nāmānaṃ, sahajātādhipati catubbidhopi sahajātavasena sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca duvidho hoti adhipatipaccayo.
analyzed: tattha garukatam ārammaṇam ārammaṇa adhipati vasena sahajāta adhipati catubbidhaḥ api sahajāta vasena sahajātānam nāma rūpānam ti ca duvidhaḥ hoti adhipati paccayo

original: 28. Cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ sahajātarūpānañca, mahābhūtā aññamaññaṃ upādārūpānañca, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamaññanti ca tividho hoti sahajātapaccayo.
analyzed: citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ aññam aññam sahajāta rūpānañca mahābhūtāḥ aññam aññam upādā rūpānañca paṭisandhi khaṇe vatthu vipākāḥ aññam aññanti ca tividhaḥ hoti sahajāta paccayaḥ

original: 29. Cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ, mahābhūtā aññamaññaṃ, paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamaññanti ca tividho hoti aññamaññapaccayo.
analyzed: citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ aññam aññam mahābhūtāḥ aññam aññam paṭisandhi kkhaṇe vatthu vipākāḥ aññam aññanti ca tividhaḥ hoti aññamañña paccayo

original: 30. Cittacetasikā dhammā aññamaññaṃ sahajātarūpānañca, mahābhūtā aññamaññaṃ upādārūpānañca, cha vatthūni sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnanti ca tividho hoti nissayapaccayo.
analyzed: citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ aññamaññam sahajāta rūpānañca mahābhūtāḥ aññamaññam upādā rūpānañca cha vatthūni sattannam viññāṇa dhātūnan ti ca tividhaḥ hoti nissaya paccayo

original: 31. Kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa, arūpino āhārā sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca duvidho hoti āhārapaccayo.
analyzed: kabaḷīkāraḥ āhāro imassa kāyassa arūpino āhārā sahajātānam ca duvidhaḥ hoti āhāra paccayo

original: 32. Pañca pasādā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ, rūpajīvitindriyaṃ upādinnarūpānaṃ, arūpino indriyā sahajātānaṃ nāmarūpānanti ca tividho hoti indriyapaccayo.
analyzed: pañca pasādā pañcannam viññāṇānam rūpa jīvita indriyam upādinna rūpānam arūpinaḥ indriyā sahajātānam nāma rūpānam ti ca tividhaḥ hoti indriya paccayo

original: 33. Okkantikkhaṇe vatthu vipākānaṃ, cittacetasikā dhammā sahajātarūpānaṃ sahajātavasena,
analyzed: okkanti khaṇe vatthu vipākānam citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ sahajāta rūpānam sahajāta vasena

original: pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātavasena cha vatthūni
analyzed: pacchājātā citta cetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājāta vasena cha vatthūni

original: pavattiyaṃ sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ purejātavaseneti ca tividho hoti vippayuttapaccayo.
analyzed: pavattiyam sattannam viññāṇa dhātūnam purejāta vasena iti ca tividhaḥ hoti vippayutta paccayo

original: 34. Sahajātaṃ purejātaṃ, pacchājātañca sabbathā.
analyzed: sahajātam purejātam pacchājātam ca sabbathā

original: Kabaḷīkāro āhāro, rūpajīvitamiccayanti. –
analyzed: kabaḷīkāraḥ āhāraḥ rūpa jīvitam iccayanti

original: Pañcavidho hoti atthipaccayo avigatapaccayo ca.
analyzed: pañcavidhaḥ hoti atthi paccayaḥ avigata paccayo ca

original: 35. Ārammaṇūpanissayakammatthipaccayesu ca sabbepi paccayā samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
analyzed: ārammaṇa upanissaya kammatthi paccayesu ca sabbe pi paccayā samodhānam gacchanti

original: 36. Sahajātarūpanti panettha sabbatthāpi pavatte cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ, paṭisandhiyaṃ kaṭattārūpānañca vasena duvidhaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sahajāta rūpam ti pana ittha sabbattha api pavatte citta samuṭṭhānānam paṭisandhiyam kaṭattā rūpānam ca vasena duvidham hoti iti veditabbam

original: 37. Iti tekālikā dhammā, kālamuttā ca sambhavā.
analyzed: iti tekālikā dhammā kālamuttā ca sambhavā

original: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, saṅkhatāsaṅkhatā tathā;
analyzed: ajjhattam ca bahiddhā ca tathā

original: Paññattināmarūpānaṃ, vasena tividhā ṭhitā;
analyzed: paññatti nāma rūpānam vasena tividhā ṭhitā

original: Paccayā nāma paṭṭhāne, catuvīsati sabbathā.
analyzed: paccayā nāma paṭṭhāne catuvīsati sabbathā

original: 38. Tattha rūpadhammā rūpakkhandhova, cittacetasikasaṅkhātā cattāro arūpino khandhā, nibbānañceti pañcavidhampi arūpanti ca nāmanti ca pavuccati.
analyzed: tattha rūpa dhammā rūpa kkhandho va citta cetasika saṅkhātā cattāro arūpino khandhāḥ nibbānam ca iti pañcavidham pi arūpanti ca nāmanti ca pavuccati

original: Paññattibhedo
analyzed: paññatti bhedaḥ

original: 39. Tato avasesā paññatti pana paññāpiyattā paññatti, paññāpanato paññattīti ca duvidhā hoti.
analyzed: tatas avasesā paññatti pana paññāpiyattā paññatti paññāpanato paññatti iti ca duvidhā hoti

original: 40. Kathaṃ? Taṃtaṃbhūtavipariṇāmākāramupādāya tathā tathā paññattā bhūmipabbatādikā,
analyzed: katham taṃ taṃ bhūta vipariṇāma ākāram upādāya tathā tathā paññattā bhūmi pabbata ādikā

original: sambhārasannivesākāramupādāya geharathasakaṭādikā, khandhapañcakamupādāya purisapuggalādikā,
analyzed: sambhāra sannivesa ākāram upādāya geha ratha sakaṭa ādikā khandha pañcakam upādāya purisa puggala ādikā

original: candāvaṭṭanādikamupādāya disākālādikā, asamphuṭṭhākāramupādāya kūpaguhādikā, taṃtaṃbhūtanimittaṃ
analyzed: candā avaṭṭana ādikam upādāya disā kāla ādikā a samphuṭṭha ākāram upādāya kūpa guhā ādikā taṃ taṃ bhūta nimittam

original: bhāvanāvisesañca upādāya kasiṇanimittādikā ceti evamādippabhedā pana paramatthato
analyzed: bhāvanā visesam ca upādāya kasiṇa nimitta ādikā ca iti evamādi ppabhedā pana paramatthato

original: avijjamānāpi atthacchāyākārena cittuppādānamārammaṇabhūtā taṃ taṃ upādāya upanidhāya
analyzed: a vijjamānā api attha chāyākārena citta uppādānam ārammaṇa bhūtā tam tam upādāya upanidhāya

original: kāraṇaṃ katvā tathā tathā parikappiyamānā saṅkhāyati samaññāyati voharīyati paññāpīyatīti
analyzed: kāraṇam katvā tathā tathā parikappiyamānā saṅkhāyati samaññāyati voharīyati paññāpīyati iti

original: paññattīti pavuccati. Ayaṃ paññatti paññāpiyattā paññatti nāma.
analyzed: paññattī iti pavuccati ayam paññatti paññāpiyattā paññatti nāma

original: 41. Paññāpanato paññatti pana nāmanāmakammādināmena paridīpitā, sā vijjamānapaññatti
analyzed: paññāpanataḥ paññatti pana nāma nāma kamma ādi nāmena paridīpitā sā vijjamāna paññatti

original: avijjamānapaññatti, vijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti, avijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti,
analyzed: avijjamāna paññatti vijjamānena avijjamāna paññatti avijjamānena vijjamāna paññatti

original: vijjamānena vijjamānapaññatti, avijjamānena avijjamānapaññatti ceti chabbidhā hoti.
analyzed: vijjamānena vijjamāna paññatti avijjamānena avijjamāna paññatti ca iti chabbidhā hoti

original: 42. Tattha yadā pana paramatthato vijjamānaṃ rūpavedanādiṃ etāya paññāpenti, tadāyaṃ
analyzed: tattha yadā pana paramatthataḥ vijjamānam rūpa vedanā ādim etāya paññāpenti tadā ayam

original: vijjamānapaññatti. Yadā pana paramatthato avijjamānaṃ bhūmipabbatādiṃ etāya paññāpenti,
analyzed: vijjamāna paññatti yadā pana paramatthataḥ a vijjamānam bhūmi pabbata ādim etāya paññāpenti

original: tadāyaṃ avijjamānapaññattīti pavuccati. Ubhinnaṃ pana vomissakavasena sesā yathākkamaṃ
analyzed: tadā ayam avijjamānapaññattī iti pavuccati ubhinnam pana vomissaka vasena sesāḥ yathākkamam

original: chaḷabhiñño, itthisaddo, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, rājaputtoti ca veditabbā.
analyzed: chaḷabhiñño itthi saddo cakkhu viññāṇam rāja putto ti ca veditabbā

original: 43. Vacīghosānusārena, sotaviññāṇavīthiyā.
analyzed: vacī ghosa anusārena sota viññāṇa vīthiyā

original: Pavatthānantaruppanna-manodvārassa gocarā.
analyzed: gocarā

original: Atthā yassānusārena, viññāyanti tato paraṃ;
analyzed: atthā yassa anusārena viññāyanti tato param

original: Sāyaṃ paññatti viññeyyā, lokasaṅketanimmitā.
analyzed: sāyam paññatti viññeyyā loka saṅketa nimmitā

original: Iti abhidhammatthasaṅgahe paccayasaṅgahavibhāgo nāma
analyzed: iti abhidhamma attha saṅgahe paccayasaṅgahavibhāgaḥ nāma

original: Aṭṭhamo paricchedo.
analyzed: aṭṭhamaḥ paricchedo

original: 9. Kammaṭṭhānaparicchedo
analyzed: kammaṭṭhāna paricchedaḥ

original: 1. Samathavipassanānaṃ, bhāvanānamito paraṃ.
analyzed: samatha vipassanānam bhāvanānam itas param

original: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ pavakkhāmi, duvidhampi yathākkamaṃ.
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānam pavakkhāmi duvidham pi yathākkamam

original: Samathakammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: samatha kammaṭṭhānam

original: 2. Tattha samathasaṅgahe tāva dasa kasiṇāni, dasa asubhā, dasa anussatiyo, catasso
analyzed: tattha samatha saṅgahe tāva dasa kasiṇāni dasa asubhāḥ dasa anussatiyaḥ catasso

original: appamaññāyo, ekā saññā, ekaṃ vavatthānaṃ, cattāro āruppā ceti sattavidhena samathakammaṭṭhānasaṅgaho.
analyzed: ekā saññā ekam vavatthānam cattāro āruppā ca iti sattavidhena samatha kammaṭṭhāna saṅgaho

original: Caritabhedo
analyzed: carita bhedo

original: 3. Rāgacaritā dosacaritā mohacaritā saddhācaritā buddhicaritā vitakkacaritā ceti chabbidhena caritasaṅgaho.
analyzed: rāga caritā dosa caritā moha caritā saddhā caritā buddhi caritā vitakka caritā ca iti chabbidhena carita saṅgahaḥ

original: Bhāvanābhedo
analyzed: bhāvanā bhedaḥ

original: 4. Parikammabhāvanā upacārabhāvanā appanābhāvanā ceti tisso bhāvanā.
analyzed: parikamma bhāvanā upacāra bhāvanā appanā bhāvanā ca iti tissaḥ bhāvanā

original: Nimittabhedo
analyzed: nimitta bhedaḥ

original: 5. Parikammanimittaṃ uggahanimittaṃ paṭibhāganimittañceti tīṇi nimittāni ca veditabbāni.
analyzed: parikamma nimittam uggaha nimittam paṭibhāga nimittam ca iti tīṇi nimittāni ca veditabbāni

original: 6. Kathaṃ? Pathavīkasiṇaṃ āpokasiṇaṃ tejokasiṇaṃ vāyokasiṇaṃ nīlakasiṇaṃ pītakasiṇaṃ lohitakasiṇaṃ odātakasiṇaṃ ākāsakasiṇaṃ ālokakasiṇañceti imāni dasa kasiṇāni nāma.
analyzed: katham pathavī kasiṇam āpaḥ kasiṇam tejaḥ kasiṇam vāyo kasiṇam nīla kasiṇam pīta kasiṇam lohita kasiṇam odāta kasiṇam ākāsa kasiṇam āloka kasiṇam ca iti imāni dasa kasiṇāni nāma

original: 7. Uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakaṃ vicchiddakaṃ vikkhāyitakaṃ vikkhittakaṃ hatavikkhittakaṃ lohitakaṃ puḷavakaṃ aṭṭhikañceti ime dasa asubhā nāma.
analyzed: uddhumātakam vinīlakam vipubbakam vicchiddakam vikkhāyitakam vikkhittakam hatavikkhittakam lohitakam puḷavakam aṭṭhikam ca iti ime dasa asubhāḥ nāma

original: 8. Buddhānussati dhammānussati saṃghānussati sīlānussati cāgānussati devatānussati upasamānussati maraṇānussati kāyagatāsati ānāpānassati ceti imā dasa anussatiyo nāma.
analyzed: buddha anussati dhamma anussati saṃgha anussati sīla anussati cāga anussati devatā anussati upasama anussati maraṇa anussati kāyagata asati āna apāna ssati ca iti imāḥ dasa anussatiyaḥ nāma

original: 9. Mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhā ceti imā catasso appamaññāyo nāma, brahmavihāroti ca pavuccati.
analyzed: mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhā ca iti imā catasso appamaññāyaḥ nāma brahmavihāro ti ca pavuccati

original: 10. Āhārepaṭikūlasaññā ekā saññā nāma.
analyzed: āhāre paṭikūla saññā ekā saññā nāma

original: 11. Catudhātuvavatthānaṃ ekaṃ vavatthānaṃ nāma.
analyzed: catu dhātu vavatthānam ekam vavatthānam nāma

original: 12. Ākāsānañcāyatanādayo cattāro āruppā nāmāti sabbathāpi samathaniddese cattālīsa kammaṭṭhānāni bhavanti.
analyzed: ākāsānañcāyatana ādayo cattāro āruppāḥ nāma ati sabbathā api samatha niddese cattālīsa kammaṭṭhānāni bhavanti

original: Sappāyabhedo
analyzed: sa pāya bhedaḥ

original: 13. Caritāsu pana dasa asubhā kāyagatāsatisaṅkhātā koṭṭhāsabhāvanā ca rāgacaritassa sappāyā.
analyzed: caritāsu pana dasa asubhā kāya gata asati saṅkhātā koṭṭhāsa bhāvanā ca rāga caritassa sappāyā

original: 14. Catasso appamaññāyo nīlādīni ca cattāri kasiṇāni dosacaritassa.
analyzed: catasso appamaññāyaḥ nīla ādīni ca cattāri kasiṇāni dosa caritassa

original: 15. Ānāpānaṃ mohacaritassa vitakkacaritassa ca,
analyzed: āna apānam moha caritassa vitakka caritassa ca

original: 16. Buddhānussatiādayo cha saddhācaritassa.
analyzed: buddha anussati ādayaḥ cha saddhā caritassa

original: 17. Maraṇaupasamasaññāvavatthānāni buddhicaritassa.
analyzed: maraṇa aupasama saññā vavatthānāni buddhi caritassa

original: 18. Sesāni pana sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni sabbesampi sappāyāni, tatthāpi kasiṇesu puthulaṃ mohacaritassa, khuddakaṃ vitakkacaritassevāti.
analyzed: sesāni pana sabbāni api kammaṭṭhānāni sabbesam pi sappāyāni tattha api kasiṇesu puthulam moha caritassa khuddakam vitakka caritassa iva āti

original: Ayamettha sappāyabhedo.
analyzed: ayam ettha sa pāya bhedo

original: Bhāvanābhedo
analyzed: bhāvanā bhedaḥ

original: 19. Bhāvanāsu sabbatthāpi parikammabhāvanā labbhateva, buddhānussatiādīsu aṭṭhasu saññāvavatthānesu cāti dasasukammaṭṭhānesu upacārabhāvanāva sampajjati, natthi appanā.
analyzed: bhāvanāsu sabbattha api parikamma bhāvanā buddha anussati ādīsu aṭṭhasu saññā vavatthānesu ca ati dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu upacāra bhāvanā va sampajjati natthi appanā

original: 20. Sesesu pana samatiṃsakammaṭṭhānesu appanābhāvanāpi sampajjati.
analyzed: sesesu pana sama tiṃsa kammaṭṭhānesu appanā bhāvanā api sampajjati

original: 21. Tatthāpi dasa kasiṇāni ānāpānañca pañcakajjhānikāni.
analyzed: tattha api dasa kasiṇāni āna apānam ca pañcakajjhānikāni

original: 22. Dasa asubhā kāyagatāsati ca paṭhamajjhānikā.
analyzed: dasa asubhā kāyagatā asati ca

original: 23. Mettādayo tayo catukkajjhānikā.
analyzed: metta ādayaḥ tayo

original: 24. Upekkhā pañcamajjhānikāti chabbīsati rūpāvacarajjhānikāni kammaṭṭhānāni.
analyzed: upekkhā pañcama jhānikā ati chabbīsati rūpāvacara jhānikāni kammaṭṭhānāni

original: 25. Cattāro pana āruppā āruppajjhānikāti.
analyzed: cattāro pana āruppāḥ āruppa jhānikā

original: Ayamettha bhāvanābhedo.
analyzed: ayam ettha bhāvanā bhedaḥ

original: Gocarabhedo
analyzed: gocara bhedaḥ

original: 26. Nimittesu pana parikammanimittaṃ uggahanimittañca sabbatthāpi yathārahaṃ pariyāyena labbhanteva.
analyzed: nimittesu pana parikamma nimittam uggaha nimittam ca sabbattha api yathāraham pariyāyena labbhantā eva

original: 27. Paṭibhāganimittaṃ pana kasiṇāsubhakoṭṭhāsaānāpānesveva labbhati, tattha hi paṭibhāganimittamārabbha upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhi ca pavattanti.
analyzed: paṭibhāga nimittam pana kasiṇa asubha koṭṭhāsa āna apānesu eva labbhati tattha hi paṭibhāga nimittam ārabbha upacāra samādhi appanā samādhi ca pavattanti

original: 28. Kathaṃ? Ādikammikassa hi pathavīmaṇḍalādīsu nimittaṃ uggaṇhantassa tamārammaṇaṃ parikammanimittanti pavuccati, sā ca bhāvanā parikammabhāvanā nāma.
analyzed: katham ādikammikassa hi pathavī maṇḍala ādīsu nimittam uggaṇhantassa tam ārammaṇam parikamma nimittanti pavuccati sā ca bhāvanā parikamma bhāvanā nāma

original: 29. Yadā pana taṃ nimittaṃ cittena samuggahitaṃ hoti, cakkhunā passantasseva manodvārassa āpāthamāgataṃ, tadā tamevārammaṇaṃ uggahanimittaṃ nāma, sā ca bhāvanā samādhiyati.
analyzed: yadā pana tam nimittam cittena samuggahitam hoti cakkhunā passantassa iva manodvārassa āpātham āgatam tadā tam eva ārammaṇam uggaha nimittam nāma sā ca bhāvanā samādhiyati

original: 30. Tathā samāhitassa panetassa tato paraṃ tasmiṃ uggahanimitte parikammasamādhinā
analyzed: tathā samāhitassa pana itassa tato param tasmin uggaha nimitte parikamma samādhinā

original: bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa yadā tappaṭibhāgaṃ vatthudhammavimuccitaṃ paññattisaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: bhāvanam anuyuñjantassa yadā tad paṭibhāgam vatthu dhamma vimuccitam paññatti saṅkhātam

original: bhāvanāmayamārammaṇaṃ citte sannisannaṃ samappitaṃ hoti, tadā taṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ
analyzed: bhāvanā mayam ārammaṇam citte sannisannam samappitam hoti tadā tam paṭibhāga nimittam

original: samuppannanti pavuccati.
analyzed: samuppannan ti pavuccati

original: 31. Tato paṭṭhāya paripanthavippahīnā kāmāvacarasamādhisaṅkhātā upacārabhāvanā nipphannā nāma hoti.
analyzed: tato paṭṭhāya paripantha vippahīnā kāmāvacara samādhi saṅkhātā upacāra bhāvanā nipphannā nāma hoti

original: 32. Tato paraṃ tameva paribhāganimittaṃ upacārasamādhinā samāsevantassa rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānamappeti.
analyzed: tatas param tam eva paribhāga nimittam upacāra samādhinā samāsevantassa rūpāvacara paṭhamajjhānam appeti

original: 33. Tato paraṃ tameva paṭhamajjhānaṃ āvajjanaṃ samāpajjanaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tatas param tam eva paṭhama jhānam āvajjanam samāpajjanam adhiṭṭhānam vuṭṭhānam

original: paccavekkhaṇā ceti imāhi pañcahi vasitāhi vasībhūtaṃ katvā vitakkādikamoḷārikaṅgaṃ
analyzed: paccavekkhaṇā ca iti imāhi pañcahi vasitāhi vasībhūtam katvā vitakka ādikam oḷārika aṅgam

original: pahānāya vicārādisukhumaṅgupattiyā padahato yathākkamaṃ dutiyajjhānādayo yathārahamappenti.
analyzed: pahānāya vicāra ādi sukhum aṅgu pattiyā padahataḥ yathākkamam dutiya jhāna ādayaḥ yathāraham appenti

original: 34. Iccevaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīsu dvāvīsatikammaṭṭhānesu paṭibhāganimittamupalabbhati.
analyzed: iti ca evam pathavī kasiṇa ādīsu dvāvīsati kammaṭṭhānesu paṭibhāga nimittam upalabbhati

original: 35. Avasesesu pana appamaññā sattapaññattiyaṃ pavattanti.
analyzed: avasesesu pana appamaññā satta paññattiyam pavattanti

original: 36. Ākāsavajjitakasiṇesu pana yaṃ kiñci kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā laddhamākāsaṃ anantavasena parikammaṃ karontassa paṭhamāruppamappeti.
analyzed: ākāsa vajjita kasiṇesu pana yam kiñci kasiṇam ugghāṭetvā laddham ākāsam ananta vasena parikammam karontassa paṭhama āruppam appeti

original: 37. Tameva paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ anantavasena parikammaṃ karontassa dutiyāruppamappeti.
analyzed: tam eva paṭhama āruppa viññāṇam ananta vasena parikammam karontassa dutiya āruppam appeti

original: 38. Tameva paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvaṃ pana “natthi kiñcī”ti parikammaṃ karontassa tatiyāruppamappeti.
analyzed: tam eva paṭhama āruppa viññāṇa abhāvam pana natthi kiñci iti parikammam karontassa tatiya āruppam appeti

original: 39. Tatiyāruppaṃ “santametaṃ, paṇītameta”nti parikammaṃ karontassa catutthāruppamappeti.
analyzed: tatiya āruppam santam etam paṇītam etam ti parikammam karontassa catuttha āruppam appeti

original: 40. Avasesesu ca dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu buddhaguṇādikamārammaṇamārabbha parikammaṃ katvā tasmiṃ nimitte sādhukamuggahite tattheva parikammañca samādhiyati, upacāro ca sampajjati.
analyzed: avasesesu ca dasasu kammaṭṭhānesu buddha guṇa ādikam ārammaṇam ārabbha parikammam katvā tasmin nimitte sādhukam uggahite tattha eva parikamman ca samādhiyati upacāro ca sampajjati

original: 41. Abhiññāvasena pavattamānaṃ pana rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānaṃ abhiññāpādakapañcamajjhānā
analyzed: abhiññā vasena pavattamānam pana rūpāvacara pañcamajjhānam abhiññā pādaka pañcamajjhānā

original: vuṭṭhahitvā adhiṭṭheyyādikamāvajjetvā parikammaṃ karontassa rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu yathārahamappeti.
analyzed: vuṭṭhahitvā adhiṭṭheyya ādikam āvajjetvā parikammam karontassa rūpa ādīsu ārammaṇesu yathāraham appeti

original: 42. Abhiññā ca nāma –
analyzed: abhiññā ca nāma

original: Iddhividhaṃ dibbasotaṃ, paracittavijānanā;
analyzed: iddhi vidham dibba sotam para citta vijānanā

original: Pubbenivāsānussati, dibbacakkhūti pañcadhā.
analyzed: pubbenivāsa anussati dibba cakkhu iti pañcadhā

original: Ayamettha gocarabhedo.
analyzed: ayam ettha gocara bhedaḥ

original: Niṭṭhito ca samathakammaṭṭhānanayo.
analyzed: niṭṭhitaḥ ca samatha kammaṭṭhāna nayaḥ

original: Vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: vipassanā kammaṭṭhānam

original: Visuddhibhedo
analyzed: visuddhi bhedaḥ

original: 43. Vipassanākammaṭṭhāne pana sīlavisuddhi cittavisuddhi diṭṭhivisuddhi kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi
analyzed: vipassanā kammaṭṭhāne pana sīla visuddhi citta visuddhi diṭṭhi visuddhi kaṅkhā vitaraṇa visuddhi

original: maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi ñāṇadassanavisuddhi ceti
analyzed: magga amagga ñāṇa dassana visuddhi paṭipadā ñāṇa dassana visuddhi ñāṇa dassana visuddhi ca iti

original: sattavidhena visuddhisaṅgaho.
analyzed: sattavidhena visuddhi saṅgahaḥ

original: 44. Aniccalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ anattalakkhaṇañceti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni.
analyzed: anicca lakkhaṇam dukkha lakkhaṇam anatta lakkhaṇañca iti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni

original: 45. Aniccānupassanā dukkhānupassanā anattānupassanā ceti tisso anupassanā.
analyzed: anicca anupassanā dukkha anupassanā anatta anupassanā ca iti tissaḥ anupassanāḥ

original: 46. Sammasanañāṇaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ bhaṅgañāṇaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ ādīnavañāṇaṃ nibbidāñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ anulomañāṇañceti dasa vipassanāñāṇāni.
analyzed: sammasana ñāṇam udaya bbaya ñāṇam bhaṅga ñāṇam bhaya ñāṇam ādīnava ñāṇam nibbidā ñāṇam muccitu kamyatā ñāṇam paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇam saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇam anuloma ñāṇañca iti dasa vipassanā ñāṇāni

original: 47. Suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho ceti tayo vimokkhā.
analyzed: suññataḥ vimokkhaḥ animittaḥ vimokkhaḥ appaṇihitaḥ vimokkhaḥ ca iti tayaḥ vimokkhāḥ

original: 48. Suññatānupassanā animittānupassanā appaṇihitānupassānā ceti tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni ca veditabbāni.
analyzed: suññatā anupassanā animitta anupassanā appaṇihita anupassānā ca iti tīṇi vimokkha mukhāni ca veditabbāni

original: 49. Kathaṃ? Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ paccayasannissitasīlañceti catupārisuddhisīlaṃ sīlavisuddhi nāma.
analyzed: katham pātimokkha saṃvara sīlam indriya saṃvara sīlam ājīva pārisuddhi sīlam paccaya sannissita sīlam ca iti catu pārisuddhi sīlam sīlavisuddhi nāma

original: 50. Upacārasamādhi appanāsamādhi ceti duvidhopi samādhi cittavisuddhi nāma.
analyzed: upacāra samādhi appanā samādhi ca iti duvidhaḥ api samādhi citta visuddhi nāma

original: 51. Lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānavasena nāmarūpa pariggaho diṭṭhivisuddhi nāma.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa rasa paccupaṭṭhāna padaṭṭhāna vasena nāma rūpa pariggaho diṭṭhi visuddhi nāma

original: 52. Tesameva ca nāmarūpānaṃ paccayapariggaho kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi nāma.
analyzed: tesam eva ca nāma rūpānam paccaya pariggaho nāma

original: 53. Tato paraṃ pana tathāpariggahitesu sappaccayesu tebhūmakasaṅkhāresu atītādibhedabhinnesu
analyzed: tatas param pana tathā pariggahitesu sappaccayesu tebhūmaka saṅkhāresu atīta ādi bheda bhinnesu

original: khandhādinayamārabbha kalāpavasena saṅkhipitvā “aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena,
analyzed: khandha ādi nayam ārabbha kalāpa vasena saṅkhipitvā aniccam khaya ṭṭhena dukkham bhaya ṭṭhena

original: anattā asārakaṭṭhenā”ti addhānavasena santativasena khaṇavasena vā sammasanañāṇena
analyzed: anattā asāra kaṭṭhena ati addhāna vasena santati vasena khaṇa vasena vā sammasana ñāṇena

original: lakkhaṇattayaṃ sammasantassa tesveva paccayavasena khaṇavasena ca udayabbayañāṇena
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ttayam sammasantassa tesu eva paccaya vasena khaṇa vasena ca udaya bbaya ñāṇena

original: udayabbayaṃ samanupassantassa ca –
analyzed: udaya bbayam samanupassantassa ca

original: “Obhāso pīti passaddhi, adhimokkho ca paggaho;
analyzed: obhāsaḥ pīti passaddhi adhimokkhaḥ ca paggaho

original: Sukhaṃ ñāṇamupaṭṭhānamupekkhā ca nikanti ce”ti. –
analyzed: sukham ñāṇam upaṭṭhānam upekkhā ca nikanti ca iti

original: Obhāsādivipassanupakkilesaparipanthapariggahavasena maggāmaggalakkhaṇavavatthānaṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
analyzed: obhāsa ādi vipassanu pakkilesa paripantha pariggaha vasena magga amagga lakkhaṇa vavatthānam magga amagga ñāṇa dassana visuddhi nāma

original: 54. Tathā paripanthavimuttassa pana tassa udayabbayañāṇato paṭṭhāya yā vānulomā tilakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: tathā paripantha vimuttassa pana tassa udaya bbaya ñāṇato paṭṭhāya yā vā anulomā ti lakkhaṇam

original: vipassanāparamparāya paṭipajjantassa nava vipassanāñāṇāni paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
analyzed: vipassanā paramparāya paṭipajjantassa nava vipassanā ñāṇāni paṭipadā ñāṇa dassana visuddhi nāma

original: 55. Tassevaṃ paṭipajjantassa pana vipassanāparipākamāgamma “idāni appanā uppajjissatī”ti
analyzed: tassa ivam paṭipajjantassa pana vipassanā paripākam āgamma idāni appanā uppajjissati iti

original: bhavaṅgaṃ vocchijjitvā uppannamanodvārāvajjanānantaraṃ dve tīṇi vipassanācittāni
analyzed: bhavaṅgam vā ucchijjitvā uppanna manaḥ dvāra āvajjana anantaram dve tīṇi vipassanā cittāni

original: yaṃ kiñci aniccādilakkhaṇamārabbha parikammopacārānulomanāmena pavattanti.
analyzed: yam kiñci anicca ādi lakkhaṇam ārabbha parikamma upacāra anuloma nāmena pavattanti

original: 56. Yā sikhāppattā, sā sānulomā saṅkhārupekkhā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāti ca pavuccati.
analyzed: yā sikhāppattā sā sa anulomā saṅkhāra upekkhā vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanā ati ca pavuccati

original: 57. Tato paraṃ gotrabhucittaṃ nibbānamālambitvā puthujjanagottamabhibhavantaṃ, ariyagottamabhisambhontañca pavattati.
analyzed: tato param gotrabhu cittam nibbānam ālambitvā puthujjana gottam abhibhavantam ariya gottam abhisambhontam ca pavattati

original: 58. Tassānantarameva maggo dukkhasaccaṃ parijānanto samudayasaccaṃ pajahanto, nirodhasaccaṃ sacchikaronto, maggasaccaṃ bhāvanāvasena appanāvīthimotarati.
analyzed: tassa anantaram eva maggaḥ dukkha saccam parijānantaḥ samudaya saccam pajahantaḥ nirodha saccam sacchikarontaḥ magga saccam bhāvanā vasena appanā vīthim otarati

original: 59. Tato paraṃ dve tīṇi phalacittāni pavattitvā bhavaṅgapātova hoti, puna bhavaṅgaṃ vocchinditvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni pavattanti.
analyzed: tato param dve tīṇi phala cittāni pavattitvā bhavaṅga pāto va hoti puna bhavaṅgam vā ucchinditvā paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇāni pavattanti

original: 60. Maggaṃ phalañca nibbānaṃ, paccavekkhati paṇḍito.
analyzed: maggam phalam ca nibbānam paccavekkhati paṇḍitaḥ

original: Hīne kilese sese ca, paccavekkhati vāna vā.
analyzed: hīne kilese sese ca paccavekkhati vā vā

original: Chabbisuddhikamenevaṃ, bhāvetabbo catubbidho;
analyzed: cha bisuddhi kamena ivam bhāvetabbaḥ catubbidhaḥ

original: Ñāṇadassanavisuddhi, nāma maggo pavuccati.
analyzed: nāma maggo pavuccati

original: Ayamettha visuddhibhedo.
analyzed: ayam ettha visuddhi bhedaḥ

original: Vimokkhabhedo
analyzed: vimokkha bhedo

original: 61. Tattha anattānupassanā attābhinivesaṃ muñcantī suññatānupassanā nāma vimokkhamukhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tattha anatta anupassanā atta abhinivesam muñcantī suññatā anupassanā nāma vimokkha mukham hoti

original: 62. Aniccānupassanā vipallāsanimittaṃ muñcantī animittānupassanā nāma.
analyzed: anicca anupassanā vipallāsa nimittam muñcantī animitta anupassanā nāma

original: 63. Dukkhānupassanā taṇhāpaṇidhiṃ muñcantī appaṇihitānupassanā nāma.
analyzed: dukkha anupassanā taṇhā paṇidhim muñcantī appaṇihita anupassanā nāma

original: 64. Tasmā yadi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā anattato vipassati, suññato vimokkho nāma hoti maggo.
analyzed: tasmā yadi vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanāḥ anattataḥ vipassati suññataḥ vimokkhaḥ nāma hoti maggo

original: 65. Yadi aniccato vipassati, animitto vimokkho nāma.
analyzed: yadi aniccataḥ vipassati animittaḥ vimokkhaḥ nāma

original: 66. Yadi dukkhato vipassati, appaṇihito vimokkho nāmāti ca maggo vipassanāgamanavasena tīṇi nāmāni labhati, tathā phalañca maggāgamanavasena maggavīthiyaṃ.
analyzed: yadi dukkhataḥ vipassati appaṇihitaḥ vimokkhaḥ nāma ati ca maggaḥ vipassanā āgamana vasena tīṇi nāmāni labhati tathā phalam ca magga āgamana vasena magga vīthiyam

original: 67. Phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pana yathāvuttanayena vipassantānaṃ yathāsakaphalamuppajjamānampi
analyzed: phala samāpatti vīthiyam pana yathā vutta nayena vipassantānam yathāsaka phalam uppajjamānam pi

original: vipassanāgamanavaseneva suññatādivimokkhoti ca pavuccati, ārammaṇavasena pana sarasavasena
analyzed: vipassanā āgamana vasena iva suñña tā ādi vimokkho ti ca pavuccati ārammaṇa vasena pana sa rasa vasena

original: ca nāmattayaṃ sabbattha sabbesampi samameva ca.
analyzed: ca nāmattayam sabbattha sabbesam pi samam eva ca

original: Ayamettha vimokkhabhedo.
analyzed: ayam ettha vimokkha bhedo

original: Puggalabhedo
analyzed: puggala bhedaḥ

original: 68. Ettha pana sotāpattimaggaṃ bhāvetvā diṭṭhivicikicchāpahānena pahīnāpāyagamano sattakkhattuparamo sotāpanno nāma hoti.
analyzed: ettha pana sotāpatti maggam bhāvetvā diṭṭhi vicikicchā apahānena pahīna apāya gamanaḥ satta kkhattu paramaḥ sotāpannaḥ nāma hoti

original: 69. Sakadāgāmimaggaṃ bhāvetvā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanukarattā sakadāgāmī nāma hoti sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā.

original: 14. Tesu ceva pañcapaññāsasavitakkacittesu, ekādasasu dutiyajjhānacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu vicāro jāyati.

original: 16. Pañcadvārāvajjanena, dvipañcaviññāṇehi, sampaṭicchanadvayena, santīraṇattayena cāti soḷasahi vajjitesu tesattatiyā cittesu vīriyaṃ jāyati.

original: 17. Domanassasahagatehidvīhi, upekkhāsahagatehi pañcapaññāsacittehi, kāyaviññāṇadvayena, ekādasahi catutthajjhānehi cāti sattaticittehi vajjitesu ekapaññāsacittesu pīti jāyati.

original: 18. Ahetukehi aṭṭhārasahi, momūhehi dvīhi cāti vīsatiyā cittehi vajjitesu ekūnasattaticittesu chando jāyati.

analyzed: sampaṭicchana ṭhānam sampaṭicchana voṭṭhabbanānam antarā santīraṇa ṭhānam santīraṇa javanānam

analyzed: santīraṇa bhavaṅgānaṃ ca antarā voṭṭhabbana ṭhānam voṭṭhabbana tad ārammaṇānam voṭṭhabbana bhavaṅgānaṃ

original: antarā tadārammaṇaṭhānaṃ. Javanapaṭisandhīnaṃ, tadārammaṇapaṭisandhīnaṃ, bhavaṅgapaṭisandhīnaṃ

original: evaṃ pavattipaṭisandhivasena paṭiccanayo uddhaṭo, pītisahagatasukhasahagatapadavibhaṅge

analyzed: uddhaṭaḥ na pana ahetuka paṭisandhi kkhaṇa ityādinā paṭisandhi vasena tasmai yathā dhamma sāsane

original: avacanampi abhāvameva dīpetīti na tassa paṭisandhivasena pavatti atthi. Yattha pana

original: 27. Evaṃ kiccabhedena vuttāneva yathāsakaṃ labbhamānakiccagaṇanavasena sampiṇḍetvā dassetuṃ “tesu panā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: evam kicca bhedena vuttān eva yathāsakam labbhamāna kicca gaṇana vasena sampiṇḍetvā dassetum tesu pana atyādi vuttam

original: 33. Paṭisandhādayo cittuppādā nāmakiccabhedena paṭisandhādīnaṃ nāmānaṃ, kiccānañca
analyzed: paṭisandhā ādayaḥ cittuppādāḥ nāma kicca bhedena paṭisandhā ādīnam

analyzed: yojanā eka kicca ṭhāna dvi kicca ṭhāna tikicca ṭhāna catu kicca ṭhāna pañca kicca ṭhānāni cittāni

original: yathākkamaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhi, tathā dve ca nava ca aṭṭha ca dve cāti niddiseti sambandho.
