original: Kiccasaṅgahavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kicca saṅgaha vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Dvārasaṅgahavaṇṇanā
analyzed: dvāra saṅgaha vaṇṇanā

original: 35. Dvārānaṃ, dvārappavattacittānañca paricchedavasena saṅgaho dvārasaṅgaho. Āvajjanādīnaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato dvārāni viyāti dvārāni.
analyzed: dvārānam dvāra ppavatta cittānam ca pariccheda vasena saṅgahaḥ dvāra saṅgahaḥ āvajjana ādīnam arūpa dhammānam pavatti mukha bhāvataḥ dvārāni viyāti dvārāni

original: 36. Cakkhumevāti pasādacakkhumeva.
analyzed: cakkhum eva ati pasāda cakkhum eva

original: 37. Āvajjanādīnaṃ manānaṃ, manoyeva vā dvāranti manodvāraṃ. Bhavaṅganti āvajjanānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ. Tenāhu porāṇā –
analyzed: āvajjana ādīnam vā manaḥ dvāram manaḥ dvāram āvajjana anantaram bhavaṅgam tena āhu porāṇā

original: “Sāvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgantu, manodvāranti vuccatī”ti;
analyzed: sāvajjanam manodvāranti vuccati iti

original: 39. Tatthāti tesu cakkhādidvāresu cakkhudvāre chacattālīsa cittāni yathārahamuppajjantīti
analyzed: tattha ati tesu cakkhu ādi dvāresu cakkhu dvāre cha cattālīsa cittāni yathāraham uppajjanti iti

original: sambandho. Pañcadvārāvajjanamekaṃ, cakkhuviññāṇādīni ubhayavipākavasena satta, voṭṭhabbanamekaṃ,
analyzed: sambandho pañca dvāra āvajjanam ekam cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni ubhaya vipāka vasena satta voṭṭhabbanam ekam

original: kāmāvacarajavanāni ca kusalākusalanirāvajjanakiriyavasena ekūnatiṃsa, tadārammaṇāni
analyzed: kāmāvacara javanāni ca kusala akusala nirāvajjana kiriya vasena tad ārammaṇāni

original: ca aggahitaggahaṇena aṭṭhevāti chacattālīsa. Yathārahanti iṭṭhādiārammaṇe yonisoayonisomanasikāraniranusayasantānādīnaṃ
analyzed: ca aggahita ggahaṇena aṭṭha iva āti cha cattālīsa yathārahanti iṭṭha ādi ārammaṇe

original: anurūpavasena. Sabbathāpīti āvajjanāditadārammaṇapariyosānena sabbenapi pakārena
analyzed: anurūpa vasena sabbathā api iti āvajjana ādi tad ārammaṇa pariyosānena sabbena api pakārena

original: kāmāvacarānevāti yojanā. Sabbathāpi catupaññāsa cittānīti vā sambandho. Sabbathāpi
analyzed: kāmāvacarān eva ati yojanā sabbathā api catupaññāsa cittāni iti vā sambandhaḥ sabbathā api

original: taṃtaṃdvārikavasena ṭhitāni aggahitaggahaṇena cakkhudvārikesu chacattālīsacittesu
analyzed: taṃ taṃ dvārika vasena ṭhitāni aggahita ggahaṇena cakkhu dvārikesu cha cattālīsa cittesu

original: sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ catunnaṃ yugaḷānaṃ pakkhepena catupaññāsapītyattho.
analyzed: sota viññāṇa ādīnam catunnam yuga ḷānam pakkhepena catu paññāsa api iti attho

original: 41. Cakkhādidvāresu appavattanato, manodvārasaṅkhātabhavaṅgato ārammaṇantaraggahaṇavasena appavattito ca paṭisandhādivasena pavattāni ekūnavīsati dvāravimuttāni.
analyzed: cakkhu ādi dvāresu appavattanataḥ manaḥ dvāra saṅkhāta bhavaṅgataḥ ārammaṇa antara ggahaṇa vasena appavattitaḥ ca paṭisandhā ādi vasena pavattāni ekūnavīsati dvāra vimuttāni

original: 42. Dvipañcaviññāṇāni sakasakadvāre, chabbīsati mahaggatalokuttarajavanāni manodvāreyeva uppajjanato chattiṃsa cittāni yathārahaṃ sakasakadvārānurūpaṃ ekadvārikacittāni.
analyzed: dvi pañca viññāṇāni sakasaka dvāre chabbīsati mahaggata lokuttara javanāni manaḥ dvāre yeva uppajjanataḥ chattiṃsa cittāni yathāraham sakasaka dvāra anurūpam ekadvārika cittāni

original: 45. Pañcadvāresu santīraṇatadārammaṇavasena, manodvāre ca tadārammaṇavasena pavattanato chadvārikāni ceva paṭisandhādivasappavattiyā dvāravimuttāni ca.
analyzed: pañca dvāresu santīraṇa tad ārammaṇa vasena manaḥ dvāre ca tad ārammaṇa vasena pavattanataḥ cha dvārikāni ca iva paṭisandhā divasa ppavattiyā dvāra vimuttāni ca

original: 47. Pañcadvārikāni ca chadvārikāni ca pañcachadvārikāni. Chadvārikāni ca tāni kadāci
analyzed: pañca dvārikāni ca chadvārikāni ca pañca chadvārikāni chadvārikāni ca tāni kadācid

original: dvāravimuttāni cāti chadvārikavimuttāni. Atha vā chadvārikāni ca chadvārikavimuttāni
analyzed: dvāra vimuttāni ca ati chadvārika vimuttāni atha vā chadvārikāni ca chadvārika vimuttāni

original: cāti chadvārikavimuttānīti ekadesasarūpekaseso daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: ca ati cha dvārika vimuttāni iti eka desa sarūpa ikasesaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Dvārasaṅgahavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dvāra saṅgaha vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Ālambaṇasaṅgahavaṇṇanā
analyzed: ālambaṇa saṅgaha vaṇṇanā

original: 48. Ārammaṇānaṃ sarūpato, vibhāgato, taṃvisayacittato ca saṅgaho ālambaṇasaṅgaho.
analyzed: ārammaṇānam sarūpataḥ vibhāgataḥ ca saṅgahaḥ ālambaṇa saṅgaho

original: Vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ rūpayati hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti rūpaṃ, tadeva dubbalapurisena
analyzed: vaṇṇa vikāram āpajjamānam rūpayati hadayaṅgata bhāvam pakāseti iti rūpam tat eva dubbala purisena

original: daṇḍādi viya cittacetasikehi ālambīyati, tāni vā āgantvā ettha ramantīti ārammaṇanti
analyzed: daṇḍa ādi viya cittacetasikehi ālambīyati tāni vā āgantvā ettha ramanti iti ārammaṇanti

original: rūpārammaṇaṃ. Saddīyatīti saddo, soyeva ārammaṇanti saddārammaṇaṃ. Gandhayati attano
analyzed: rūpa ārammaṇam saddīyati iti saddaḥ ārammaṇam ti sadda ārammaṇam gandhayati attanaḥ

original: vatthuṃ sūceti “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti gandho, soyeva ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: vatthum sūceti idam ettha atthi iti pesuññam karontam viya hoti iti gandhaḥ saḥ yā iva ārammaṇam

original: gandhārammaṇaṃ. Rasanti taṃ sattā assādentīti raso, soyeva ārammaṇaṃ rasārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: gandha ārammaṇam rasanti tam sattāḥ assādenti iti rasaḥ saḥ yā iva ārammaṇam rasa ārammaṇam

original: Phusīyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṃ, tadeva ārammaṇaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ. Dhammoyeva ārammaṇaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: phusīyati iti phoṭṭhabbam tat eva ārammaṇam phoṭṭhabba ārammaṇam dhammaḥ yā iva ārammaṇam dhamma ārammaṇam

original: 49. Tatthāti tesu rūpādiārammaṇesu, rūpamevāti vaṇṇāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ rūpameva. Saddādayoti saddāyatanādisaṅkhātā saddādayo, āpodhātuvajjitabhūtattayasaṅkhātaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca.
analyzed: tattha ati tesu rūpa ādi ārammaṇesu rūpam eva ati vaṇṇa āyatana saṅkhātam rūpam eva sadda ādayo iti sadda āyatana ādi saṅkhātā sadda ādayaḥ āpodhātu vajjita bhūta ttaya saṅkhātam phoṭṭhabba āyatanam ca

original: 50. Pañcārammaṇapasādāni ṭhapetvā sesāni soḷasa sukhumarūpāni.
analyzed: pañca ārammaṇa pasādāni ṭhapetvā sesāni soḷasa sukhuma rūpāni

original: 51. Paccuppannanti vattamānaṃ.
analyzed: paccuppannam ti vattamānam

original: 52. Chabbidhampīti rūpādivasena chabbidhampi. Vināsābhāvato atītādikālavasena navattabbattā
analyzed: chabbidham pi iti rūpa ādi vasena chabbidham pi vināsa abhāvataḥ atīta ādi kāla vasena

original: nibbānaṃ, paññatti ca kālavimuttaṃ nāma. Yathārahanti kāmāvacarajavanaabhiññāsesamahaggatādijavanānaṃ
analyzed: nibbānam paññatti ca kālavimuttam nāma yathārahanti kāmāvacara javana abhiññā sesa mahaggata ādi javanānam

original: anurūpato. Kāmāvacarajavanānañhi hasituppādavajjānaṃ chabbidhampi tikālikaṃ, kālavimuttañca
analyzed: anurūpatas kāmāvacara javanānam hi hasituppāda vajjānam chabbidham pi tikālikam kāla vimuttam ca

original: ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Hasituppādassa tikālikameva. Tathā hissa ekantaparittārammaṇataṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇam hoti hasita uppādassa tikālikam eva tathā hi issa ekanta paritta ārammaṇa tat

original: vakkhati. Dibbacakkhādivasappavattassa pana abhiññājavanassa yathārahaṃ chabbidhampi
analyzed: vakkhati dibba cakkhā divasa ppavattassa pana abhiññā javanassa yathāraham chabbidham pi

original: tikālikaṃ, kālavimuttañca ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Vibhāgo panettha navamaparicchede āvi bhavissati.
analyzed: tikālikam kāla vimuttam ca ārammaṇam hoti vibhāgaḥ pana ittha navama paricchede bhavissati

original: Sesānaṃ pana kālavimuttaṃ, atītañca yathārahamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: sesānam pana kāla vimuttam atītam ca yathāraham ārammaṇam hoti

original: 53. Dvāra…pe… saṅkhātānaṃ chabbidhampi ārammaṇaṃ hotīti sambandho, taṃ pana nesaṃ
analyzed: dvārape saṅkhātānam chabbidham pi ārammaṇam hoti iti sambandho tam pana na īsam

original: ārammaṇaṃ na āvajjanassa viya kenaci aggahitameva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati, na ca pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇam na āvajjanassa viya kenacid agga hitam eva gocara bhāvam gacchati na ca pañcadvārika java nānam

original: viya ekantapaccuppannaṃ, nāpi manodvārikajavanānaṃ viya tikālikameva, avisesena kālavimuttaṃ
analyzed: viya ekanta paccuppannam na api manodvārika javanānam viya tikālikam eva avisesena kāla vimuttam

original: vā, nāpi maraṇāsannato purimabhāgajavanānaṃ viya kammakammanimittādivasena āgamasiddhivohāravinimuttanti
analyzed: vā na api maraṇa āsannataḥ viya kamma kamma nimitta ādi vasena āgama siddhi vohāra vinimuttanti

original: āha “yathāsambhavaṃ…pe… sammata”nti. Tattha yathāsambhavanti taṃtaṃbhūmikapaṭisandhibhavaṅgacutīnaṃ
analyzed: āha tattha taṃ taṃ bhūmika paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cutīnam

original: taṃtaṃdvāraggahitādivasena sambhavānurūpato. Kāmāvacarānañhi paṭisandhibhavaṅgānaṃ
analyzed: taṃ taṃ dvāragga hita ādi vasena sambhava anurūpataḥ

original: tāva rūpādipañcārammaṇaṃ chadvāraggahitaṃ yathārahaṃ paccuppannamatītañca kammanimittasammatamārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: rūpa ādi pañca ārammaṇam cha dvāraggahitam yathāraham paccuppannam atītam ca kamma nimitta sammatam ārammaṇam

original: hoti, tathā cuticittassa atītameva. Dhammārammaṇaṃ pana tesaṃ tiṇṇannampi manodvāraggahitameva
analyzed: hoti tathā cuti cittassa atītam eva dhamma ārammaṇam pana tesam tiṇṇannam pi manaḥ dvāra ggahitam eva

original: atītaṃ kammakammanimittasammataṃ, tathā rūpārammaṇaṃ ekameva manodvāraggahitaṃ ekantapaccuppannaṃ
analyzed: atītam kamma kamma nimitta sammatam tathā rūpa ārammaṇam ekam eva manaḥ dvāra ggahitam ekanta paccuppannam

original: gatinimittasammatanti evaṃ kāmāvacarapaṭisandhādīnaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ chadvāraggahitaṃ
analyzed: evam kāmāvacara paṭisandhā ādīnam yathāsambhavam

original: paccuppannamatītañca kammakammanimittagatinimittasammatamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: paccuppannam atītam ca kamma kamma nimitta gati nimitta sammatam ārammaṇam hoti

original: Mahaggatapaṭisandhādīsu pana rūpāvacarānaṃ, paṭhamatatiyāruppānañca dhammārammaṇameva
analyzed: mahaggata paṭisandhā ādīsu pana rūpāvacarānam paṭhama tatiya āruppānam ca dhamma ārammaṇam eva

original: manodvāraggahitaṃ paññattibhūtaṃ kammanimittasammataṃ, tathā dutiyacatutthāruppānaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ dvāra ggahitam paññatti bhūtam kamma nimitta sammatam tathā dutiya catuttha āruppānam

original: atītamevāti evaṃ mahaggatapaṭisandhibhavaṅgacutīnaṃ manodvāraggahitaṃ paññattibhūtaṃ,

original: atītaṃ vā kammanimittasammatameva ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: atītam vā kamma nimitta sammatam eva ārammaṇam hoti

original: Yebhuyyena bhavantare chadvāraggahitanti bāhullena atītānantarabhave maraṇāsannappavattachadvārikajavanehi
analyzed: yebhuyyena bhavantare bāhullena atīta anantara bhave maraṇa āsanna ppavatta chadvārika javanehi

original: gahitaṃ. Asaññībhavato cutānañhi paṭisandhivisayassa anantarātītabhave na kenaci
analyzed: gahitam a saññībhavato paṭisandhi visayassa anantara atīta bhave na kenacid

original: dvārena gahaṇaṃ atthīti tadevettha yebhuyyaggahaṇena byabhicāritaṃ. Kevalañhi kammabaleneva
analyzed: dvārena gahaṇam atthi iti tat eva itthā yebhuyyak gahaṇena byabhicāritam kevalam hi kamma balena iva

original: tesaṃ paṭisandhiyā kammanimittādikamārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti. Tathā hi saccasaṅkhepe asaññībhavato
analyzed: tesam paṭisandhiyā kamma nimitta ādikam ārammaṇam upaṭṭhāti tathā hi sacca saṅkhepe asaññībhavato

analyzed: cutassa paṭisandhi nimittam pucchitvā

analyzed: kammam yama ukāsam labhe

analyzed: sā sandhi tena iva upaṭṭhāpita gocarā iti

analyzed: kevalam kamma balena iva paṭisandhi gocarassa upaṭṭhānam vuttam itarathā hi java nagga hitassa api

analyzed: ārammaṇassa kamma balena iva upaṭṭhāpiyamāna ttā tena iva ati sa avadhāraṇa vacanassa adhippāya suñña tā

original: āpajjeyyāti. Nanu ca tesampi paṭisandhigocaro kammabhave kenaci dvārena javanaggahito
analyzed: āpajjeyya ti nanu ca tesam pi paṭisandhi gocaraḥ kamma bhave kenaci dvārena java naggahito

original: maraṇāsannapavattajavanehi gahitameva sandhāya “chadvāraggahita”nti vuttaṃ, evañca

original: katvā ācariyena imasmiṃyeva adhikāre paramatthavinicchaye vuttaṃ –
analyzed: katvā ācariyena imasmiṃ yeva adhikāre paramattha vinicchaye vuttam

original: “Maraṇāsannasattassa, yathopaṭṭhitagocaraṃ;
analyzed: maraṇa āsanna sattassa yathā upaṭṭhita gocaram

original: Chadvāresu tamārabbha, paṭisandhi bhavantare”ti. ;
analyzed: cha dvāresu tam ārabbha paṭisandhi

original: kammakammanimittādīnañca sarūpaṃ sayameva vakkhati.
analyzed: kamma kamma nimitta ādīnam ca sarūpam sayam eva vakkhati

original: 54. Tesūti rūpādipaccuppannādikammādiārammaṇesu viññāṇesu. Rūpādīsu ekekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etesanti rūpādiekekārammaṇāni.

original: 55. Rūpādikaṃ pañcavidhampi ārammaṇametassāti rūpādipañcārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: rūpa ādikam pañcavidham pi ārammaṇam etassa ati rūpa ādi pañca ārammaṇam

original: 56. Sesānīti dvipañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanehi avasesāni ekādasa kāmāvacaravipākāni.
analyzed: sesāni iti dvi pañca viññāṇa sampaṭicchanehi avasesāni ekādasa kāmāvacara vipākāni

original: Sabbathāpi kāmāvacarārammaṇānīti sabbenapi chadvārikadvāravimuttachaḷārammaṇavasappavattākārena
analyzed: sabbathā api kāmāvacara ārammaṇāni iti sabbena api chadvārika dvāra vimutta chaṣ ārammaṇa vasa ppavatta ākārena

analyzed: santi īraṇa ādi vasena rūpa ādi pañca ārammaṇe paṭisandhā ādi vasena chaṣ ārammaṇa saṅkhāte kāmāvacara ārammaṇe iya iva pavattanti

original: Hasanacittampi padhānasāruppaṭṭhānaṃ disvā tussantassa rūpārammaṇe, bhaṇḍabhājanaṭṭhāne

original: 57. Dvādasākusalaaṭṭhañāṇavippayuttajavanavasena vīsati cittāni attano jaḷabhāvato

original: dussanavippaṭisāravasena, vicikicchāsahagato aniṭṭhaṅgamanavasena, uddhaccasahagato

original: vikkhipanavasena, avūpasamavasena ca pavattiyaṃ parittamahaggatapaññattārammaṇo,
analyzed: vikkhipana vasena avūpasama vasena ca pavattiyam paritta mahaggata paññatta ārammaṇaḥ

analyzed: paññatta ārammaṇā ti daṭṭhabbam

original: 58. Arahattamaggaphalavajjitasabbārammaṇāni sekkhaputhujjanasantānesveva pavattanato.

analyzed: sekkhā api hi ṭhapetvā lokiya cittam arahataḥ magga phala saṅkhātam pāṭipuggalika cittam

analyzed: ca kusala java nānam gocara bhāvam gacchanti

analyzed: sabbathā api sabba ārammaṇāni iti kāmāvacara mahaggata sabba lokuttara paññatti vasena sabbathā api

analyzed: sabbaññu taññāṇa ādi vasa ppavattiyam voṭṭhabbanassa ca taṃ taṃ purecārika vasa ppavattiyam

original: na ca kiñci agocaraṃ nāma atthi.

analyzed: idhā iva puppha mattam viya pavatti vipāka mattam ahetuka phalam deti attha sādhikā pana

original: sattamajavanacetanā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanābhūtā vuttanayena paṭiladdhavisesā anantarattabhāve
analyzed: sattama javana cetanā sanniṭṭhāpaka cetanā bhūtā vutta nayena paṭiladdha visesā anantaratta bhāve

original: vipākadāyinī upapajjavedanīyaṃ nāma. Sā ca paṭisandhiṃ datvāva pavattivipākaṃ deti.
analyzed: vipāka dāyinī upapajjavedanīyam nāma sā ca paṭisandhim pavatti vipākam deti

original: Paṭisandhiyā pana adinnāya pavattivipākaṃ detīti natthi. Cuti anantarañhi upapajjavedanīyassa
analyzed: paṭisandhiyā pana a dinnāya pavatti vipākam deti iti natthi cuti anantaram hi upapajja vedanīyassa

original: okāso. Paṭisandhiyā pana dinnāya jātisatepi pavattivipākaṃ detīti ācariyā. Yathāvuttakaāraṇavirahato
analyzed: okāsaḥ paṭisandhiyā pana dinnāya jāti sate pi pavatti vipākam deti iti ācariyāḥ yathā vuttaka āraṇa virahato

original: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādibhāvaṃ asampattā ādipariyosānacetanānaṃ majjhe pavattā pañca
analyzed: diṭṭha dhamma vedanīya ādi bhāvam a sampattā ādi pariyosāna cetanānam majjhe pavattā pañca

original: cetanā vipākadānasabhāvassa anupacchinnattā yadā kadāci okāsalābhe sati paṭisandhipavattīsu
analyzed: cetanā vipāka dāna sabhāvassa anupacchinna ttā yadā kadāci okāsa lābhe sati paṭisandhi pavattīsu

original: vipākaṃ abhinipphādentī aparāpariyavedaniyaṃ nāma. Sakasakakālātītaṃ pana purimakammadvayaṃ,
analyzed: vipākam abhinipphādentī aparāpariyavedaniyam nāma saka saka kāla atītam pana purima kamma dvayam

original: tatiyampi ca saṃsārappavattiyā vocchinnāya ahosikammaṃ nāma.
analyzed: tatiyam pi ca saṃsāra ppavattiyā vocchinnāya ahosikammam nāma

original: Pākakālavasenāti paccuppanne, tadanantare, yadā kadācīti evaṃ purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ yathāparicchinnakālavasena,
analyzed: pāka kāla vasena ati paccuppanne tad anantare yadā kadāci iti evam purimānam tiṇṇam yathā paricchinna kāla vasena

original: itarassa taṃkālābhāvavasena ca. Ahosikammassa hi kālātikkamatova taṃ vohāro.
analyzed: itarassa tad kāla abhāva vasena ca ahosi kammassa hi kāla atikkamataḥ va tam vohāro

original: 53. Pākaṭhānavasenāti paṭisandhiyā vipaccanabhūmivasena.
analyzed: pāka ṭhāna vasena ati paṭisandhiyā

original: 54. Idāni akusalādikammānaṃ kāyakammadvārādivasena pavattiṃ, taṃniddesamukhena ca
analyzed: idāni akusala ādi kammānam kāya kamma dvāra ādi vasena pavattim tad niddesa mukhena ca

original: tesaṃ pāṇātipātādivasena dasavidhādibhedañca dassetuṃ “tattha akusala”ntyādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: tesam pāṇa atipāta ādi vasena dasavidha ādi bhedam ca dassetum tattha akusala nti ādi āraddham

original: Kāyadvāre pavattaṃ kammaṃ kāyakammaṃ. Evaṃ vacīkammādīni.
analyzed: kāya dvāre pavattam kammam kāya kammam evam vacī kamma ādīni

original: 55. Pāṇassa saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā atīva pātanaṃ pāṇātipāto. Kāyavācāhi adinnassa ādānaṃ adinnādānaṃ. Methunavītikkamasaṅkhātesu kāmesu micchā caraṇaṃ kāmesu micchācāro.
analyzed: pāṇassa saṇikam patitum a datvā atīva pātanam pāṇa atipātaḥ kāya vācāhi adinnassa ādānam adinna ādānam methuna vītikkama saṅkhātesu kāmesu micchā caraṇam kāmesu micchācāraḥ

original: Tattha pāṇoti vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tasmiṃ pāṇe pāṇasaññino
analyzed: tattha pāṇo ti vohārato satto paramatthataḥ jīvitindriyam tasmin pāṇe pāṇa saññinaḥ

original: jīvitindriyupacchedakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto. Parabhaṇḍe tathāsaññino
analyzed: jīvita indriya upacchedaka ppayoga samuṭṭhāpikā vadhaka cetanā pāṇātipāto parabhaṇḍe tathā saññino

original: tadādāyakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ. Asaddhammasevanavasena kāyadvārappavattā
analyzed: tad ādāyaka ppayoga samuṭṭhāpikā theyya cetanā adinnādānam asat dhamma sevana vasena kāya dvāra ppavattā

original: agantabbaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā kāmesumicchācāro nāma. Surāpānampi ettheva saṅgayhatīti
analyzed: agantabba ṭṭhāna vītikkama cetanā kāmesumicchā ācāraḥ nāma surā pānam pi ettha iva saṅgayhati iti

original: vadanti rasasaṅkhātesu kāmesu micchācārabhāvato. Kāyaviññattisaṅkhāte kāyadvāreti
analyzed: vadanti rasa saṅkhātesu kāmesu micchācāra bhāvato kāya viññatti saṅkhāte kāya dvāre iti

original: kāyena adhippāyaviññāpanato, sayañca kāyena viññeyyattā kāyaviññattisaṅkhāte abhikkamādijanakacittajavāyodhātvādhikakalāpassa
analyzed: kāyena adhippāya viññāpanato sayam ca kāyena viññeyya ttā kāya viññatti saṅkhāte abhikkama ādi janaka citta ja vāyaḥ dhātu ādhika kalāpassa

original: vikārabhūte santhambhanādīnaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūte copanakāyabhāvato, kammānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato
analyzed: vikāra bhūte santhambhana ādīnam sahakārī kāraṇa bhūte copana kāya bhāvato kammānam pavatti mukha bhāvato

original: ca kāyadvārasaṅkhāte kammadvāre.
analyzed: ca kāya dvāra saṅkhāte kamma dvāre

original: Kiñcāpi hi taṃtaṃkammasahagatacittuppādeneva sā viññatti janīyati. Tathāpi tassā
analyzed: kiñcā api hi taṃ taṃ kamma sahagata cittuppādena iva sā viññatti janīyati tathā api tassā

original: tathā pavattamānāya taṃsamuṭṭhāpakakammassa kāyakammādivohāro hotīti sā tasseva pavattimukhabhāvena
analyzed: tathā pavattamānāya tad samuṭṭhāpaka kammassa kāya kamma ādi vohāraḥ hoti iti sā tassa iva pavatti mukha bhāvena

original: vattuṃ labbhati. “Kāyadvāre vuttito”ti ettakeyeva vutte “yadi evaṃ kammadvāravavatthānaṃ
analyzed: vattum labbhati kāya dvāre vuttito ti vutte yadi evam kamma dvāra vavatthānam

original: na siyā. Kāyadvāre hi pavattaṃ ‘kāyakamma’nti vuccati, kāyakammassa ca pavattimukhabhūtaṃ
analyzed: na siyā kāya dvāre hi pavattam kāyakammanti vuccati kāya kammassa ca pavatti mukha bhūtam

original: ‘kāyadvāra’nti. Pāṇātipātādikaṃ pana vācāya āṇāpentassa kāyakammaṃ vacīdvārepi pavattatīti
analyzed: kāya dvāram ti pāṇa atipāta ādikam pana vācāya āṇāpentassa kāya kammam vacī dvāre pi pavattati iti

original: dvārena kammavavatthānaṃ na siyā, tathā musāvādādiṃ kāyavikārena karontassa vacīkammaṃ
analyzed: dvārena kamma vavatthānam na siyā tathā musāvāda ādim kāya vikārena karontassa vacī kammam

original: kāyadvārepi pavattatīti kammena dvāravavatthānampi na siyā”ti ayaṃ codanā paccupaṭṭheyyāti
analyzed: kāya dvāre pi pavattati iti kammena dvāra vavatthānam pi na siyāti ayam codanā paccupaṭṭheyya ati

original: bāhullavuttiyā vavatthānaṃ dassetuṃ “bāhullavuttito”ti vuttaṃ. Kāyakammañhi kāyadvāreyeva
analyzed: bāhulla vuttiyāḥ vavatthānam dassetum bāhulla vuttitaḥ ti vuttam kāya kammam hi kāya dvāreya iva

original: bahulaṃ pavattati, appaṃ vacīdvāre, tasmā kāyadvāreyeva bahulaṃ pavattanato kāyakammabhāvo
analyzed: bahulam pavattati appam vacī dvāre tasmā kāya dvāreya iva bahulam kāya kamma bhāvaḥ

original: siddho vanacarakādīnaṃ vanacarakādibhāvo viya. Tathā kāyakammameva yebhuyyena kāyadvāre
analyzed: siddhaḥ vana caraka ādīnam vana caraka ādi bhāvaḥ tathā kāya kammam eva yebhuyyena kāya dvāre

original: pavattati, na itarāni, tasmā kāyakammassa yebhuyyena ettheva pavattanato kāyakammadvārabhāvo
analyzed: pavattati na itarāni tasmā kāya kammassa yebhuyyena ettha iva pavattanataḥ kāya kamma dvāra bhāvaḥ

original: siddho brāhmaṇagāmādīnaṃ brāhmaṇagāmādibhāvo viyāti natthi kammadvāravavatthāne koci
analyzed: siddhaḥ brāhmaṇa gāma ādīnam brāhmaṇa gāma ādi bhāvaḥ viyāti na atthi kamma dvāra vavatthāne koci

original: vibandhoti ayametthādhippāyo.
analyzed: vibandho ti ayam ettha adhippāyo

original: 56. Musāti abhūtaṃ vatthu, taṃ tacchato vadanti etenāti musāvādo. Pisati sāmaggiṃ
analyzed: musā ati abhūtam vatthu tam tat śatas vadanti etena ati musāvādaḥ pisati sāmaggim

original: sañcuṇṇeti vikkhipati, piyabhāvaṃ suññaṃ karotīti vā pisuṇā. Attānampi parampi pharusaṃ
analyzed: sañcuṇṇā iti vikkhipati piya bhāvam suññam karoti iti vā pisuṇā attānam pi param pi pharusam

original: karoti, kakaco viya kharasamphassāti vā pharusā. Saṃ sukhaṃ, hitañca phalati visarati
analyzed: karoti kakacaḥ viya vā pharusā sam sukham hitam ca phalati visarati

original: vināsetīti samphaṃ, attano, paresañca anupakāraṃ yaṃ kiñci, taṃ palapati etenāti samphappalāpo.
analyzed: vināseti iti anupakāram yam kiñci tam palapati etena ati samphappalāpaḥ

original: Tattha abhūtaṃ vatthuṃ bhūtato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathā viññāpanappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
analyzed: tattha abhūtam vatthum bhūtataḥ param viññāpetu kāmassa tathā viññāpana ppayoga samuṭṭhāpikā

original: cetanā musāvādo. So parassa atthabhedakarova kammapatho hoti, itaro kammameva. Paresaṃ
analyzed: cetanā musāvādo so parassa attha bheda karaḥ uva kamma pathaḥ hoti itaro kammam eva paresam

original: bhedakāmatāya, attappiyakāmatāya vā parabhedakaravacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā saṃkiliṭṭhacetanā
analyzed: bheda kāmatāya attappiya kāmatāya vā para bhedaka ravacī payoga samuṭṭhāpikā saṃkiliṭṭha cetanā

original: pisuṇavācā, sāpi dvīsu bhinnesuyeva kammapatho. Parassa mammacchedakaravacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
analyzed: pisuṇa vācā sā api dvīsu bhinnesu yeva kamma patho parassa

original: ekantapharusacetanā pharusavācā. Na hi cittasaṇhatāya sati pharusavācā nāma hoti.
analyzed: ekanta pharusa cetanā pharusa vācā na hi citta saṇhatāya sati pharusa vācā nāma hoti

original: Sītāharaṇādianatthaviññāpanappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā saṃkiliṭṭhacetanā samphappalāpo,
so pana parehi tasmiṃ anatthe gahiteyeva kammapatho. Vacīviññattisaṅkhāte vacīdvāreti
analyzed: saḥ pana parehi tasmin anatthe gahitā iya iva kamma pathaḥ vacī viññatti saṅkhāte vacī dvārā iti

original: vācāya adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti, sayañca vācāya viññāyatīti vacīviññattisaṅkhāte vacībhedakarappayogasamuṭṭhāpakacittasamuṭṭhānapathavīdhātvādhikakalāpassa
analyzed: vācāya adhippāyam viññāpeti sayam ca vācāya viññāyati iti vacī viññatti saṅkhāte vacī bheda kara ppayoga samuṭṭhāpaka citta samuṭṭhāna pathavī dhātu ādhika kalāpassa

original: vikārabhūte copanavācābhāvato, kammānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato ca vacīdvārasaṅkhāte
analyzed: vikāra bhūte kammānam pavatti mukha bhāvataḥ ca vacī dvāra saṅkhāte

original: kammadvāre. Bāhullavuttitoti idaṃ vuttanayameva.
analyzed: kamma dvāre bāhulla vuttito ti idam vutta nayam eva

original: 57. Parasampattiṃ abhimukhaṃ jhāyati lobhavasena cintetīti abhijjhā. Byāpajjati hitasukhaṃ etenāti byāpādo. Micchā viparītato passatīti micchādiṭṭhi.
analyzed: para sampattim abhimukham jhāyati lobha vasena cinteti iti abhijjhā byāpajjati hita sukham etena ati byāpādaḥ micchā viparītataḥ passati iti micchādiṭṭhi

original: Tattha “aho vata idaṃ mama siyā”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanaṃ abhijjhā, sā parabhaṇḍassa
analyzed: tattha aho vata idam mama siyā ti evam parabhaṇḍa abhijjhāyanam abhijjhā sā parabhaṇḍassa

original: attano nāmaneneva kammapatho hoti. “Aho vatāyaṃ satto vinasseyyā”ti evaṃ manopadoso
analyzed: attanaḥ nāmanena iva kamma pathaḥ hoti aho vata ayam satto vinasseyya ati evam manas upadosaḥ

original: byāpādo. “Natthi dinna”ntyādinā nayena viparītadassanaṃ micchādiṭṭhi. Ettha pana
analyzed: byāpādaḥ natthi dinna nti ādinā nayena viparīta dassanam micchādiṭṭhi ettha pana

original: natthikaahetukaakiriyadiṭṭhīhiyeva kammapathabhedo. Imesaṃ pana aṅgādivavatthānavasena
analyzed: kamma patha bhedaḥ imesam pana aṅga ādi vavatthāna vasena

original: papañco tattha tattha āgatanayena daṭṭhabbo. Aññatrāpi viññattiyāti kāyavacīviññattiṃ
analyzed: papañcaḥ tattha tattha āgata nayena daṭṭhabbo aññatra api viññattiyā ti kāya vacī viññattim

original: vināpi, taṃ asamuṭṭhāpetvāpītyattho. Viññattisamuṭṭhāpakacittasampayuttā cettha abhijjhādayo
analyzed: vinā api tam a samuṭṭhāpetvā api iti atthaḥ viññatti samuṭṭhāpaka citta sampayuttā ca ittha abhijjhā ādayaḥ

original: cetanāpakkhikāva honti.
analyzed: cetanā pakkhikāḥ ava honti

original: 58. Dosamūlena jāyantīti sahajātādipaccayena dosasaṅkhātamūlena, dosamūlakacittena
analyzed: dosa mūlena jāyanti iti sahajāta ādi paccayena dosa saṅkhāta mūlena dosa mūlaka cittena

original: vā jāyanti, na lobhamūlādīhi. Hasamānāpi hi rājāno dosacitteneva pāṇavadhaṃ āṇāpenti,
analyzed: vā jāyanti na lobha mūla ādīhi hasamānāḥ api hi rājānaḥ dosa cittena iva pāṇa vadham āṇāpenti

original: tathā pharusavācābyāpādesupi yathārahaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Micchādassanassa abhinivisitabbavatthūsu
analyzed: tathā pharusa vācā byāpādesu pi yathāraham daṭṭhabbam micchādassanassa abhinivisitabba vatthūsu

original: lobhapubbaṅgamameva abhinivisanato āha “micchādiṭṭhi ca lobhamūlenā”ti. Sesāni cattāripi
analyzed: lobha pubbaṅgamam eva abhinivisanataḥ āha micchādiṭṭhi ca lobha mūlena ati sesāni cattāri pi

original: dvīhi mūlehi sambhavantīti yo tāva abhimataṃ vatthuṃ, anabhimataṃ vā attabandhuparittāṇādippayojanaṃ
analyzed: dvīhi mūlehi sambhavanti iti yo tāva abhimatam vatthum anabhimatam vā atta bandhu parittāṇa ādi ppayojanam

original: sandhāya harati, tassa adinnādānaṃ lobhamūlena hoti. Veraniyyātanatthaṃ harantassa
analyzed: sandhāya harati tassa adinnādānam lobha mūlena hoti vera niyyātana attham harantassa

original: dosamūlena. Nītipāṭhakappamāṇato duṭṭhaniggahaṇatthaṃ parasantakaṃ harantānaṃ rājūnaṃ,
analyzed: dosa mūlena nīti pāṭhaka ppamāṇataḥ duṭṭha niggahaṇa attham para santakam harantānam rājūnam

original: brāhmaṇānañca “sabbamidaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ rājūhi dinnaṃ, tesaṃ pana sabbadubbalabhāvena
analyzed: brāhmaṇānam ca sabbam idam brāhmaṇānam rājūhi dinnam tesam pana sabba dubbala bhāvena

original: aññe paribhuñjanti, attasantakameva brāhmaṇā paribhuñjantī”tyādīni vatvā sakasaññāya
analyzed: aññe paribhuñjanti atta santakam eva brāhmaṇā paribhuñjanti ityādīni vatvā saka saññāya

original: evaṃ yaṃ kiñci harantānaṃ, kammaphalasambandhāpavādīnañca mohamūlena. Evaṃ musāvādādīsupi
analyzed: evam yam kiñci moha mūlena evam musāvāda ādīsupi

original: yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: yathāraham yojetabbam

original: 63. Chasu ārammaṇesu tividhakammavasena uppajjamānampetaṃ tividhaniyamena uppajjatīti
analyzed: chasu ārammaṇesu tividha kamma vasena uppajjamānam petam tividha niyamena uppajjati iti

original: āha “tathā dānasīlabhāvanāvasenā”ti. Dasadhā niddisiyamānānaṃ hi dvinnaṃ, puna dvinnaṃ,
analyzed: āha tathā dāna sīla bhāvanā vasena ati dasadhā hi dvinnam punar dvinnam

original: tiṇṇañca yathākkamaṃ dānādīsu tīsveva saṅgaho. Kāraṇaṃ panettha parato vakkhāma.
analyzed: tiṇṇam ca yathākkamam dāna ādīsu tīsu eva saṅgahaḥ kāraṇam pana ittha paratas vakkhāma

original: Chaḷārammaṇesu pana tividhakammadvāresu ca nesaṃ pavattiyojanā aṭṭhakathādīsu āgatanayena gahetabbā.
analyzed: chaṭṭha ārammaṇesu pana tividha kamma dvāresu ca nesam pavatti yojanā aṭṭhakathā ādīsu āgata nayena gahetabbā

original: 65. Dīyati etenāti dānaṃ, pariccāgacetanā. Evaṃ sesesupi. Sīlatīti sīlaṃ, kāyavacīkammāni
analyzed: dīyati etena ati dānam pariccāga cetanā evam sesesu pi sīlati iti sīlam kāya vacī kammāni

original: samādahati, sammā ṭhapetītyattho, sīlayati vā upadhāretīti sīlaṃ, upadhāraṇaṃ panettha
analyzed: samādahati sammā ṭhapeti iti attho sīlayati vai upadhāreti iti sīlam upadhāraṇam pana ittha

original: kusalānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvo. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “sīle patiṭṭhāyā”tyādi. Bhāveti kusale
analyzed: kusalānam adhiṭṭhāna bhāvaḥ tathā hi vuttam sīle patiṭṭhāya atyādi bhāveti kusale

original: dhamme āsevati vaḍḍheti etāyāti bhāvanā. Apacāyati pūjāvasena sāmīciṃ karoti etenāti
analyzed: dhamme āsevati vaḍḍheti etāya ati bhāvanā apacāyati pūjā vasena sāmīcim karoti etena ati

original: apacāyanaṃ. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe byāvaṭassa bhāvo veyyāvaccaṃ. Attano santāne nibbattā
analyzed: apacāyanam taṃ taṃ kicca karaṇe byāvaṭassa bhāvaḥ veyyāvaccam attanaḥ santāne nibbattā

original: patti dīyati etenāti pattidānaṃ. Pattiṃ anumodati etāyāti pattānumodanā. Dhammaṃ
analyzed: patti dīyati etena ati patti dānam pattim anumodati etāya ati patta anumodanā dhammam

original: suṇanti etenāti dhammassavanaṃ. Dhammaṃ desenti etāyāti dhammadesanā. Diṭṭhiyā ujukaraṇaṃ diṭṭhijukammaṃ.

original: 7. Itthiyā bhāvo itthattaṃ. Purisassa bhāvo purisattaṃ. Tattha itthiliṅganimittakuttākappahetubhāvalakkhaṇaṃ

original: 13. Calamānakāyena adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti, sayañca tena viññāyatīti kāyaviññatti. Saviññāṇakasaddasaṅkhātavācāya

original: vāyodhātūhi laddhopatthambhā desantaruppattihetubhāvena calayati cittajaṃ, purimajavanādisambhūtā
analyzed: vāyo dhātūhi laddha upatthambhā desantara uppatti hetu bhāvena calayati citta jam purima javana ādi sambhūtā

original: pana santhambhanasandhāraṇamattakarā tassa upakārāya hontīti. Yathā hi sattahi yugehi
analyzed: pana santhambhana sandhāraṇa matta karā tassa upakārāya honti iti yathā hi sattahi yugehi

original: ākaḍḍhitabbasakaṭe sattamayugayuttāyeva goṇā heṭṭhā chasu yugesu yuttagoṇehi laddhūpatthambhā
analyzed: ākaḍḍhitabba sakaṭe sattama yuga yuttāya iva goṇā heṭṭhā chasu yugesu yutta goṇehi laddha upatthambhā

original: sakaṭaṃ cālenti, paṭhamayugādiyuttā pana upatthambhanasandhāraṇamattameva sādhentā
analyzed: sakaṭam cālenti paṭhama yuga ādi yuttā pana upatthambhana sandhāraṇa mattam eva

original: tesaṃ upakārāya honti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: tesam upakārāya honti evaṃsampadam idam daṭṭhabbam

original: Desantaruppattiyeva cettha calanaṃ uppannadesato kesaggamattampi dhammānaṃ saṅkamanābhāvato.
analyzed: desa antara uppattiyā iva ca ittha calanam uppanna desataḥ kesaggamattam pi dhammānam saṅkamana abhāvato

original: Itarathā nesaṃ abyāpārakatā, khaṇikatā ca na siyā. Desantaruppattihetubhāvoti ca
analyzed: itarathā na isam abyāpāraka tā khaṇika tā ca na siyā ca

original: yathā attanā sahajarūpāni heṭṭhimajavanasamuṭṭhitarūpehi patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānato aññattha
analyzed: yathā attanā sahaja rūpāni heṭṭhima javana samuṭṭhita rūpehi patiṭṭhita ṭṭhānataḥ aññattha

original: uppajjanti, evaṃ tehi saha tattha uppattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, ettha pana cittaje calite
analyzed: uppajjanti evam tehi saha tattha uppattiyā iva āti daṭṭhabbam ettha pana citta je calite

original: taṃsambandhena itarampi calati nadīsote pakkhittasukkhagomayapiṇḍaṃ viya. Tathā calayituṃ
analyzed: tad sambandhena itaram pi calati nadī sote pakkhitta sukkha gomaya piṇḍam viya tathā calayitum

original: asakkonti yopi paṭhamajavanādisamuṭṭhānavāyodhātuyo viññattivikārasahitāyeva yena
analyzed: asakkonti yaḥ pi paṭhama javana ādi samuṭṭhāna vāyodhātuyaḥ viññatti vikāra sahitāya iva yena

original: disābhāgena ayaṃ abhikkamādīni pavattetukāmo, tadabhimukhabhāvavikārasambhavato.
analyzed: disā bhāgena ayam abhikkama ādīni tad abhimukha bhāva vikāra sambhavataḥ

original: Evañca katvā manodvārāvajjanassapi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakattaṃ vakkhati. Vacībhedakaracittasamuṭṭhānapathavīdhātuyā
analyzed: evam ca katvā viññatti samuṭṭhāpaka ttam vakkhati vacī bheda kara citta samuṭṭhāna pathavī dhātuyā

original: akkharuppattiṭṭhānagataupādinnarūpehi saha ghaṭṭanapaccayabhūto eko vikāro vacīviññatti.
analyzed: akkhara uppatti ṭṭhāna gata upādinna rūpehi saha ghaṭṭana paccaya bhūtaḥ ekaḥ vikāraḥ vacī viññatti

original: Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ kāyaviññattiyaṃ vuttanayena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: yam pana ittha vattabbam tam kāya viññattiyam vutta nayena daṭṭhabbam

original: Ayaṃ pana viseso – yathā tattha “phandamānakāyaggahaṇānantara”nti vuttaṃ, evamidha
analyzed: ayam pana visesaḥ yathā tattha phandamāna kāya ggahaṇa anantaram ti vuttam evam idha

original: “suyyamānasaddasavanānantara”nti yojetabbaṃ. Idha ca santhambhanādīnaṃ abhāvato sattamajavanasamuṭṭhitātyādinayo
analyzed: yojetabbam idha ca santhambhana ādīnam abhāvataḥ

original: na labbhati. Ghaṭṭanena hi saddhiṃyeva saddo uppajjati. Ghaṭṭanañca paṭhamajavanādīsupi
analyzed: na labbhati ghaṭṭanena hi saddhiṃyeva saddo uppajjati ghaṭṭanam ca paṭhama javana ādīsu pi

original: labbhateva. Ettha ca yathā ussāpetvā baddhagosīsatālapaṇṇādirūpāni disvā tadanantarappavattāya
analyzed: labbha tā iva ettha ca yathā ussāpetvā baddha gosīsa tāla paṇṇa ādi rūpāni disvā tad anantara ppavattāya

original: aviññāyamānantarāya manodvāravīthiyā gosīsādīnaṃ udakasahacāritappakāraṃ saññāṇaṃ
analyzed: a viññāyamāna antarāya manaḥ dvāra vīthiyā gosīsa ādīnam udaka sahacārita ppakāram saññāṇam

original: gahetvā udakaggahaṇaṃ hoti, evaṃ vipphandamānasamuccāriyamānakāyasadde gahetvā tadanantarappavattāya
analyzed: gahetvā udaka ggahaṇam hoti evam vipphandamāna samuccāriyamāna kāya sadde gahetvā tad anantara ppavattāya

original: aviññāyamānantarāya manodvāravīthiyā purimasiddhasambandhūpanissayāya sādhippāyavikāraggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: a viññāyamāna antarāya manaḥ dvāra vīthiyā purima siddha sambandhu upanissayāya sa adhippāya vikāra ggahaṇam

original: hotīti ayaṃ dvinnaṃ sādhāraṇā upamā.
analyzed: ayam dvinnam sādhāraṇā upamā

original: 14. Lahubhāvo lahutā. Mudubhāvo mudutā. Kammaññabhāvo kammaññatā. Yathākkamañcetā
analyzed: lahu bhāvaḥ lahu tā mudu bhāvaḥ mudu tā kammañña bhāvaḥ kammañña tā

original: arogino viya rūpānaṃ agarutā suparimadditacammassa viya akathinatā sudhantasuvaṇṇassa
analyzed: aroginaḥ viya rūpānam agarutā su parimaddita cammassa viya a kathinatā su dhanta suvaṇṇassa

original: viya sarīrakiriyānaṃ anukūlabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aññamaññaṃ avijahantassapi hi lahutādittayassa
analyzed: viya sarīra kiriyānam anukūla bhāvaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam aññam aññam a vijahantassa api hi lahu tā dittayassa

original: taṃtaṃvikārādhikarūpehi nānattaṃ vuccati, dandhattakaradhātukkhobhappaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhāno
analyzed: tad tad vikāra adhika rūpehi nānattam vuccati dandha tta kara dhātu kkhobha ppaṭipakkha paccaya samuṭṭhānaḥ

original: hi rūpavikāro lahutā. Thaddhattakaradhātukkhobhappaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhāno mudutā.
analyzed: hi rūpa vikāraḥ lahu tā thaddhatta kara dhātu kkhobha ppaṭipakkha paccaya samuṭṭhānaḥ mudu tā

original: Sarīrakiriyānaṃ ananukūlabhāvakaradhātukkhobhappaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhāno kammaññatāti.
analyzed: sarīra kiriyānam ananukūla bhāva kara dhātu khobha ppaṭipakkha paccaya samuṭṭhānaḥ kammañña tā ti

original: 15. Upacayanaṃ upacayo, paṭhamacayotyattho “upaññatta”ntyādīsu viya upa-saddassa
analyzed: upacayanam upacayaḥ paṭhama cayaḥ iti atthaḥ upaññatta nti ādīsu viyaḥ upasaddassa

original: paṭhamatthajotanato. Santāno santati, pabandhotyattho. Tattha paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya
analyzed: paṭhama attha jotanataḥ santāno santati tattha paṭisandhitaḥ paṭṭhāya

original: yāva cakkhādidasakānaṃ uppatti, etthantare rūpuppādo upacayo nāma. Tato paraṃ santati
analyzed: yāva cakkhu ādi dasakānaṃ uppatti etthantare rūpa uppādo upacayaḥ nāma tatas param santati

original: nāma. Yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattaṭṭhāyīnaṃ rūpānaṃ nirodhābhimukhabhāvavasena jīraṇaṃ jarā,
analyzed: nāma yathāsakam nirodha abhimukha bhāva vasena jīraṇam jarā

original: sāyeva jaratā, niccadhuvabhāvena na iccaṃ anupagantabbanti aniccaṃ, tassa bhāvo aniccatā,
analyzed: sāyā iva jaratā nicca dhuva bhāvena na iccam an upagantabbanti aniccam tassa bhāvaḥ anicca tā

original: rūpaparibhedo. Lakkhaṇarūpaṃ nāma dhammānaṃ taṃtaṃavatthāvasena lakkhaṇahetuttā.
analyzed: rūpa paribhedaḥ lakkhaṇa rūpam nāma dhammānam taṃ taṃ avatthā vasena lakkhaṇa hetu ttā

original: 16. Jātirūpamevāti paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya rūpānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe uppattibhāvato jātisaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: jāti rūpam eva ati paṭisandhitaḥ paṭṭhāya rūpānam khaṇe khaṇe uppatti bhāvataḥ jāti saṅkhātam

original: rūpuppattibhāvena catusantatirūpappaṭibaddhavuttittā rūpasammatañca jātirūpameva
analyzed: rūpa uppatti bhāvena catu santati rūpa ppaṭibaddha vutti ttā rūpa sammatañca jāti rūpam eva

original: upacayasantatibhāvena pavuccati paṭhamupariniccattasaṅkhātappavattiākārabhedato veneyyavasena
analyzed: upacaya santati bhāvena pavuccati paṭhama upari niccatta saṅkhāta ppavatti ākāra bhedataḥ veneyya vasena

original: “upacayo santatī”ti vibhajitvā vuttattā. Evañca katvā tāsaṃ niddese atthato abhedaṃ
analyzed: upacayaḥ santatī iti vibhajitvā vutta ttā evam ca katvā tāsam niddese atthataḥ abhedam

original: dassetuṃ “yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo, so rūpassa upacayo. Yo rūpassa upacayo, sā rūpassa
analyzed: dassetum yaḥ āyatanānam ācayo saḥ rūpassa upacayaḥ yaḥ rūpassa upacayo sā rūpassa

original: santatī”ti vuttaṃ. Ekādasavidhampīti sabhāgasaṅgahavasena ekādasappakārampi.
analyzed: santati iti vuttam ekādasavidham pi iti sa bhāga saṅgaha vasena ekādasa ppakāram pi

original: 17. Cattāro bhūtā, pañca pasādā, cattāro visayā, duvidho bhāvo, hadayarūpamiccapi
analyzed: cattāraḥ pañca cattāraḥ visayā duvidhaḥ bhāvaḥ hadaya rūpam id api

original: idaṃ jīvitāhārarūpehi dvīhi saha aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ, tathā paricchedo ca duvidhā viññatti,
analyzed: idam jīvita āhāra rūpehi dvīhi saha aṭṭhārasavidham tathā paricchedo ca duvidhā viññatti

original: tividho vikāro, catubbidhaṃ lakkhaṇanti rūpānaṃ paricchedavikārādibhāvaṃ vinā visuṃ
analyzed: tividhaḥ vikāro catubbidham pariccheda vikāra ādi bhāvam vinā visum

original: paccayehi anibbattattā ime anipphannā dasa ceti aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ bhave.
analyzed: paccayehi a nibbatta ttā ime anipphannāḥ dasa ca iti aṭṭhavīsatividham bhave

original: Rūpasamuddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: rūpa samuddesa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Rūpavibhāgavaṇṇanā
analyzed: rūpa vibhāga vaṇṇanā

original: 18. Idāni yathāuddiṭṭharūpānaṃ ekavidhādinayadassanatthaṃ “sabbañca paneta”ntyādi
analyzed: idāni yathā uddiṭṭha rūpānam ekavidha ādi naya dassana attham sabbam ca

original: vuttaṃ. Sampayuttassa alobhādihetuno abhāvā ahetukaṃ. Yathāsakaṃ paccayavantatāya
analyzed: vuttam sampayuttassa alobha ādi hetuno abhāvāḥ ahetukam yathāsakam paccayavanta tāya

original: sappaccayaṃ. Attānaṃ ārabbha pavattehi kāmāsavādīhi sahitattā sāsavaṃ. Paccayehi
analyzed: sappaccayam attānam ārabbha pavattehi kāma āsava ādīhi sahita ttā sa āsavam paccayehi

original: abhisaṅkhatattā saṅkhataṃ. Upādānakkhandhasaṅkhāte loke niyuttatāya lokiyaṃ. Kāmataṇhāya
analyzed: abhisaṅkhata ttā saṅkhatam upādāna kkhandha saṅkhāte loke niyutta tāya lokiyam kāma taṇhāya

original: avacaritattā kāmāvacaraṃ. Arūpadhammānaṃ viya kassaci ārammaṇassa aggahaṇato nāssa
analyzed: avacarita ttā kāmāvacaram arūpa dhammānam viya kassaci ārammaṇassa aggahaṇato

original: ārammaṇanti anārammaṇaṃ. Tadaṅgādivasena pahātabbatābhāvato appahātabbaṃ. Iti-saddo
analyzed: ārammaṇanti anārammaṇam tad aṅga ādi vasena pahātabba tā abhāvataḥ appahātabbam iti saddaḥ

original: pakārattho, tena “abyākata”ntyādikaṃ sabbaṃ ekavidhanayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: pakāra atthaḥ tena abyākata antya ādikam sabbam ekavidha nayam saṅgaṇhāti

original: 19. Ajjhattikarūpaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattattā. Kāmaṃ
analyzed: ajjhattika rūpam atta bhāva saṅkhātam attānam adhikicca uddissa pavatta ttā kāmam

original: aññepi hi ajjhattasambhūtā atthi, ruḷhīvasena pana cakkhādikaṃyeva ajjhattikaṃ. Atha
analyzed: aññe pi hi ajjhatta sambhūtāḥ atthi ruḷhī vasena pana cakkha ādikam yeva ajjhattikam atha

original: vā “yadi mayaṃ na homa, tvaṃ kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamo bhavissasī”ti vadantā viya attabhāvassa
analyzed: vā yadi mayam na tvam kaṭṭha kaliṅga rūpamaḥ bhavissasi iti vadantāḥ viya atta bhāvassa

original: sātisayaṃ upakārattā cakkhādīneva visesato ajjhattikāni nāma. Attasaṅkhātaṃ vā cittaṃ
analyzed: sa atisayam upakāra attā cakkha ādīn eva visesataḥ ajjhattikāni nāma atta saṅkhātam vā cittam

original: adhikicca tassa dvārabhāvena pavattatīti ajjhattaṃ, tadeva ajjhattikaṃ. Tato bahibhūtattā
analyzed: adhikicca tassa dvāra bhāvena pavattati iti ajjhattam tat eva ajjhattikam tatas bahi bhūta ttā

original: itaraṃ tevīsatividhaṃ bāhirarūpaṃ.
analyzed: itaram tevīsatividham bāhira rūpam

original: 20. Itaraṃ bāvīsatividhaṃ avatthurūpaṃ.
analyzed: itaram bāvīsatividham avatthu rūpam

original: 22. Aṭṭhavidhampi indriyarūpaṃ pañcaviññāṇesu liṅgādīsu sahajarūpaparipālane ca ādhipaccayogato.
analyzed: aṭṭhavidham pi indriya rūpam pañca viññāṇesu liṅga ādīsu sahaja rūpa paripālane ca ādhi paccayogato

original: Pasādarūpassa hi pañcavidhassa cakkhuviññāṇādīsu ādhipaccaṃ attano paṭumandādibhāvena
analyzed: pasāda rūpassa hi pañcavidhassa cakkhu viññāṇa ādīsu ādhipaccam attano paṭu manda ādi bhāvena

original: tesampi paṭumandādibhāvāpādanato. Bhāvadvayassāpi itthiliṅgādīsu ādhipaccaṃ yathāsakaṃ
analyzed: tesam pi paṭu manda ādi bhāva āpādanataḥ bhāva dvayassa api itthi liṅga ādīsu ādhipaccam yathāsakam

original: paccayehi uppajjamānānampi tesaṃ yebhuyyena sabhāvakasantāneyeva taṃtadākārena uppajjanato,
analyzed: paccayehi uppajjamānānam pi tesam yebhuyyena sabhāvaka santāneya iva taṃ tad ākārena uppajjanato

original: na pana indriyapaccayabhāvato. Jīvitassa ca kammajaparipālane ādhipaccaṃ tesaṃ yathāsakaṃ
analyzed: na pana indriya paccaya bhāvataḥ jīvitassa ca kamma ja paripālane ādhipaccam tesam yathāsakam

original: khaṇaṭṭhānassa jīvitindriyappaṭibaddhattā. Sayañca attanā ṭhapitadhammasambandheneva
analyzed: khaṇa ṭṭhānassa jīvitindriya ppaṭibaddha ttā sayam ca attanā ṭhapita dhamma sambandhena iva

original: pavattati nāviko viya.
analyzed: pavattati nāvikaḥ viya

original: 23. Visayavisayibhāvappattivasena thūlattā oḷārikarūpaṃ. Tatoyeva gahaṇassa sukarattā
analyzed: visaya visayi bhāva ppatti vasena thūla ttā oḷārika rūpam gahaṇassa sukara ttā

original: santikerūpaṃ āsannarūpaṃ nāma. Yo sayaṃ, nissayavasena ca sampattānaṃ, asampattānañca
analyzed: santikerūpam āsannarūpam nāma sayam nissaya vasena ca sampattānam a sampattānam ca

original: paṭimukhabhāvo aññamaññapatanaṃ, so paṭigho viyāti paṭigho. Yathā hi paṭighāte sati
analyzed: paṭimukha bhāvaḥ aññamañña patanam so paṭighaḥ viyāti paṭighaḥ yathā hi paṭighāte sati

original: dubbalassa calanaṃ hoti, evaṃ aññamaññaṃ paṭimukhabhāve sati arūpasabhāvattā dubbalassa
analyzed: dubbalassa calanam hoti evam aññamaññam paṭimukha bhāve sati arūpa sabhāva ttā dubbalassa

original: bhavaṅgassa calanaṃ hoti. Paṭigho yassa atthi taṃ sappaṭighaṃ. Tattha sayaṃ sampatti
analyzed: bhavaṅgassa calanam hoti paṭighaḥ yassa atthi tam sa paṭigham tattha sayam sampatti

original: phoṭṭhabbassa, nissayavasena sampatti ghānajivhākāyagandharasānaṃ, ubhayathāpi asampatti
analyzed: phoṭṭhabbassa nissaya vasena sampatti ghāna jivhā kāya gandha rasānaṃ ubhayathā api a sampatti

original: cakkhusotarūpasaddānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Itaraṃ soḷasavidhaṃ oḷārikatādisabhāvābhāvato sukhumarūpādikaṃ.
analyzed: cakkhu sota rūpa saddānan ti daṭṭhabbam itaram soḷasavidham oḷārika tā ādi sabhāva abhāvato sukhuma rūpa ādikam

original: 24. Kammato jātaṃ aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ upādinnarūpaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi upetena kammunā attano phalabhāvena ādinnattā gahitattā. Itaraṃ aggahitaggahaṇenadasavidhaṃ anupādinnarūpaṃ.
analyzed: kammataḥ jātam aṭṭhārasavidham upādinna rūpam taṇhā diṭṭhīhi upetena kammunā attanaḥ phala bhāvena ādinna ttā gahita ttā itaram aggahita ggahaṇena dasavidham anupādinna rūpam

original: 25. Daṭṭhabbabhāvasaṅkhātena nidassanena saha vattatīti sanidassanaṃ. Cakkhuviññāṇagocarabhāvo
analyzed: daṭṭhabba bhāva saṅkhātena nidassanena saha vattati iti sa nidassanam cakkhu viññāṇa gocara bhāvaḥ

original: hi nidassananti vuccati tassa ca rūpāyatanato anaññattepi aññehi dhammehi taṃ visesetuṃ
analyzed: hi nidassananti vuccati tassa ca rūpa āyatanataḥ an aññatte pi aññehi dhammehi tam visesetum

original: aññaṃ viya katvā vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti saha nidassanena sanidassananti. Dhammabhāvasāmaññena
analyzed: aññam viya katvā vattum vaṭṭati iti saha nidassanena sa nidassanan ti dhamma bhāva sāmaññena

original: hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yo nānattakaro viseso, so añño viya katvā upacarituṃ yutto.
analyzed: hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yaḥ nānatta karaḥ viseso so aññaḥ viya katvā upacaritum yuttaḥ

original: Evañhi atthavisesāvabodho hoti.
analyzed: evam hi attha visesa avabodhaḥ hoti

original: 26. Asampattavasenāti attānaṃ asampattassa gocarassa vasena, attanā visayappadesaṃ
analyzed: asampatta vasena ati attānam asampattassa gocarassa vasena attanā visaya ppadesam

original: vā asampattavasena. Cakkhusotāni hi rūpasaddehi asampattāni, sayaṃ vā tāni asampattāneva
analyzed: vā asampatta vasena cakkhu sotāni hi rūpa saddehi asampattāni sayam vā tāni asampattāna eva

original: ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhanti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
analyzed: ārammaṇam gaṇhanti tena itam vuccati

original: “Cakkhusotaṃ panetesu, hotāsampattagāhakaṃ;
analyzed: cakkhu sotam pana etesu hotā a sampatta gāhakam

original: Viññāṇuppattihetuttā, santarādhikagocare.
analyzed: viññāṇa uppatti hetu ttā santara adhika gocare

original: “Tathā hi dūradesaṭṭhaṃ, phalikāditirohitaṃ;

original: “Ākāsādigato kucchi-cammānantarikopi ca;

original: “Na tesaṃ gocarā honti, na hi sambhonti te bahi;

original: Vuttā ca avisesena, pāṭhe taṃvisayāva te.

original: “Yadi cetaṃ dvayaṃ attasamīpaṃyeva gaṇhati;
analyzed: yadi ca itam dvayam gaṇhati

original: “Disādesavavatthānaṃ, saddassa na bhaveyya ca;

original: Siyā ca saravedhissa, sakaṇṇe sarapātana”nti.

original: Gocaraggāhikarūpaṃ viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ hutvā taṃtaṃgocaraggahaṇasabhāvattā. Itaraṃ tevīsatividhaṃ agocaraggāhikarūpaṃ gocaraggahaṇābhāvato.
analyzed: gocara ggāhika rūpam viññāṇa dhiṭṭhitam hutvā taṃ taṃ gocara ggahaṇa sabhāvattā itaram tevīsatividham agocara ggāhika rūpam gocara ggahaṇa abhāvato

original: 27. Vaṇṇitabbo daṭṭhabboti vaṇṇo. Attano udayānantaraṃ rūpaṃ janetīti ojā. Avinibbhogarūpaṃ
analyzed: vaṇṇitabbaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ iti vaṇṇaḥ attanaḥ udaya anantaram rūpam janeti iti ojā a vinibbhoga rūpam

analyzed: abhāva vādi matam pi hi tattha tattha ācariyehi paṭikkhittam eva

original: 28. Iccevanti etthapi iti-saddo pakārattho, tena idha anāgatampi sabbaṃ dukatikādibhedaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

analyzed: rūpa samuṭṭhāna naya vaṇṇanā

original: “Uppannuppajjamānanti, vibhaṅge evamādinaṃ;

original: “‘Uppādo ca vayo ceva, aññathattaṃ ṭhitassa ca;

original: “Aññathattassa ekasmiṃ, dhamme anupaladdhito;

original: Uppādeyeva cittassa, rūpahetūti kecana.

original: 31. Rūpavirāgabhāvanānibbattattā hetuno tabbidhuratāya, anokāsatāya ca arūpavipākā,

original: 37. Tattha hadayaindriyarūpāni nava kammatoyeva jātattā kammajāneva. Yañhi jātaṃ, jāyati, jāyissati ca, taṃ “kammaja”nti vuccati yathā duddhanti.

original: 40. Paccuppannapaccayāpekkhattā lahutādittayaṃ kammajaṃ na hoti, itarathā sabbadābhāvīhi bhavitabbanti vuttaṃ “lahutādittayaṃ utucittāhārehi sambhotī”ti.
analyzed: paccuppanna paccaya apekkha ttā lahu tā ādi ttayam kamma jam na hoti itarathā sabbadābhāvīhi bhavitabban ti vuttam lahu tā ādi ttayam utu citta āhārehi sambhoti iti

original: 43. Ekantakammajāni nava, catujesu kammajāni navāti aṭṭhārasa kammajāni, pañcavikārarūpasaddaavinibbhogarūpaākāsavasena

original: lahutādittayaavinibbhogākāsavasena dvādasa āhārajāni.

analyzed: vinā attanaḥ jāti ādi lakkhaṇa abhāvataḥ lakkhaṇāni kehici paccayehi na jāyanti iti pakāsitam

original: Uppādādiyuttānañhi cakkhādīnaṃ jātiādīni lakkhaṇāni vijjanti, na evaṃ jātiādīnaṃ.

original: satiyeva paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃ pana kāyavedanācittadhammesu asubhadukkhāniccānattākāraggahaṇavasena,

original: subhasukhaniccaattasaññāvipallāsappahānavasena ca catubbidhanti vuttaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti.
analyzed: subha sukha nicca atta saññā vipallāsa ppahāna vasena ca catubbidhanti vuttam cattāro sati paṭṭhānā ti

original: Kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ āyoti kāyo, sarīraṃ, assāsapassāsānaṃ vā samūho kāyo, tassa
analyzed: kucchitānam kesa ādīnam āyo ti kāyaḥ sarīram assāsa passāsānam vā samūhaḥ kāyo tassa

original: anupassanā parikammavasena, vipassanāvasena ca saraṇaṃ kāyānupassanā. Dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhabhūtānaṃ
analyzed: anupassanā parikamma vasena vipassanā vasena ca saraṇam kāya anupassanā dukkha dukkha vipariṇāma dukkha saṅkhāra dukkha bhūtānam

original: vedanānaṃ vasena anupassanā vedanānupassanā. Tathā sarāgamahaggatādivasena sampayogabhūmibhedena
analyzed: vedanānam vasena anupassanā vedanā anupassanā tathā sa rāga mahaggata ādi vasena sampayoga bhūmi bhedena

original: bhinnasseva cittassa anupassanā cittānupassanā. Saññāsaṅkhārānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhinnalakkhaṇānameva
analyzed: bhinnassa eva cittassa anupassanā citta anupassanā saññā saṅkhārānam dhammānam bhinna lakkhaṇānam eva

original: anupassanā dhammānupassanā.
analyzed: anupassanā dhamma anupassanā

original: 31. Sammā padahanti etenāti sammappadhānaṃ, vāyāmo. So ca kiccabhedena catubbidhoti
analyzed: sammā padahanti etena ati sammappadhānam vāyāmo so ca kicca bhedena catubbidho ti

original: vāyāmo. Bhiyyobhāvāyāti abhivuddhiyā.
analyzed: vāyāmaḥ bhiyyobhāvāya ati abhivuddhiyā

original: 32. Ijjhati adhiṭṭhānādikaṃ etāyāhi iddhi, iddhividhañāṇaṃ iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo, chandoyeva iddhipādo chandiddhipādo.
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāna ādikam iddhiyā pādaḥ iddhi pādo iddhiyā iddhi pādo

original: 35. Bujjhatīti bodhi, āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaro. Yāya vā so satiādikāya
analyzed: bujjhati iti bodhi āraddha vipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaraḥ yāya vā saḥ sati ādikāya

original: dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhati saccāni paṭivijjhati, kilesaniddāto vā vuṭṭhāti, kilesasaṅkocābhāvato

original: vā maggaphalappattiyā vikasati, sā dhammasāmaggī bodhi, tassa bodhissa, tassā vā

original: bodhiyā aṅgabhūtā kāraṇabhūtāti bojjhaṅgā, te pana dhammavasena sattavidhāti āha

original: “satisambojjhaṅgo”tyādi. Satiyeva sundaro bojjhaṅgo, sundarassa vā bodhissa, sundarāya

original: vipassanāpaññā. Upekkhāti idha tatramajjhattupekkhā.

original: 40. “Sattadhā tattha saṅgaho”ti vatvāna puna taṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkappapassaddhi cā”tyādi
analyzed: sattadhā tattha saṅgahaḥ ti vatvāna puna tam dassetum ca atyādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha vīriyaṃ navaṭṭhānaṃ sammappadhānacatukkavīriyiddhipādavīriyindriyavīriyabalasambojjhaṅgasammāvāyāmavasena
analyzed: vuttam tattha vīriyam nava ṭṭhānam sammappadhāna catukka vīriyiddhipāda vīriyindriya vīriya bala sambojjhaṅga sammāvāyāma vasena

original: catukiccattā, paññā pañcaṭṭhānā vīmaṃsiddhipādapaññindriyapaññābaladhammavicayasambojjhaṅgasammādiṭṭhivasena

original: pañcakiccattā, saddhā dviṭṭhānā saddhindriyasaddhābalavasena dvikiccattā. Eso uttamānaṃ
analyzed: pañca kicca ttā saddhā dvi ṭṭhānā saddhā indriya saddhā bala vasena dvi kicca ttā esaḥ uttamānam

original: bodhipakkhiyabhāvena visiṭṭhānaṃ sattatiṃsa dhammānaṃ pavaro uttamo vibhāgo.
analyzed: bodhi pakkhiya bhāvena visiṭṭhānam sattatiṃsa dhammānam pavaraḥ uttamaḥ vibhāgaḥ

original: 41. Lokuttare aṭṭhavidhepi sabbe sattatiṃsa dhammā honti, saṅkappapītiyo na vā honti,

original: Bodhipakkhiyasaṅgahavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: Sabbasaṅgahavaṇṇanā
42. Atītānāgatapaccuppannādibhedabhinnā te te sabhāgadhammā ekajjhaṃ rāsaṭṭhena khandhā.

original: Tenāha bhagavā – “tadekajjhaṃ abhisaṃyūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā ayaṃ vuccati rūpakkhandho”tyādi,
analyzed: tena āha bhagavā tat ekajjham abhisaṃyūhitvā abhisaṅkhipitvā ayam vuccati rūpa kkhandhaḥ ityādi

original: te panete khandhā bhājanabhojanabyañjanabhattakārakabhuñjakavikappavasena pañceva

original: abhisaṅkharaṇato bhattakārakaṭṭhāniyā, viññāṇaṃ upabhuñjakattā bhuñjakaṭṭhāniyaṃ.

original: Ettāvatā ca adhippetatthasiddhīti pañceva vuttā. Desanākkamepi idameva kāraṇaṃ yattha
analyzed: ca adhippeta attha siddhi iti pañcā iva vuttā desanā kkame pi idam eva kāraṇam

original: anukkamena dassetukāmattā.

original: 43. Upādānānaṃ gocarā khandhā upādānakkhandhā, te pana upādānavisayabhāvena gahitā

original: upādāniyabhāvena, pana rāsivasena ca upādānakkhandhesūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

original: 44. Āyatanti ettha taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā tena tena kiccena ghaṭṭenti vāyamanti,

original: pavattenti, cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūtānīti vā āyatanāni. Apica loke nivāsaākarasamosaraṇasañjātiṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: pavattenti cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam kāraṇa bhūtāni iti vā āyatanāni api ca loke nivāsa ākara samosaraṇa sañjā atiṭṭhānam

original: “āyatana”nti vuccati, tasmā etepi taṃtaṃdvārikānaṃ, taṃtadārammaṇānañca cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ

analyzed: cha ati dvādasavidhāni iti āha cakkha āyatana ntyādi cakkhu ca tam āyatanam ca ati cakkha āyatanam evam sesesu pi

original: Ettha ajjhattikāyatanesu sanidassanasappaṭighārammaṇattā cakkhāyatanaṃ vibhūtanti

original: jivhāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ, tato sabbaṭṭhānikaṃ kāyāyatanaṃ, tato pañcannampi gocaraggahaṇasamatthaṃ

analyzed: attano sabhāvam dhārenti iti dhātuyaḥ atha vā yathāsambhavam aneka ppakāram saṃsāra dukkham

original: Tā pana manāyatanaṃ sattaviññāṇadhātuvasena sattadhā bhinditvā avasesehi ekādasāyatanehi saha aṭṭhārasadhātū vuttāti āha “cakkhudhātū”tyādi. Kamakāraṇaṃ vuttanayena daṭṭhabbaṃ.

original: 46. Ariyakarattā ariyāni, tacchabhāvato saccānīti ariyasaccāni. Imāni hi cattāro

original: Khīṇadose ca cattāro, sādhentāriyapuggale.

original: upādānanti ayametesaṃ viseso. Kammabhavo upapattibhavoti duvidho bhavo. Tattha paṭhamo

original: bhavati etasmā phalanti bhavo, so kāmāvacarakusalākusalādivasena ekūnatiṃsavidho.
analyzed: bhavati phalanti

original: Dutiyo pana bhavatīti bhavo, so kāmabhavādivasena navavidho. Upādānapaccayā bhavoti
analyzed: dutiyo pana bhavati iti bhavo so kāma bhava ādi vasena navavidho upādāna paccayā bhavo ti

original: cettha upapattibhavopi adhippeto. Bhavapaccayā jātīti kammabhavova. So hi jātiyā
analyzed: ca ittha upapatti bhavaḥ api adhippetaḥ bhava paccayā jāti iti kamma bhavaḥ u va so hi jātiyā

original: paccayo hoti, na itaro. So hi paṭhamābhinibbattakkhandhasabhāvo jātiyeva, na ca tadeva
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti na itaro so hi paṭhama abhinibbatta kkhandha sabhāvaḥ jātiyā iva na ca tat eva

original: tassa kāraṇaṃ yuttaṃ. Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ taṃtaṃgatiādīsu attabhāvapaṭilābho jāti.
analyzed: tassa kāraṇam yuttam tesam tesam sattānam taṃ taṃ gati ādīsu atta bhāva paṭilābhaḥ jāti

original: Tathānibbattassa ca attabhāvassa purāṇabhāvo jarā. Etasseva ekabhavaparicchinnassa
analyzed: tathā nibbattassa ca atta bhāvassa purāṇa bhāvaḥ jarā etassa iva eka bhava paricchinnassa

original: pariyosānaṃ maraṇaṃ. Ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa cittasantāpo soko. Tasseva vacīpalāpo
analyzed: pariyosānam maraṇam ñāti byasana ādīhi phuṭṭhassa citta santāpaḥ sokaḥ tassa iva vacī palāpaḥ

original: paridevo. Kāyikadukkhavedanā dukkhaṃ. Mānasikadukkhavedanā domanassaṃ. Ñātibyasanādīhi
analyzed: paridevaḥ kāyika dukkha vedanā dukkham mānasika dukkha vedanā domanassam ñāti byasana ādīhi

original: phuṭṭhassa adhimattacetodukkhappabhāvito bhuso āyāso upāyāso.
analyzed: phuṭṭhassa adhimatta cetaḥ dukkha ppabhāvitaḥ bhusaḥ āyāsaḥ upāyāsaḥ

original: Ettha ca satipi vatthārammaṇādike paccayantare avijjādiekekapaccayaggahaṇaṃ padhānabhāvato,
analyzed: ettha ca sati pi vattha ārammaṇa ādike paccaya antare avijjā ādi eka eka paccaya ggahaṇam padhāna bhāvato

original: pākaṭabhāvato cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha ca avijjānusayiteyeva santāne saṅkhārānaṃ vipākadhammabhāvena
analyzed: pākaṭa bhāvato ca ati daṭṭhabbam ettha ca santāne saṅkhārānam vipāka dhamma bhāvena

original: pavattanato avijjāpaccayāsaṅkhārāsambhavanti, viññāṇañca saṅkhārajanitaṃ hutvā bhavantare
analyzed: pavattanataḥ avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā sambhavanti viññāṇam ca saṅkhāra janitam hutvā bhavantare

original: patiṭṭhāti. Na hi janakābhāve tassuppatti siyā, tasmā saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ. Nāmarūpañca
analyzed: patiṭṭhāti na hi janaka abhāve siyā tasmā saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇam nāma rūpam ca

original: pubbaṅgamādhiṭṭhānabhūtaviññāṇupatthaddhaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu patiṭṭhahatīti viññāṇapaccayānāmarūpaṃ,
analyzed: pubbaṅgama adhiṭṭhāna bhūta viññāṇa upatthaddham paṭisandhi pavattīsu patiṭṭhahati iti viññāṇa paccaya nāmarūpam

original: saḷāyatanañca nāmarūpanissayameva chabbidhaphassassa dvārabhāvena yathārahaṃ pavattati,
analyzed: saḷāyatanam ca nāma rūpa nissayam eva chabbidha phassassa dvāra bhāvena yathāraham pavattati

original: no aññathāti nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ. Phasso ca saḷāyatanasambhaveyeva ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: no aññathā ti nāma rūpa paccayā saḷāyatanam phasso ca ārammaṇam

original: phusati. Na hi dvārābhāve tassuppatti siyāti saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattañca
analyzed: phusati na hi dvāra abhāve siyāti saḷāyatana paccayā phassaḥ iṭṭha aniṭṭham ajjhattam ca

original: ārammaṇaṃ phusantoyeva vedanaṃ vedayati, no aññathāti phassapaccayā vedanā. Vedanīyesu
analyzed: ārammaṇam phusanto yā iva vedanam vedayati no aññathā ati phassa paccayā vedanā vedanīyesu

original: ca dhammesu assādānupassino vedanāhetukā taṇhā samuṭṭhātīti vedanāpaccayā taṇhā.
analyzed: ca dhammesu assāda anupassinaḥ vedanā hetukā taṇhā samuṭṭhāti iti vedanā paccayā taṇhā

original: Taṇhāsinehapipāsitāyeva ca upādāniyesu dhammesu upādāya daḷhabhāvāya saṃvattanti.
analyzed: taṇhā sineha pipāsi tāya iva ca upādāniyesu dhammesu upādāya daḷha bhāvāya saṃvattanti

original: Taṇhāya hi rūpādīni assādetvā assādetvā kāmesu pātabyataṃ āpajjantīti taṇhā kāmupādānassa
analyzed: taṇhāya hi rūpa ādīni assādetvā assādetvā kāmesu pātabyatam āpajjanti iti taṇhā kāma upādānassa

original: paccayo. Tathā rūpādibhedegadhito “natthi dinna”ntyādinā micchādassanaṃ saṃsārato
analyzed: paccayo tathā rūpa ādi bhede gadhitaḥ natthi micchā dassanam saṃsārato

original: muccitukāmo asuddhimagge suddhimaggaparāmāsaṃ khandhesu attattaniyagāhabhūtaṃ attavādadassanadvayañca
analyzed: muccitu kāmaḥ a suddhi magge suddhi magga parāmāsam khandhesu atta tta niya gāha bhūtam atta vāda dassana dvayañca

original: gaṇhāti, tasmā diṭṭhupādādīnampi paccayoti taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ. Yathārahaṃ sampayogānusayavasena
analyzed: gaṇhāti tasmā diṭṭhupāda ādīnam pi taṇhā paccayā upādānam yathāraham sampayoga anusaya vasena

original: upādānapatiṭṭhitāyeva sattā kammāyūhanāya saṃvattantīti upādānaṃ bhavassa paccayo.
analyzed: upādāna patiṭṭhitāya iva sattā kamma āyūhanāya saṃvattanti iti upādānam bhavassa paccayo

original: Upapattibhavasaṅkhātā ca jāti kammabhavahetukāyeva. Bījato aṅkuro viya tattha tattha
analyzed: upapatti bhava saṅkhātā ca jāti kamma bhava hetukāya iva bījataḥ aṅkuraḥ viya tattha tattha

original: samupalabbhatīti bhavo jātiyā paccayo nāma. Sati ca jātiyā eva jarāmaraṇasambhavo.
analyzed: samupalabbhati iti bhavaḥ jātiyā paccayaḥ nāma sati ca jātiyā eva jarā maraṇa sambhavo

original: Na hi ajātānaṃ jarāmaraṇasambhavo hotīti jāti jarāmaraṇānaṃ paccayoti evametesaṃ
analyzed: na hi a jātānam jarā maraṇa sambhavaḥ hoti iti jāti jarā maraṇānam paccayo ti evam etesam

original: tabbhāvabhāvībhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: tad bhāva bhāvībhāvaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotīti yathāvuttena paccayaparamparavidhinā,
analyzed: evam etassa kevalassa dukkha kkhandhassa samudayaḥ hoti iti yathā vuttena paccaya parampara vidhinā

original: na pana issaranimmānādīhi etassa vaṭṭasaṅkhātassa kevalassa sukhādīhi asammissassa,
analyzed: na pana issara nimmāna ādīhi etassa vaṭṭa saṅkhātassa kevalassa sukha ādīhi a sammissassa

original: sakalassa vā dukkhakkhandhassa dukkharāsissa na sukhasubhādīnaṃ samudayo nibbatti
analyzed: sakalassa vā dukkha kkhandhassa dukkha rāsissa na sukha subha ādīnam samudayaḥ nibbatti

original: hoti. Ettha imasmiṃ paccayasaṅgahādhikāre.
analyzed: hoti ettha imasmin paccaya saṅgaha adhikāre

original: 5. Atati satataṃ gacchati pavattatīti addhā, kālo.
analyzed: atati satatam gacchati pavattati iti addhā kālaḥ

original: 6. Avijjāsaṅkhārā atīto addhā atītabhavapariyāpannahetūnamevettha adhippetattā, addhāggahaṇena
analyzed: avijjā saṅkhārāḥ atītaḥ addhā atīta bhava pariyāpanna hetūnam eva itthā adhippeta ttā addhā ggahaṇena

original: ca avijjādīnaṃ dhammānameva gahaṇaṃ tabbinimuttassa kassaci kālassa anupalabbhanato.
analyzed: ca avijjā ādīnam dhammānam eva gahaṇam tad vinimuttassa kassaci kālassa an upalabbhanato

original: Niruddhānuppādā eva hi dhammā atītānāgatakālavasena uppādādikkhaṇattayapariyāpannā
analyzed: niruddha anuppādāḥ eva hi dhammāḥ atīta anāgata kāla vasena uppāda ādi kkhaṇa ttaya pariyāpannā

original: ca paccuppannakālavasena voharīyanti. Jātijarāmaraṇaṃ anāgato addhā paccuppannahetuto
analyzed: ca paccuppanna kāla vasena voharīyanti jāti jarā maraṇam anāgataḥ addhā paccuppanna hetuto

original: anāgate nibbattanato. Majjhe paccuppanno addhā atītahetuto idha nibbattanakaphalasabhāvattā,
analyzed: anāgate nibbattanataḥ majjhe paccuppannaḥ addhā atīta hetutaḥ idha nibbattanaka phala sabhāvattā

original: anāgataphalassa idha hetusabhāvattā ca majjhe viññāṇādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni paccuppanno addhā.
analyzed: anāgata phalassa idha hetu sabhāvattā ca majjhe viññāṇa ādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni paccuppannaḥ addhā

original: 8. Nanu sokaparidevādayopi aṅgabhāvena vattabbāti āha “sokādivacana”ntyādi. Sokādivacanaṃ jātiyā nissandassa amukhyaphalamattassa nidassanaṃ, na pana visuṃ aṅgadassanantyattho.
analyzed: nanu soka parideva ādayaḥ api aṅga bhāvena vattabbā iti āha soka ādi vacana ntyādi soka ādi vacanam jātiyāḥ nissandassa amukhya phala mattassa nidassanam na pana visum

original: 9. Taṇhupādānabhavāpi gahitā hontīti kilesabhāvasāmaññato avijjāggahaṇena taṇhupādānāni,
analyzed: taṇhā upādāna bhavā api gahitā honti iti kilesa bhāva sāmaññataḥ avijjā ggahaṇena taṇhā upādānāni

original: kammabhavasāmaññato saṅkhāraggahaṇena kammabhavo gahito. Tathā taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena
analyzed: kamma bhava sāmaññato saṅkhāra ggahaṇena kamma bhavaḥ gahito tathā taṇhā upādāna bhava ggahaṇena

original: ca avijjāsaṅkhārā gahitāti sambandho. Etthāpi vuttanayena tesaṃ gahaṇena tesaṃ saṅgaho
analyzed: ca avijjā saṅkhārā gahitā iti sambandhaḥ ettha api vutta nayena tesam gahaṇena tesam saṅgahaḥ

original: daṭṭhabbo, viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanānaṃ jātijarābhaṅgāva jātijarāmaraṇanti
analyzed: daṭṭhabbaḥ viññāṇa nāma rūpa saḷāyatana phassa vedanānam jāti jarā bhaṅgāḥ ava jāti jarā maraṇanti

original: ca vuttāti āha “jātijarāmaraṇaggahaṇenā”tyādi.
analyzed: ca vuttā iti āha jāti jarā maraṇa ggahaṇena atyādi

original: 10. Atīte hetavo pañcāti sarūpato vuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ, saṅgahavasena
analyzed: atīte hetavaḥ pañca ati sarūpataḥ vuttānam dvinnam avijjā saṅkhārānam saṅgaha vasena

original: gahitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ taṇhupādānabhavānañca vasena paccuppannaphalassa paccayā atītabhave
analyzed: gahitānam tiṇṇam taṇhā upādāna bhavānam ca vasena paccuppanna phalassa paccayāḥ atīta bhave
